aghotara m ma o buru na ugwo onwa onu ulo flaati ato na suv zuuru gi ma nihi nkea kpatara enweghi ebumnobi nye ala ebe amuru gi
mu onwe m nwere ebumnobi nye naijiria na gunye ndi amaala ozo dika omoyele sowore ndi nke nwerela nkoropu na mgbahapu
icho ntughari nebughi egbe ma obu ije inapu goomenti ochichi nike abughi ma agaghi abu ida iwu
iguzo mwuli akonauche nke ndi mmadu site nicho mgbanwe abughi ida iwu
o bu nkea mere ka ochichi onye kwuo uche ya dika usoro goomenti bu nke a kowara dika goomenti nke ndi mmadu site na ndi mmadu ma nyere ndi mmadu ma obughi goomenti nke aka ike site nonye aka ike ma nyere ndi ohu
o buru na ngaghari iwe na ikpo ngaghari iwe njeghari ugbua bu ida iwu ndi uloikpe kwesirila ima omoyele sowore ikpe ka ha jidesiri ya ihe kariri abali otu nari na iri abuo
ya mere mara na nkiti i gbara ma obu iwezuga onwe gi na nsogbu obodo nihe banyere mmegide mpu na elezighi ohanaeze nke oma emeghi ka i buru ezigbo mmadu
i nweghi ezi ohuhu uzo ma burukwa onye ma maka naani onwe ya
i hula ana m ede ihe ederede a maka na mmadu gwara m ka wepu onu nokwu sowore ma gbado anya nazumahia m na whatsapp m wee chia ochi
o gana agu ihe ederede a ya mere m agaghi kpo aha ya ebe uche ohuhu uzo adabaghi adaba na nkwenye nke m
maka gi onye naagu ugbua mara na ebumnobi ihe banyere ekwumekwu a mgbe a gwara gi uche gi di nazumahia gi abughi naani ka i ree ngwaahia gi
o bukwa igosi mmasi nala gi na kwukwaa okwu megide mmegide na ida iwu nke nkwenye mmekorita opekata mpe na ndi obere
o buru na ala gi buru banana republic ebe ana atoro ndi mmadu nulo ikpe n'etiti ehihie gini gaeme azumahia gi na ebumnobi gi na ndi mmeputara mba uwa izukorita ahia
azumahia obula ma ihe ha naeme naenwe mkpesa kwa afo na ngwusi afo obula nke gunyere ileba anya na nka na uzu ndorondoro mmekorita na akunauba na gburugburu ebe ha no
nka a nke nnyocha gburugburu nke di mkpa ide mkpesa di otu a bu oru diiri onye public relations practioner onye nwere ogugu isi ya nka na agwa ime nnyocha emereme na mmepe nobodo ma nye mkpesa nyere ndi nlekota na ndi isi otu ahu ma obu nna ukwu o naejere ozi maka ezigbo nhazi
ee nkea naenye aka ihazi na ibukorita ndi nlekota nihe banyere azumahia na uru ndi nwere ike iputa na gburugburu azumahia ahu nakwa ihe ize ndu nwere ike idi na ya maka azumahia di mma
o bughi ihe di oke onu iru oru dika o di gi nobara site na mmepe nke gburugburu ebe i si ma bikwara
omumaatu site na njo nlekota nke ahuike nala anyi taa o buru na mmadu adanye nihe mberede di nta ma obu nweta oria nke  ogwugwo ya adighi nta ma obu ilekota ya anya ebe enwere ezigbo nlekota ahuike ihe di otua nwere ibute onwu onye ahu
dika odara iwu ejeghi nga buurula omenala nafo 1984 ka m kwuo nke oma na ezigbo onye azumahia mba ofesi ga atu ujo ime azumahia nala naijiria ebe o maara nke oma na ezigbo amaala ana asopuru ma burukwa ezigbo onye ndu dika omoyele sowore bu onye aga akpuru nuloikpe ihe obula gaeme ya tinyere azumahia ya
o buru na itinye nkea notutu ikpe igwu wayo ito mmadu itu ogwunigwe na enweghi ihe ndi naenyere ohaneze aka kedu etu i si che na oke ogaranya nke monaco nke hutara ezigbo ohere azumahia na naijiria ka gaesi cho
ya mere mgbe i chere na i naagba nkiti bu okwu ngosi ogogo ekwenyeghi m
kedu kpom kwem ka o si buru okwu ogogo ma obu mmepe igba nkiti nihu ikpe ezighi ezi
otu nime ihe kasi di egwu maka azumahia obula nke naada iwu ochichi na usoro ikpe mkwumoto iha uha na ikike inu olu
azumahia naaga nke oma ebe ewere nrube isi nye iwu nakwa inwe ezigbo usoro ikpe ziri ezi nye ohaneze enweghi ujo ma obu obi oma

o mere steeti abia nwee govano dikarisiri njo na republik nke ano nonye bu theodore orji

ujo ana atu ndi efcc ime nnyocha banyere ego mmefu na mbupu nke tinubu mere

oshiomhole goofed uloaku nke standard chartered kwuru na o bughi ulooru ndi ndida afrika
otu o di standard chartered gwara ndi mgbasaozi sahara uloaku standard chartered nke naijiria limited bu nke standard chartered plc otu british nwe
uloaku standard chartered ajula okwu nke adams oshomole onyeisi oche nke ngalaba ndorondoro ochichi naachi ugbua all progressive congress na o bu ulooru nke ndida afrika
oshiomhole onye nke kwuru okwu banyere ogbugbu nke ndi ndida afrika naegbu ndi naijiria na ndi mba ozo bi nala ha gwara goomenti ndi naijiria ka ha were ulooru niile ndi ndida afrika di nala a nke gunyere standard chartered
oshiomhole ekwuola anyi matakwara na uloaku standard chartered na uloaku stanbic bu uloaku ndi ndida afrika ndi naijiria nwere ike inwe ihe nrita na ha ma o bururii na o were nke di ya
oge eruola inye ha oso ka uloaku ndi naijiria riwe uru opupu ha ma babiga uba noru ha
ha gaechekwaba otutu uru ma anyi weta azumahia ndia nye ndi naijiria
otu o di standard chartered gwara ndi mgbasaozi sahara uloaku standard chartered nke naijiria limited bu nke standard chartered plc otu british nwe
standard chartered plc bu okacha ibe nuloaku mbauwa dika ndi london hong kong na ulo mgbanwe mumbai deputara
o ruola oru ihe kariri afo otu nari na iri ise notutu uloahia nke mbauwa ma rite ihe kariri pacenti iri iteghete dika  uru na mba eshia afrika na etiti owuwa anyanwu
nlegara anya ebe na idi uchu inwe ezi mmekorita netiti ndi ahia ha emeela ka uloaku a too noge di ugbua

nwata akwukwo nke rioro ka ahapu ikwu aha ya gwara ndi nta akuko that ogu a malitere nubochi wednesde gara aga mgbe umuakwukwo amaghi ndi ha bu batara nuloakwukwo
o kwuru anyi huru otutu umuakwukwo nubochi wednesde nuloakwukwo ebe ha ji mma nke mere ka onye obula gbaa oso ndu ya
o bu ezie o siri ike otu onwa igafe ma anyi ahughi ihe di etua ma mgbe obula ihe di etua  mere otutu umuakwukwo anyi ndi iwe naewe naakpochibido ndi nkuzi nulooru ha

otu o di inu maka okwu a aburula nke ebughariri rue nubochi nke iri abuo nonwa februwari nafo 2020 nomumatu ikpe ahu
ka o doro anya na okwu ahu agaghi enwe isi ndi sss naagba mbo inweta akaebe iji memina sowore

ogologo ajuju ahu banyere njiko di netiti sowore na ndi otu boko haram ipob na imn nke o goro ma gosie ike

O buru na onye noro n'okwa afo asato, akuzierela obodo ihe afo asato ma ka nkea gasiri, gaa n'ihu izi echiche ndi mmadu ihe n'otu uzo ma na-asi naani 'Nkea bu ekwensu si okummuo', kwa afo, n'afo asato n'okwa nakwa otutu afo ka ochichi gasiri na-asi nke a bu ekwensu ma otu ubochi o gbanwee ma si na nkea bu onye nzoputa unu, kedu nke n'ime abuo ndia bu akuko asi?

noge o di obasanjo kwuru na chukwu agaghi agbaghara ya ma o buru na o kwado atiku

o kwuru na ndi naebughari akuko ugha nwere nsogbu ogugu isi
o gara nihu kwuo otutu ihe merela ya etu ozi abughi eziokwu siri metuta ya si na o nula akuko banyere ya onwu ya otutu mgbe ma okwu ochi di iche iche nke o kwughi asiri na o kwuru
o gara nihu noge onyeisi gara aga o nwere okwu asiri na m kwuru nke si na o di onyeisiala jonathan mma iluta nwaanyi agughi akwukwo
e kwubeghi m ihe obula banyere ya ma nitinuanya lee ka ya okwu chere m nihu ugbua

ihe ndia niile naeme oge niile ma mu onwe m achoghi ileli ihe butere nkea

e kwusiela m ike na nkea bu ihe aga ewe dika okwu ekperima ma achoghi m ka ndi omebe iwu ojoo anyi were ohere mee udiri iwu ahu ha mere iji nye ntarahuhu di ike maka okwu akpomasi
a maghi m ebe o rurula ma ha ewepula ya ma obu na o di nelu tebulu onyeisi ala ma o nweghi ihe obula m kwuru nubochi taa nke aga ewe dika nke onye ahu enweghi uche
o buru na ndi mmadu choro obara ha banye boko haram o bughi iji ulo  omebe iwu eweputa ohere igbu mmadu maka ikwu uche ha dika khashoggi ka uche anyi di na nke ahu

o kwukwara mkpa o di ka ndi interpol na ndi ngalaba oti iwu mba uwa ka ha jikoo aka onu ibu agha megide akuko ugha
soyinka weputara oge ma kwuo okwu banyere ihe ekwumekwu putara ihe nke rotimi amaechi minista nke njem

ya mere otutu oge ulo mgbasa ozi nke naebi akwukwo naagba mbo isorita mpi nye mgbasa ozi nke ikuku ma nkea ekwesighi maka na enwere ugwu enwere ihe ituanya ma o gaghi ewute gi iweputa onwe gi dika onye di ukwu karia nke nta nke puru iru onye nta aka nsogbu nke obodo
aga eme elimozu pius adesanmi nubochi satodee
adesanmi nke amuru nonwa february 27 1972 bu onye dere akwukwo amaara nke oma bu naija no dey carry last mkpokota ederede nkato nke afo 2015
ezinaulo prof pius adesanmi nwuru anwu ekwuputala maka elimozu nwa afo naijiria nke guru akwukwo ndi kanada ode akwukwo onye edemede nke nwuru nabali nke iri nonwa maachi nafo 2019 oge ugboelu nke etiopia gbariri ka nwa oge o fepuru gasiri
adesanmi nke amuru nonwa february 27 1972 bu onye dere akwukwo amaara nke oma bu naija no dey carry last mkpokota ederede nkato nke afo 2015
adesanmi so  notu nime ndi french institute for research n africa site nafo 1993 rue 1997 na french institute nke ndida afrika nafo 1998 na 2000
malite nafo 2002 rue 2005 o bu osote okammuta na comparative literature na mahadum steeti pennsylvania  united states
nafo 2006 o sonyere mahadum carleton di n ottawa canada dika okammuta nke literature and african studies
o bu onye ntuziaka nke mahadum institute of african studies  rue mgbe o nwuru
ndi otu egwuregwu  na ndi nkuzi nke southampton gaatuko ego  maka okpu iteghete ndi leicester city gbara ha
southampton soro mpi nke ndi bu champions league city nagba nke ano na asomumpi ahu na tuuzude ma ha alaghachila ebe ahu na satode maka asomumpi premier league
ndi otu egwuregwu  na ndi nkuzi nke southampton gaatuko ego site nubochi furaide gara aga rue na ntoala ndi nso na mmalite nke igbaputa onwe ha site na mmeri nke okpu iteghete ndi leicester city gbara ha
asomumpi nke furaide nke manchester united ji okpu iteghete asaghi otu zi ipswich mmonwu na trafford ochie nonwa maachi nafo 1995 dika ndi kacha meri nakuko okike nke premier league

akwukwo

afunanya apughi izo eziokwu na ikwe onu ego nke onye ogbu mmadu di iche na nzobe ihe ngosi nke media
o nweghi ike ikwu ihe kpatara ndi dss jiri nwuchighari omoyele sowore nihe erughi awa iri abuo na ano a toghepuru ya

afunanya kwuru okara eziokwu nejemozi  nzuzo maka njepu ihere na akpoghi aha onyeisi dika ngosiputa ihere nke ike di okpokoro netiti ndi ohanaeze enweghi nchekwa
kedu uru nke ndapu mwuli agburu na mwuli ihuabuo nke ozi nzuzo bara nke na enweghi ike ime nchoputa otutu ajo otu dika boko haram na ndi ochi ehi fulani kamgbe tutu ha emenye obodo a egwu nahu
kedu ihe bu oru ndi dss mgbe ndi otu nzuzo naegbu onwe ha ma na ebute aghara na mba a kwa ubochi
gini mere dss ji lelie ulo omebe iwu na iwu anya ma ewepu mwehie oguguisi  nhazi na mwehie ihe nusoro kwesiri
oge eruola mgbe ndi ulo omebe ga elebanye anya niwu nke wubere dss maka inwe obi anuri  imegide umu afo naijiria
ndi dss kwesiri ka enwogharia ha maobu wepu ya kpamkpam na doputa ya nibu obere ngalaba nokpuru onyeisi ala no nochichi maobu mmadu ndi ji ike no nokwa di iche iche
ma ewepu ya umu afo naijiria gaeteta ura otu ubochi ma nu na ekperima ahu ewubela uloikpe nke aka ya ebe ha dss gaano mebige ndi naijiria ochichi onye kwuo uche ya na mmepe obodo

simi bu onye nke ekpere nuloikpe nego di naira nde iri ise maka mmebi site niji okwu joromi negwu ya ma dika aha otu nime egwu ya
joromi  bu aha egwu mbu nke uwaifo nyere egwu ya gara mba uwa nafo 1979
sowore mwakpo nke uloikpe mputara nke odida ochichi onye kwuo uche ya

o putala ihe kpomkwem
omoyele sowore
bbc
onyeisi mba nke africa democratic congress ralph nwosu akatoola mkpuru nke onye nkwuwa ochichi onye kwuo uche ya na onye nta akuko omoyele sowore ma kowaa ya dika mputara nke odida ochichi nke onye kwuo uche ya
ngalaba nke oru steeti anwuchighariala sowore nuloikpe nke okaiwu ijeoma ojukwu nubochi furaide gara aga nuloikpe di elu nke etiti nabuja ka o rubeghi awa iriabuo na ano atoghapuru ya
omume a aburula nke butere nkato site notu ime obodo na nke mba ofesi mana goomenti nke ndi naijiria siri na o metutaghi ya
site najuju onu nke punch nwosu kwuru ihe mere nuloikpe bu ezigbo mputara odida ochichi onye kwuo uche ya o bukwa ezigbo okwu nke ileanya nihu ma burukwa ileanya nihu nke onyeisi ana enyo enyo
ha ahula ihe ngosi naaribakwute anyi kamgbe otutu afo gara aga o bughidi nonwa olenaole gara aga ma naenye anyi mmasi di ukwu
o putala nuju ya

o kwuru obi bu m naani ekele etu ulo ikpe anyi siri mee ihe kwesiri site nitoghapu omoyele sowore

anwuchiri ya mgbe ya na ndi otu mipuru nihu ogu

o kwuru enweghi enyemaka ndi agha

netiti ndaghachi azu a ndi agha naeriju afo noge ogu ahu
nubochi nke iriabuo na asato nonwa disemba afo 2018 ndi nchekwa na emume mbaofesi nke ndi otu atumatu nke mbaofesi defence and foreign affairs of the international strategic studies association issa nke di na mba amerika kwuru na usoro agha nke di nugwu owuwa anyanwu nke naijiria bu nke gbadoro ukwu nure ndi agha na onyeisi ala buharinke ndi otu ya gbara gburugburuenweghi ibuso nsogbu ahu agha
issa otu nke goomenti enweghi di na washington nke nwere ikike naka mba uwa nihe banyere nchekwa mba uwa kwuru na ihe mpu di netiti ndi ochi agha nke onyeisiala muhammadu buhari bu ihe mere na naijiria naada nagha megide ndi boko haram
site na mkpesa naani agha bara uru ndi agha ndi naijiria naalu bu ikwusi igbasa ozi maka mpu nke ruru otutu ijeri dola iji zuta ihe nye ndi isi ochi agha na ihe erimeri ndi agha
nke kariri ihe obula achoputala na ndi ogu lake chad na ndi ahia nke mba ahu no nokpuru iswap ndi naagba mbo ka ndi achupuru nulo ha laghachi nulo ha
mana maka ndi ozoo bu ibu agha ma otutu oge  merie site naka ndi agha bu nke mere ka otutu choo ibanye
onye anabatara ohuru ma burukwa onye mba french kwuru okwu agamniihu nke iswap putara naani otu ihe allah nonyere anyi
onye ozo nke gbahapuru nnukwu azumahia nke ezinaulo ya na kano ibu onye ogu kwuru enweghi m uche abuo na ndu mmuo ozi so anyi alu ogu a ma obughi ya enweghi ihe ozo puru ikowa mmeri anyi
nihe emume ndi a ndi agha ndi naijiria aga aga nihu nusoro oguguisi nke gaebute odida ihere
maka goomenti nke mere onu etu ha siri nwee mgbochi nye iyi egwu ka o di ugbua o dila njo nke ukwu
mbo nke ndi nnyocha nooro onwe ha mere ichoputa usoro nke oguguisi aburula nke anabataghi
ndi oru ime obodo na nke otu mba uwa na ndi nta akuko nihi nkea enwetala mwakpo site naka ndi agha
nihi ihe ndi agha na-eme na mmegide ndi ruuru mmadu, gunyere idina mmadu n'ike, igbu mmadu n'uzo ikpe na-abughi ikpe, international atomic energy agency (IAEA) na otu ndi ozo na-ahu maka ihe ndi ruuru mmadu ka edobere ikpe ikpe.

na mwute peter afunanya bu onye mmeto aha nke dss site na nchekwa iberibe ya na nnukwu asi nke o tinyeworo nihe ngosi onyoonyoo di iche nke gosiputara mmeto nyere ulo ogbako nke ikpe na uloikpe di elu nke etiti di n abuja nubochi furaide  site naka ndi dss
afunanya apughi izo eziokwu na ikwe onu ego nke onye ogbu mmadu di iche na nzobe ihe ngosi nke media
o nweghi ike ikwu ihe kpatara ndi dss jiri nwuchighari omoyele sowore nihe erughi awa iri abuo na ano a toghepuru ya
dika enyi nnunu o bu afunanya liri isi ya na nke dss naja nekwughi okwu obula banyere onye nta akuko na ome nke ikike mmadu ahu anwuuru nbizarre nuzo ojoo
afunanya kwuru okara eziokwu nejemozi  nzuzo maka njepu ihere na akpoghi aha onyeisi dika ngosiputa ihere nke ike di okpokoro netiti ndi ohanaeze enweghi nchekwa
kedu uru nke ndapu mwuli agburu na mwuli ihuabuo nke ozi nzuzo bara nke na enweghi ike ime nchoputa otutu ajo otu dika boko haram na ndi ochi ehi fulani kamgbe tutu ha emenye obodo a egwu nahu
kedu ihe bu oru ndi dss mgbe ndi otu nzuzo naegbu onwe ha ma na ebute aghara na mba a kwa ubochi
gini mere dss ji lelie ulo omebe iwu na iwu anya ma ewepu mwehie oguguisi  nhazi na mwehie ihe nusoro kwesiri
oge eruola mgbe ndi ulo omebe ga elebanye anya niwu nke wubere dss maka inwe obi anuri  imegide umu afo naijiria
ndi dss kwesiri ka enwogharia ha maobu wepu ya kpamkpam na doputa ya nibu obere ngalaba nokpuru onyeisi ala no nochichi maobu mmadu ndi ji ike no nokwa di iche iche
ma ewepu ya umu afo naijiria gaeteta ura otu ubochi ma nu na ekperima ahu ewubela uloikpe nke aka ya ebe ha dss gaano mebige ndi naijiria ochichi onye kwuo uche ya na mmepe obodo

sowore mwakpo nke uloikpe mputara nke odida ochichi onye kwuo uche ya anyi ahula ihe ngosi ndia ka ha naaribata nonodu otutu afo gara aga o bughi onwa olenaole gara aga ma naenye anyi mmasi di elu

ngalaba nke oru steeti anwuchighariala sowore nuloikpe nke okaiwu ijeoma ojukwu nubochi furaide gara aga nuloikpe di elu nke etiti nabuja ka o rubeghi awa iriabuo na ano atoghapuru ya
omume a aburula nke butere nkato site notu ime obodo na nke mba ofesi mana goomenti nke ndi naijira siri na o metutaghi ya
site najuju onu nke punch nwosu kwuru ihe mere nuloikpe bu ezigbo mputara odida ochichi onye kwuo uche ya o bukwa ezigbo okwu nke ileanya nihu ma burukwa ileanya nihu nke onyeisi ana enyo enyo
ha ahula ihe ngosi naaribakwute anyi kamgbe otutu afo gara aga o bughidi nonwa olenaole gara aga ma naenye anyi mmasi di ukwu o putala nuju ya

ha anorola ninye nsogbu nafo 2018 niile

site naka otutu ndi ulo mgbasa ozi opekata mpe ndi agha otu puku aburula ndi egburu nafo 2018
ndi a nwuru aguru onu agunyeghi ndi egburu na niger republic yobe adamawa na odida borno
nezie o nwebeghi afo egburu ndi agha dika egburu nafo 2018 o bughi nafo 2013 na 2014 nke anyi ahughi udi ogbugbu anyi huru ugbuaka otu onye agha bu dibia bekee kwuru na maiduguri

o kwuru enweghi enyemaka ndi agha
nke di njo bu etu ndi iswap si agba mbo ihu na anyi matara nkwado ha maka ime mwakpo
o nweghi mwakpo obula mere nke anyi ahughi tutu o mee agbanyeghi nkea anyi enweghi enyemaka ka o kwuru nolu akwa
netiti ndaghachi azu a ndi agha naeriju afo noge ogu ahu

otu nwoke egbuola umuaka ya nawada
egwu ndi fulani naachi ehi ejidela otutu
charly boy ekwuola na o choro ndi ntoroobia puruiche maka ichi naijiria
charles oputa bu onye ejiri charly boy mara kwuputara iwe ya gbasara usoro ochichi goomenti naijiria
onye ama ama dika eze ndi ntoroobia na naijiria bu charly boy kwuru na obi adighi ya mma maka onodu naijiria
mgbe ndi bbc igbo gbara ya ajujuonu o juru gini mere o jiri buru ndi ojoo naachi naijiria
charly boy kwuru na o naacho ndi ntoroobia puruiche o gaakwado maka i were oche ochichi naijiria
obi naagbawa m kamgbe afo iri ato na ise gara aga na nzoputa naijiria gaabu maka ndi ntoroobia puruiche  dika charly boy kwuru
oscars 2018 kobe bryant so na ndi nwere ihe nrite
onye ogba basket boolu amerika bu kobe bryant e sorola na ndi ritelu ugo na ntuliugo nke ihe onyonyo a
kobe bryant onye egwuregwu boolu ndi amerika a ma ama
mmeri puruiche kobe bryant emeriela
n ihe itunanya mere ka kobe bryant bu onye a ma ama ka ogbaa basketboolu n amerika aturula ugo na ntuliugo nke ihe onyonyo a naakpo oscars
o ritere ihe a maka ihe onyonyo nke eserese nwaoge
lee ndi ozo nwere nrite na oscars e mere n onu ututu a
ndi mmeri
the shape of water nwere nrite nke best picture
frances mcdormand ritere nke a naakpo best actress maka three billboards outside ebbing missouri
onye ritere nke a naakpo best actor bu gary oldman maka darkest hour
guillermo del toro ritere nke a naakpo best director maka the shape of water
get out nke jordan peele mere ritere best original screenplay
oscars 2018 ihe ndi nkiri yi puta n ogbo
abali ihe nrite akacha ekwu maka ya na hollywood emela
lekwa foto ihe ndi mmadu yi puta na red carpet
danai gurira mere ihe nkiri black panther na walking dead gosiri ihe eserese n akuku isi ya
ihe nrite academy awards nke ama ama dika oscars nke ugboro 90 mere n abali ebe ndi mmadu gosiri ekike ha
lekwa ihe ndi naeme ihe nkiri yi bia emume a
daniel kaluuya
daniel kaluuya bu onye britain so mee ihe nkiri get out so na ndi a kporo aha inweta ihe nrite oscars
lupita nyongo
lupita nyongo nwetara oscars n afo 2012 maka ihe nkiri o mere nke a kporo 12 years a slave
jennifer lawrence
uwe jennifer lawrence bu onye mere ihe nkiri hunger games yiri akpuruakpu oscar naacha olaocha
andra day
andra day bu onye amerika naagu ma dee egwu dina ala na red carpet si ndi mmadu bia lere uwe ya
oscars 2018 ka o si gaa
black panther naewu ofuma
e gosiri afrika n emume mbido black panther
black panther kedu uma i bu na ihe nkiri a
tom holland
tom holland mere ihe nkiri spider man yi ezigbo uwe bia kpoputa aha onye nwetara ihe nrite n emume a
chadwick boseman
chadwick boseman bu eze tchalla nke obodo wakanda n ihe nkiri black panther yi uwe givenchy kwara bia oscars
ashley judd
ashley judd nke tinyere onu n ime okwu times up yi uwe naacha odoodo puta na red carpet
adam rippon
adam rippon n eme egwuregwu olimpiks bekee kporo figure skating mere ka ndi mmadu kpuru ya n onu ka o yi uwe nwere ihe e ji eke aji mere ka o di ka o si n ime ihe nkiri fifty shades of grey riputa
salman hayek
salman hayek yi uwe naacha odoodo puta
darrell brittgibson
ndi ose foto serela naaga ka darrell brittgibson mere ihe nkiri three billboards maliri elu na red carpet
whoopi goldberg
uwe whoopi goldberg yi n ahu di ka dragon eserese n ahu ya
patrick stewart
sir patrick stewart mere ihe nkiri xmen yi ntutu edere times up n uwe ya ka o nyere ndi ose foto nsusu
sally hawkins
sally hawkins onye britain so na ndi a kporo aha inweta ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri the shape of water o mere chisara ndi ose foto ochi
saoirse roman
saoirse roman mere ihe nkiri lady bird yi uwe pink puta na red carpet oscars ka afo 10 gachara oge mputa mbu ya n afo 2008 oge o ka bu nwata di afo 13
meryl streep
a kpoola meryl streep aha maka inweta ihe nrite oscars ugboro 21 kamgbe o bidoro ime ihe nkiri
margot robbie
margot robbie mere ihe nkiri tonya mara mma n ihe o yi puta red carpet
tiffany haddish
tiffany haddish kere ezigbote ekike onye afrika nke e ji mara umunwaanyi eritrea na ethiopia
foto niile a nwere ihe bekee kporo copyright
ihe ndi afrika ndi ozo ji kara naijiria mma n ihe nkiri
a bia n ihe nturugo kachasi ada uda n uwa ihe nkiri a kporo oscars ndi mpaghara afrika naegosi naijiria nari
akpuruakpu ihe nrite oscars
2018 a mere ya afo 90 a naeme nturugo oscars na hollywood
ka e mechara oscars nke bu emume nturugo kachasi ada uda nuwa ihe nkiri nke 2018 bbc igbo nyochara ma hu na ndi afrika ndi ozo ka ndi naijiria mma n ihe gbasara ihe nkiri
oscars 2018 n etiti afrika na ndi naijiria
bbc choputara na n agbanyeghi na ufodu ndi naemeputa ihe nkiri na ndi naijiria naetinye ufodu ndi hollywood n ihe nkiri ha o mebeghi ka ha soro na ndi a naakpo aha inweta nturugo obula na hollywood
nollywood bu ndi naemeputa ihe nkiri na ndi naijiria na mpaghara ndi afrika ndi ozo so na ndi a naanu aha ya ndi afrika ndi ozo egosila ha nkari
lupita nyongo bu nwa afo kenya bi n amerika nwetara ihe nrite nwaanyi kacha akwado ihe nkiri n afo 2013
n afo ole na ole gara aga a naahu naijiria di ka dike n ihe nkiri n afrika mana ugbua o di ka ndi ozo agaferela ha
ebe nollywood n onwe ha bu ndi no n okwa abuo n uwa ihe nkiri naemeputa ihe nkiri kariri 1000 n ime otu afo hollywood naemeputa ihe naerughi nke ahu mana o kwusighi ha ibu ndi uwa niile naele anya na ha kacha emeputa ihe nkiri kacha mma
mana a bia n ime afrika mba kenya na saut afrika naegosi naijiria nkari ebe o gbasara ihe nrite na nturugo oscars
isi n isi in saut afrika
ihe naakpa m bu nchekwa na akunauba obodo
etu ndi sineto si agbari ego naijiria
lee onye aka ya di nohi ofo ndi sineti
ntorobia ndi naijiria amaala buhari aka maka ikpo ha ndi umengwu
ntorobia ndi naijiria ekwenyeghi nihe buhari kwuru na chogm na ha di umengwu
muhammadu buhari
ndi naijiria naekwu na onyeisiala muhammadu buhari naawu ha nala na mba ofesi oge ufodu
ndi mmadu ka naetinye onu nokwu gbasara umengwu onyeisiala naijiria kporo ndi ntorobia
ka buhari gara london maka nzuko ndi ochichi mba ndi no nokpuru commonwealth nke a kporo chogm o kwuru na ntorobia ndi naijiria di umengwu
okwu a o kwuru atoghi otutu ndi naijiria ochi nke kpatara ha jiri gosi iwe ha nelu sosha midia
okwu ato buhari ji wuo ndi naijiria nala
iwe okwu buhari naewe ndi ntorobia
onyeisiala agaghi akoli umu naijiria onu
onye naekwuchitere onu buhari bu femi adesina kwuru na ndi naijiria ghotaghiere ihe o kwuru
ihe adesina kwuru akwusighi ndi mmadu ikwu ihe di ha nobi
lazynigerianyouths naewu
otutu nime ha gara nihu bido igosiputa oru aka ha ma naekwu na ha abughi ndi umengwu nagbanyeghi na ala naijiria adichaghi mma
otu onye ocha tinyere onu ya nokwu a
ufodu kwuru etu ha si jiri aka ha zuo onwe ha nuloakwukwo site na mbo ha naagba
ufodu kwuru na ha agaghi ebinyere buhari aka nafo 2019
otu onye ji okwu njakiri gosi onye nwere orusi ka naeji ya aru oru
onye gaabu onyeisi ohuru na commonwealth
ndi isi commonwealth naezuko ka ha wee choputa ma nwaeze wales a gaanochite anya nne ya dika onyeisi ngalaba ahu
ezenwaanyi elizabeth
ezenwaanyi mba england choro ka nwa ya nwoke charles nochie ya nokwa
ndi isi commonwealth naezuko ka ha kparita uka i choputa ma nwaeze wales a gaanochite anaya nne ya dika onyeisi gachi ngalaba jikotara obodo 53
ubochi tosde ka ezenwaanyi briten kpebiri na nwa ya charles gaachi otu akporo chogm na buckingham palace
o si na o bu mmasi ya ka nwa ya charles chia chogm otu ubochi
mana ya bu okwa abughi ihe ezenwaanyi naekenye nwa ya maoburu godu na o nwuo
a natu anya na ndi isi oche commonwealth gaekpebi maka onye gaachi ha ma ha zuko na windsor castle mana enwebeghi ihe gosiri na a gaekwuputa ya bu ihe na nzuko ahu
o bu naenweghi onye ozo nwereike ichi commonwealth
onye ntaakuko bbc bu james landale si na atuola aro ka okwa ahu naagaghari netiti ndi isi obodo no na commonwealth
mana onyeisiala saut africa cyril ramaphosa egbubirila ije ya na nzuko a naeme na london ka owere mara ihe kpatara mwakpo a naeme nobodo ya
mwakpo a naeme nugwu saut afrika ebe ndi ngaghari iwe naasi kaenye ha oru ulo obibi na nkwusi mmeruaka
kedu ihe bu oru onyeisi commonwealth
okwa nke ezenwaanyi briten no na ya di oke mkpa
ngalaba a naachikota mba iri ise na ato iji wee hu na ihe njirimara commonwealth bu ihe biara na mmezu
nke a gunyere ijikota mba ndi a site nazumaahia na mmekorita mba uwa niile
akuko gaamasi gi
chimamanda si na onwere onye wakporo ya
onyeisiala agaghi akoli umu naijiria onu
ntorobia ndi naijiria amaala buhari aka
onyeisi otu ndi a naeme njem nleta na mba niile no na otu ahu iji mee nkwekorita ahu guzosie ike
o bu ndi isi otu a naeme mkpebi onye gaabu onyeisi ha gbagburugburu
praim minista bu theresa may na praim minista mba canada bu justin trudeau akwadola okparaeze charles i bu onyeisi
gini bu chogm
chogm bu commonwealth of government meeting nasusu bekee
o bu ogbako ndi ndu mba ndi so notu commonwealth nke a naeme kwa afo abuo
ndi naeme ya bu ndi isiala na ndi praim minista mba di iri ise na ato na ndi ezinaulo ha ndi naekwuru ha okwu na ndi ntaakuko
ogbako nke afo mere na london ebe nke gara aga nafo 2015 bu na valletta di na malta
ego a naatu nimo agaghi aba akpa anyi  okwuchite onu rochas
goomenti imo steeti naekwu na atumatu utu a esighi ha naka mana ha gaeji naira nde iri akwado ya
rochas okorocha na eze ndi ogoni king godwin gininwa
agba ochichi rochas okorocha gaagwucha nafo 2019
ka akuko naakowa na goomenti imo steeti agwala ndi okenye niile tozuru i ruoru ha kwuo naira puku ato putara goomenti imo naakowa na o gbughi ha ka ego a di mkpa
ebere iwuji bu onye naekwuchite onu govano nihe gbasara mgbasa ozi gwara bbc igbo nekwenti na ugwo a bu ugwo a gaakwu nani otu mgbe
o kwukwara na a gaeji ego kwado oru di icheiche obodo ndi no nime imo steeti ji aka ha naeme
agbanyeghi na akuko naekwu na o nde naira isii ka eyiri otu obodo nzewuji siri na enweghi aha ego obula akporo makana o ndi bi na imi obodo ugbua kwesiri itu utu a
nzewuji si ego a gaghi abanye nakpa goomenti imo steeti o bu ngalaba obodo di icheiche akporo community government council cgc nwe ya
nzewuji gara nihu kwuo na goomenti imo steeti gaeji nde naira iri wee kwado obodo obula turu ego a ka ha naele anya na a gaeje ya hiba ulooru meputa ihe na ihe ndi ozo obodo choro
nzewuji said a nam eche na onye obula choro oganiru gaacho ikwado ya okachasi ebe ha naetinye aka nmbu na oru mmepe obodo nzewuji kwuru
nzewuji gakwara nihu kowa na onweghi eze obodo obula anapuru ogwo kwa onwa maka ihe a
gee nkowa ya nuju ebe a

ihe mere ndi naijiria ji enye otu uzo nuzo iri

akuko kachasi nabali a buhari bu nna naijiria
kedu otu pati ndi gaekpoko iwepu apc
ntuliaka 2019 naha asara oku dika ufodu pati naejiko naacho iwepu apc nochichi nafo 2019
olusegun obasanjo
olusegun obasanjo kwusiri ochichi nafo 1999
otutu ndi otu pati no nokwa ochichi akporo apc nakwa ndi onu naeru nokwu na ndi naijiria naagba mbo iwepu ochichi naka pati buhari na 2019
akuko naekwu na otutu pati nwereike imalite ijiko nizuka naabia iji wee kwusi mgbago obula na ntuliaka naabia nu
ndi gunyere na njikota pati a bu pati ndi a peoples democratic partypdp ufodu ndi isi na all progressives congress apc social democratic pati ndi obere pati ndi ozo ruru iri abuo na ato
nakwa coalition for nigeria movement cnm nke onye bubu onyeisiala naijiria bu olusegun obasanjo
a malitela otu njiko nke obasanjo
ntuliaka 2019 keyamo bu onye nkwuchiteonu buhari
buhari aga m azo ochichi 2019
apc were ochichi nafo 2015
ndi bubu onyeisiala na naijiria ndi isi agha lagoro ezumike nka gunyere onye agha ty danjuma naakwado mkpokoba a
nonu otu onye welitere isi na ya bu mkpoko nke a agaghi adi ka mgbanwo mutara pati apc
anyi anaghi ezigara ulooru inec aha mgbanwe
pati ohuru a gaenye onye o bula ohere ikwuputa obi ya
ndi no nuloomeiwu na ndi govano ruru iri na itoolu naakwadoka ya bu mkpokoba
pdp chiri naijirió afo iri na isii tupu apc anara ha ochichi
naka nke ozo pati pdp ka a naatule ma ha gaagbanwe aha pati ha
onyeisi pati ahu bu uche secondus kwuru na ya na ndi otu ya ka naatule ya bu echic
mana ndi mmadu naekwu na kama igbanwe aha pati pdp weputa uzo dimma di iche iche ha gaesi dozie ala naijiria ma wepu apc nochichi

ihe eji atu utu naira 3000 nimo
ndi naanata ogwugwo ejichiela ndi oru ahuike
ntorobia ndi naijiria amaala buhari aka
mmonwu wakporo ulouka fada ebube muonso
ndi naeti mmonwu wakporo ogbako ndi uka katolik nuke anambara steeti meruo otutu ahu ma mebie ugboala iri ato
ndi ntorobia naagba mmonwu
igba mmonwu bu emume omenala e jiri mara ndigbo
ndi mmonwu naeme emume uzo iyi nuke di nokpuru ochichi idemili not nanambara steeti wakporo ogbako ekpere ndi uka katolik ma mebie ihe kariri ugboala iri ato meruo otutu ndi mmadu ahu ebe e chere notu onye ha mara mma nwuru nubochi satode
onyeisi nchuaja ogbako ulouka catholic ahu bu fada emmanuel obimma nke a ma ama di ka ebube mmuonso na ndi ukochukwu ndi ozo na ndi umunwaanyi e chiri echichi biara ebe ahu gbalahuru ndi ntorobia ahu wakporo ndi gara ikpere chineke nuka ncheabali ha mere nabali fraide banye nisi ututu satode
onye nnyemaka ukochukwu bu francis okoye gwara onye ntaakuko bbc nekwenti na ndi mmonwu wakporo ebe ogbako uka abali ahu nihe dika elekere asato nke abali meruo otutu mmadu ahu ma mebie ihe ugboala kariri iri ato
aguleri na igboukwu abughi mbido ndigbo
otu nwoke egbuola umuaka ya nawada
mgbe ihe mechaziri anyi gukoro ugboala ha mebiri guta iri ato
ha meruru otutu ndi mmadu ahut t
o nwere otu onye ha suru mma e bugara ulo ogwut t
anyi amabeghi ma odi ndu ma o nwuru anwu
o were anya na ndi ntorobia uke mere ihe a kwadoro akwado imekpa ndi uka ahu nihi na a naeme uzo iyi
ha bidoro naeti ndi ji ugboala ebute ndi mmadu biara uka ihe naanara ha ego ha nakwa ekwenti ha
mmonwu mebiri otutu ugbola nogbako ahu
ndi oru nche anyi nwara ike ha ikwusi ha imebi ihe mana mgbe anyi huru na ihe naeme akariala anyi kporo ndi uweojiit t
ha biara nwuchie ufodu nime ha
ndi uweojii anambra steeti kwuru nezie na mmonwu wakporo ndiuka nuke mana ha kwuru na onweghi onye nwuru
onu naekwuchitere ndi uweojii na steeti ahu bu nkiru nwode gwara bbc na anyi nwuchiri mmonwu ato anyi naenyocha ihe mere ebe ahu
akuko kwuru na nke a abughi mbu ndi ntorobia obodo ahu naemekpa ndi naaga ogbako a puruiche ndi uka katolik naeme kwa abali fraide nke naadota ihe kariri puku iri abuo kwa izuuka
ndi no ebe ihe meere kwuru na ndi ntorobia obodo ahu naesogbu ndi okwougboala na ndiuka naanapu ha ego ma naetikwa ufodu ihe
na nsonso ha tiri onye oru fada obimma ihe nke mere ukochukwu ahu ji kpesara ndiuweojii ndi nwuchiri ndi ntorobia ahu ma ahapuru ha oge eze obodo na ndi okenye obodo gboro ogu
e boro ebubo na ndi ntorobia na emekpa ndi okwougbala naakwoga ndi mmadu uka ahu kwa mgbe

ezeife ndigbo gaaju buhari ozo
ezeife na ufodu ndi onu naeru nokw ekwuola na igwa igbo kwado buhari ka ha nweta okwa na 2023 bu okwu aghugho
chukwuemeka ezeife na okenye ndi igbo ufodu
chukwuemeka ezeifeonye igboukwu bubu govano na anambara steeti bu otu onye naekwuchitere ndigbo na naijiria
ndi nwere agba nala igbo ekwuola na umuafo igbo gaaju nkwado onyeisiala buhari na ntulika nke 2019 dika ha mere nafo 2015
ha doro ndigbo aka na nti ka ha mata na ngwa na o buru na ha kwado onyeisiala buhari ka o banye nochicihi ozo nafo 2019 na okwa onyeisiala gaerute igbo aka nafo 2023 bu nkwa a naekwe nwaanyi nelu akwa nihi na o bu okwu aghugho
na nsonso otutu ndi otu apc gunyere minista na ahumaka njem bu rotimi amaechi onye odeakwukwo nke goomenti etiti bu boss mustafa na kwa onyeisi ndi ulooru voice of nigeria nbu osita okechukwu gwara ndi igbo ka ha tunyere buhari naafo 2019 ka oke were rute ha na 2023
nye ndigbo onyeisiala 2019  balarabe musa
a naemegbu ndigbo ka ndi emeriri nagha
mana ufodu ndi nwere onu nigbo kwuru na okwu ahu bu okwu aghugho iji nweta votu ndigbo kwukwo na ndi dika buhari boro ndi igbo maka entinghiri ya akwukwo nafo 2015 na ha agahi enyere ya na ntuliaka 2019
na mkparitauka ya na ulooru ntaakuko sun nwere onye chiburu govano nanambara steeti bu dr chukwuemeka ezeife si a hughi ka o ga e si mee
echeghi na anyi kwesiri i naario ndi mmadu okwa onyeisiala
uche m bu na anyi gaaga rio chineke onye mara na o buru na onye igbo were okwa dika onyeisiala obi gaadi ndi fulani mma di ndi yoruba mma dikwara ndi mpaghara di ichiche na naijiria mma nihi na anyi gaahazighari onodu akunauba naijiria ka o ga nihu
ikwu maka 2023 bu okwu akwughi oto onye obula naekwu ya bu iji ghogbu ndigbo
notu aka ahu onye bubu onyeisi ohanaeze ndigbo bu dozie ikedife kwuru na ndigbo bu ndi ekwerela nkwa inweta okwa onyeisiala aputaghi ihe obuila noge gara aga
o gwara ulooru ntaakuko sun si e kwela ndigbo otutu nkwa di otu a noge gara aga aghogbukwara ndi be anyi
o buru na mmadu ghogbuo gi ugboro abuo ma o bu ato o bia nke ano i cheba echiche ime
ike ala a agwula mmadu
ikedife gara nihu kwuo si  ihe bu mkpa m bu otu a gaesi gbaso iwu na mkparitauka nweta biafra na alughi ogu maobu kpalia onye obula

soyinka saanu anya mmiri na 2019
wole soyinka
onye nwere nzere nobel bu wole soyinka ekwuola na ezi ochichi akpuola afo nala na naijiria
wole soyinka adoro ndi naijiria aka na nti ka ha
wole soyinka bukwa odee akwukwo a mara amara adoola ndi naijiria aka na nti ka ha saa anya mmiri ghara ikwe ka ndi ndoondoro ochichi ghogbu ha ozo na ntuliaka naabia nafo 2019
soyinka onye nke kwuru nke a ubochiuka nemume ncheta omumu onye okaiwu a mara amara nwuru anwu bu gani fawehinmi nke e mere na legos kwuru na obodo naijiria na ochichi onyekwuoucheya no na nsogbu ugbua
o si na ndi tinyere naijiria na nsogbu o no na ya ugbua site na atumatu ha e jikerela onwe ha ozo dika ndi nzoputa ka ntuliaka naabia ma duo ndi naijiria odu ka ha ju ndi ndorondoro ochie iji nye ohere ka ndi agba ohuru were ochichi
buhari na ndi isi otu apc enwela mkparita uka
wole soyinka chikotanu onwe unu onu ka okenye zuo ike
o siri a naghi enyo ya enyo na ochichi onyekwuoucheya no na nsogbu
o bughi soso ochichi onyekwuoucheya obodo anyi no na nsogbu
echeghi m na o nwere oge na ndu niile nuwa  okachasi nala a oge nchere ihe niile dakporo adako otu a
anyi niile maa nke a
ajuju bu anyi anaahu ya dika ohere nzoputa ka anyi a na ahu ya ha ohere i ga nihu naeme ihe ndi ahu mere na ala anyi na akpu afo nalat t
o bughi akuko ohuru mkpa o di imee ihe gaazo idikonotu ala naijiria t
o bu ihe mgbagwojuanya na ndi bu ndi iro ochichi onyekwuoucheya ndi ji aka ha webata atumatu nke butere anyi nonodu anyi no taa bu ndi putara na egosi onwe ha dika ndi nzoputa nke ala naijiria naele anya obodo nweere onuogugu mmadu nde 200
soyinka gara nihu duo ndi naijiria odu ka ha saa anya mmiri iji gbalahu
akuko ndi gaamasi gi
mmonwu wakporo ulouka katolik nanambara
umuaka ruru puku 88 nwere ike inwu noke aguu
benue ndi ochiehi egbuola mmadu 20
o gbara m gharii na ka a naekwu okwu izoputa ala naijiria otu otu maobu abuo putara ndi nwere ndi no nisi ya na esot t
a na ma agwa ndi mmadu ka ha naenyo ha enyo nihi ndi na awanye onwe ha na otu ndia bu ndi soro dowe naijiria na onodu ochichi onyekwuoucheya no taa
kedu ihe mere ndi naijiria agaghi nzuko mgbere namerika
goomenti naijiria agorola onu ha maka ihe mere na nzuko ndi choro itinye ego na naijiria na ndi minista nwere namerika
yemi osibanjo na abuja
yemi osibanjo so na ndi aha di nakwukwo eji hazie ha bu nzuko
otutu ndi naanochite anya goomenti naijiria aturuanya na ha no nogbako ulooru naahu maka naijiria na mba amerika haziri nobodo washington dc egosighi ihu na ya bu emume
obibia ndi goomenti ahu abiaghi mere ka ndi mmadu naenwe itunanya na naijiria agaghi enweta ntunye ego site na mba ofesi
ndi kwesiri iga ebe ahu gunyere osote onyeisiala bu yemi osibanjo minista naahu maka ego bu kemi adeosun minista nke mmanu agbidi bu ibe kachikwu minista nke oruugbo bu audu ogbeh minista nke tecknuzu bu ogbonnaya onu minista mgbasaozi bu lai mohammed minista nke okwute ndi bara uru bu kayode fayemi na minista nke mgbere bu okechukwu enelamah
utu anwuru na mmanya etinyela ego
switzerland ekwetala iweghachite ego abacha buuru
otu onye ihe a ndi goomenti mere naewute bu emir nke kano sanusi lamido bu onye ruburu oru ka onye nhazi uloaku ukwu na naijiria
ihe sanusi kwuru
sanusi kwuru na onye naakwado itinye ego na afirika o nwere naijiria onwere ghana o nwere ruwanda kenya na sawut afirika
o gakwara nihu kwuo naijiria nwere ike karia ndi ozo niile nitu mgbere mana o nwere ike si kama ya ga etinye dola 500 na naijiria ka m tinye dola 100 na ghana dola 100 na ruwanda dola 100 na code vuwa ka o nweta nrite mgbasa aka
anyi gara ka anyi na ndi nwere ego ha naetinye na mba mee nzuko anyi kwesiri ibido na elekere itoolu anyi wee bido na elekere irit t
mgbe m ruru ebe ahu ha kporo m ga nulooro onye naanochite anya naijiriat t
ndi biara nzuko ahu no ebe ahu osote onyeisiala anoghi ndi minista anoghi sanusi kwuru
sanusi si na ihe a mere adighi mma maka na o naegosi na naijiria adibeghi nkwadobe maka ihe a naekwu okwu ya
o kwuru unu kporo ndi mmadu ka ha bia nuru etu e si atu mgbere na naijiria mana unu abiaghi
obughi etu a ka esi enwete ndi gaetinye ego na naijiria
ya buru na o bu ndi ruwanda haziri ogbako a onyeisiala ha bu paul kagame gaano ebe ahu naagwa ndi mmadu biawa ruwanda
ndi mmadu tinyekwere onu nokwu a na soshal midia
onye nwere akara segunandrews kwenyere nihe sanusi kwuru
mana goomenti ekwuola na obughi etu a ka ha bu ihe siri ga
lai mohammed bu minista naahu maka mgbasaozi zipuru ozi naakowa na o bughi eziokwu na ndi kwesiri iga ya bu nzuko agaghi
mohammed naakowa na ndi minista aha ha di nemume a enwetaghi akwukwo e ji si ha bia ya maobu nodu na washington dc mgbe ogbako a naeme
o kwuru na minista oruugbo nke oku latrik na oru na nke okike ego naahazi enwetaghi akwukwo agbanyeghi na aha ha di nakwukwo ndi gaekwu okwu na ya bu ogbako
minista nke mgbere na onwe ya so onyeisiala gawa nzuko ndi naachi mba ndi so na commonwealth bi na london
minista naahu maka ego no na washington dc mana o bu maka nzuko ndi uloaku uwa na imf
o gakwara nihu kwuo na minista naahu maka mgbasa ozi na omenala nwetere akwukwo mana o zara ya were gwa ndi naahazi ogbako a na ya agaghi aganwu maka ihe ndi ozo aka ya di na ya
lai mohammed kwuru na ihe ndi a gosiri na e kwesighi ikwu na ndi minista ekweghi iga ya bu nzuko
ekwela ka igbo nwuo
ikeogu oke ritere puku dola 100 dika onye okachasi ede mbem na naijira nafo 2017
onye ritere ihe nrite dika onye bu okachasi nide akwukwo na naijiria nafo 2017 bu ikeogu oke ekwuola na asusu igbo agaghi anwu ma ndi igbo kpoo ya mkpa
ikeogu ritere ego puku dola 100 dika onye kachasi ede mbem na naijiria nke a kporo nigerian prize of literature maka akwukwo ya o kporo “the heresiad”
ihe mere akwukwo ahu odi iche bu na o dere ya nusoro ndi igbo ji agu mbem
na mkparita uka ya na bbc igbo nwere maazi oke kwuru okwu gbasara nchekwa asusu igbo na onye o chere na o kwesiri idi naka ya
goomenti etiti ekwuola ihe a gaeji ego abacha zuru mee
kemi adeosun bu minista naelekota ihe gbasara ego ekwuola ihe goomenti etiti gaeji ego abacha mee na naijiria
kemi adeosun na christine lagarde bu onyeisi oche na imf
goomenti ndi naijiria akwadola iji ihe kariri dolla nde dolla nari ato bu ego abacha zuru nke goomenti swiss weghachitere gaeme
minista naahu maka ihe gbasara ego bu kemi adeosun ekwuola na a gaeji ego ahu zuo ndi ubiam dika onyeisiala buhari kwere na nkwa mgbe o naazo ochichi
o kwuru nke a ebe o naezi ndi ntaakuko ozi na ngwucha nzuko ngalaba naeke ego nuwa niile bu imf naaha ichafu nke mere nobodo washington dc na amerika
adeosun si kwa naetinyela ego a nakpa puruiche nuloaku naijiria a kporo cbn naha ichafu iji bido meputa atumatu ndi gaenyere ndi ogbenye aka
utu anwuru na mmanya etinyela ego
ndi sineti akpoola onyeisi uloaku ukwu
na ozi o naagbasa o si na goomenti etiti nwere olileanya na ha meputa atumatu ha bu nobi nihe ga naadiri naijiria mma
nolu ya anyi tinye atumatu ndi a na mmeputa aku na uba obodo naijiria gaari elu

nwaafo igbo emeriela big brother naija
ndi naijiria agaghi nzuko namerika
ihe ato inwe otutu onu mgbanwe ego naebute

naira
efcc kwuru na umar cho nde naira iri
iji mee ka mgbanwe onu ego naijiria kwudosie ike imf aduola naijiria odu ka o jikota mgbanwe ego ya onu
naijiria nwere opeka mpe mgbanwe ego ise  otu maka ndi naatubata mmanu ugboala na naijiria otu maka ndi ukaalabukuba naaga njem okwukwe Mecca na saudi arabia otu maka ndi uka kraist naaga ala nso ozo maka ndi naagu akwukwo na mba ofesi na otu onu nke goomenti hiwere
dika ndi okacharamara nokwu akunauba bu pat utomi na uche uwaleke siri kowara onyentakuko bbc inwe otutu mgbanwe ego nwere oghom
lee ufodu oghom inwe otutu mgbanwe ego
o naebute mmeruaka
pat utomi kowara na o naeme  onye maa mmadu enwe ohere igote ego nonuala ma were ya tuo mgbere mana onye nwere mkpa ego ahu iji tubata ihe o gaeji meputa ngwa ahia nala anyi na amaghi mmadu o gaghi eru ya aka
odighi mma maka oganihu azumahia
ebe ego abacha gaaba
mgbanwe ego dola odaala nakuku naira
nokwu ya uche uwaleke nyere omumatu si dika onu ego mgbanwe nke goomenti bu n305 e resi mmadu nonu ahu o nwere ike hapu ihe a siri ya gote resi ya onye ozo n365 nweta omurunwa mana o buru na e nwere otu mgbanwe ego i gaghi enwe ike ireghari ya
o naemenyu oku itinye uchu na imeputa ihe n obodo
uwaleke siri na inwe mgbanwe ego di otutu naeme otutu ha di uwengwu
sooso ihe ha ga naeme bu ire ego di onuala agahi naenwe mmeputa ihe
o na eweda mmubanye akunauba obodo
utomi kwuru na o buru na ndi mmadu naenweta ego mgbanwe ego nonu ala iji ziga nwa ha obodo oyibo maka igu akwukwo o gaeme ka onye obula choo iziga nwa ya obodo oyibo ulo akwukwo ndi di nobodo anyi ga akpu afo nala
saraki na ekweremadu ihe ndi mmadu naekwu maka mgbochi ha
ekweremadu zoro akunauba ya
e tinyela udo naijiria naka ekweremadu ozo
ndi omeiwu sineti di mmadi 109 o buru na mmadu 108 no na be ekweremmadu ugbua o putara na ha niile no na be ya
cheta na uloomeiwu sineti kpebiri taa ka ndi oru nchekwa puo nulo osote onyeisi sineeti bu ike ekweremadu ozugbo ebe ha wakporo taa
e gbochiri ekweremadu iputa nulo ya nututu taa mere ka o ghara ibia nzuko ndi uloomeiwu ukwu mere taa ebe ndi omeiwu ruru 14 hapuru apc gafee pdp
uche anichukwu bu onu naekwuchitere ekweremadu gwara bbc igbo na ndi efcc gbochiri ya ipu nulo ya nabuja na o bughi dss dika anyi dere mbu
mrbanksomishore bu onye enyemaka puruiche nke bukola saraki deputara akwukwo ozi ndi efcc ziteere ekweremadu nututu a na twitter
nime akwukwo ozi ahu efcc kwuru na ha choro inyocha ekweremadu maka ikpa nkata mmeru ikike okwa ya nyere ya na ibupu ego nke bekee kporo money laundering
ka saraki banyere nuloomeiwu ma bido plenary
omeiwu sam anyanwu kwuru na ya na ekweremadu no unyaahu mana onweteghi akwukwo gosiri na ndi uweojii naacho ya
ka e mechara plenary
nututu a saraki so na ndi egbochiri ipu nezi ulo ya

o kwuru nke a site na akara twita ya bu mbuhari
ndi efcc gbochiri onuuzo ekweremadu nabuja
ihe onyoonyo naegosi ebe ndi efcc chewere nihu ulo ekweremadu

uloikpe ukwu amaala ndi toro ma gbuo fada john adeyi ikpe onwu site na nkwugbu
uloikpe enyela iwu ka akwugbu ndi omekome
ndi uloikpe ukwu di na makurdi benue steeti ekpebiela ka a kwugbuo mmadu abuo hartuna idi na suleiman gina bu ndi foro na ndi toro ma gbuo fada john adeyi rue oge ha nwuru maka ihe ha mere

o nwere mmuo bi na nwata bu isi dada puta uwa
ihe omenala igbo kwuru gbasara isi dada noge gboo na kwa ebumnuche sokwa ya ugbua
noge gboo igbo nwere nkwenye na ndi bu isi dada nwere ike ime anwansi
akwa nwata ohuru nulo obula naebute nnukwu onu nobi onye obula
mana o nwere ufodu ebe nala igbo ebe nwata ohuru a muru buru isi dada nwere ike ibute egwu
ndi obodo a dika igbuzoibusa nime delta steeti  ebe a naahu umuaka bu dada dika ndi puru iche
onye bu onye isi dada
akuko ufodu kowara na nwata a muru ohuru buru isi dada bu maka na nne ya rio otu mmuo bi nala a aririo ka o nye ya nwa
i gaegbu udiri ichi a egburu mgbe gboo
i ma chi ndi igbo naefe noge gboo
ha nwere nkwenye na isi dada bu akara ndi mmuo kara nwata ahu nke ha gaeji mara ya
ha naakpo umuaka a ezenwa
ha nwere nkwenye na isi dada ha bu okpueze ha
dika ka ha siri nwe nkwenye nwata buru isi dada gaabu nwata gaeme nke oma nuwa maka na chi ya kwusiri ike nakuku ya ha naesi ezigbo ike nakwa na ha gaeto buru dike naebute nnukwu egwu noge agha
mana otutu nsogbu naeso ndi bu isi dada
o naafiahu i lekota isi dada nke oma
nso sonyere nisi dada
otutu nime ndi obodo a nwere nkwenye na nwata buru isi dada gaaria nnukwu oria maobu nwuo ma o buru na mboisi banye na ntutu ya
o bu aru imetu aka na ntutu onye bu isi dada
onye obula mere udi ihe a kwesiri inye nwata ahu ego naka ngwa ngwa ma o bu kedo ego ayoro nisi ya
sooso emume a gaakwusi nwata ahu iria nnukwu oria
o bu sooso nne nwata ahu nwere ike imetu ntutu nwata a nwere isi dada aka
emume okpukpe ikpu isi dada
akuko kwuru na o bu ndi dibia naakpu isi nwata buru isi dada
ugbua ndi ama ama nihe onyonyo na kwa otutu mmadu ji isi dada eme inyanga
nwata ahu gaatoola eto buru nwata naekwu okwu
ezinaulo ya gaaju ya ihe o choro ka eji nwere kpu ya isi dada ya
ihe niile o choro nubochi ahu ka ha gaenye ya
uka kraist
ala igbo niile bu ebe okwukwe ndi otu uka kraist kwusiri nke oma
ihe a emeela ka otutu omenaala igbo gbanwe agbanwe

mana ha ka naakporo udi nwata ahu gawa ulouka ka ndi ukochukwu mere ya ekpere

ihe omenaala igbo kowara maka ndi isi dada

nonu okwu ya dada bu aha ndi yoruba nyere ya

ogwu codiene
umu ntorobia na anubiga ogwu codiene oke

mmachi codeine ogwu ukwara adaala onu
nafdac ebuliela mmachi emzor na ndi ozo

2019 election lee ufodu umuafo igbo choro izo okwa onyeisiala
gini kpatara ndi igbo ji agakari ulouka ndi a
ihe mere igbo ji achupu mmadu najo ohia
ajo ohia bu ebe igbo naefe ala mana o bu mmegbu ka ha naemegbu ndi ha supu nohia a
ndi mmanwu
igbo naefe mmuo di iche iche
gini mere igbo jiri kpo ajo ohia ajo ohia
i mara na ajo ohia ka noro ruo ugbua nala igbo
gini bu ajo ohia
okachamara nihe omumu gbasara afrika na asusu na mahadum nke lagos bu chiagozie nnabuihe kowara bbc igbo na igbo kporo ebe a ohia mmuo obughi ajo ohia dika otutu mmadu naakpo ya ugbua
dika igbo siri were nkwenye ohia mmuo bu ebe ha naefe chi biri nala
ebe a burukwa ebe ha naasupu onyeobula ala buru onu
nala igbo chukwu kachasi mkpa mana mmuo naeso ya bu ala
nnabuihe kowara na ala igbo were nkwenye na ala bu mmuo muputara ihe niile di nuwa
o nwere mmuo bi na nwata bu isi dada puta uwa
i gaegbu udiri ichi a egburu mgbe gboo
ala so njo njo ala bu igbuochu
igbo were nkwenye na ala naahu ihe niile nke a putara na onweghi njo obula i gaekpuchi nanya ya
ajo ohia ka di naala igbo ruo taa
ala gaaku onye a oria kpam kpam
lee oria ala naaku ndi mere ya njo

afo oziza
nziza dropsy
ibihernia
nnabuihe kowara noge ahu o nweghi dibia gaanwa anwa igwo oria ndi a anyi kporo aha
onye obula were udi oria kwesiri ikwuputa njoo o mere kpamkpam tupu o nwuo
o buru na o saghi asisa njo o mere ha gaasupu ya nohia mmuo
i ma chi ndi igbo naefe noge gboo
ihe ndi i naekwesighi ime nakuku onye igbo

ahmed musa otu al nasr anabatala ya taa
o teela aka a naanu kepu kepu na musa nwere ike igafe notu al nasr mana ugbua ekwuputala ya
ahmed musa
otu onye ndi mmadu chere na o gaabanye otu egwuregwu boolu gbalitere nokwa bu ahmed musa
mana ugbua musa kpara mkpamkpa nasompi iko mbauwa gwuru agwu esila notu leicester city gafee notu al nasr nke saudi arebia
amabeghi ego ole ha jiri zuo ya naka ndi leicester city mana a naanu kepu kepu na o ruru nde pounds iri na asaa na okara
i ma umunwaanyi ji ndi super eagles noru
ndi super eagles dizi ka nwunye ohuru a choro ilu
world cup 2018 ihe mere ndi naijiria ji ekele ahmed musa
leicester city zuru ya mbu naka otu cska moscow nafo 2016 mana o laghachiri ebe ahu noge boolu nke afo 2017 gara aga
ka agbachara iko mbauwa ndi mmadu chere na o gaaga galatasaray maka na ndi naakwado otu egwuregwu ahu kporo ya oku nke ukwuu
ihe onyonyo di nelu naegosi etu otu ohuru ya siri si ya nnoo ma nabata ya nime otu ha
ka o di ugbua ahmed musa ekwubeghi ihe obula maka okwu a naewu ewu
babatunde fashola si na ndi naijiria na ayoribazi egwu maka oku latrik
yaburu na ihe babatunde fashola kwuru maka mmeputa oku latrik bu eziokwu o gaabu nnukwu ihe nye ndi ojiegochuego na naijiria
odu anu
otela ndi naijiria naeti mkpu maka oku adighi
minista naahu maka oku oru na ulo bu babatunde fashola kwuru na oku latrik a naemeputa na naijiria agbagotela ruo megawatt puku asaa
fashola kwuru nke a na kalaba isi obodo kros riva steeti unyaahu
oku latrik agaghi enwu ofuma ruo afo 2023  ndi oru latrik
phcn kwesiri inye gi onwa ato tupu ha achabie oku  okaiwu
fashola no na kalaba ebe ndi isi oru na ngalaba o naachi naeme nzuko
o kwuru na agbanyeghi na oru foduru ka nku ngalaba ya agbanyela onodu oku latrik na naijiria karia etu o di mgbe ha malitere oru nafo 2015
fashola ji ngalaba ato achikotara onu na goomenti buhari
afo ato gara aga akuko bu na mmeputa oku latrik bu nnukwu nsogbu anyi nwere na naijiria
mgbe ahu ndi naeke oku naekwu na ha enweghi nke ha gaekenye umu naijiriat t
mgbe ahu anyi naeke megawatt 2690 nye ndi naijiria mana akuko ahu agbanwela
ihe anyi nwere ike ugbua bu megawat 5222 nke bu nke kachasi kamgbe naijiria putara
ugbua ihe a naemeputa bu megawatt 7000 ma naekekwa 7000t
nsogbu ka dikwa mana anyi gaekwu na anyi naaga nihut t
akuko ndi gaamasi git t
nye nwa gi ohere ka o mita arat t
ndi igbo naazo eze na kanot t
a gbagbuola ndi naagbanwe ego mmadu ano na port harcourtt t
uzo i gaeji mee umuaka gi obi anuri noge ezumiket t
ma iji ego ma ijighi ego lee ihe ufodu gi na umu gi nwere ike ime noge ogologo ezumike at t
umuakwukwo na oprah winfreyt t
oge eruola ozo mgbe ndi umuakwukwo nwere oge ezumike puruiche maka na o di ogologot t
ufodu ndi nne na nna akwadola etu ha gaesi kpoga umu ha uloakwukwo nke a kporo summer lesson mana o bughi umuaka niile ka nke a gaamasit t
o buru na i sonyeghi na ndi gaakpoga umu ha summer lesson
umu nwaanyi choro ka goomenti kwuwa ha ego omugwot t
akpokputala umuaka 4 nime 12 bu ndi toro nime ogba thailandt t
buhari buo agha megide mwakpo umuakat t
kuziere ha etu e si egwu mmirit t
igwu mmmiri bu uzo umu gi gaeji megharia ahu ma muta i zo onwe ha ma ha danye nime mmirit t
o gaemekwa ha ka ike gwu ha ofuma ka ha nweike rahu ura ofuma ma too ofumat t
gbalia kpoga ha taat t
kuziere ha eserese nakwa nka na uzu ndi ozot t
kuziere ha etu esi agba egwut t
igbo kwenut t
o nwere egwu kariri egwu ogenet t
mbat t
anyi a gaakuziri umu anyi yat t
eeeeeeet
koro ha akuko oge gboot t
i ma ubochi mbu aturu ogbunigwe nala igbot t
i ma aha nwoke mbu si noru toghapu onwe yat t
i nwere ike i maata nke a ma kuzikwara umu git t
otu uzo i gaesi mee nke a bu i kporo ha gaa nulo ngosi di icheiche nala igbot t
akaorut t
kporo ha gaa ebe ha gaamuta oru akat t
nke a gaeme ha muta aka oru nwere ike i nye ha nri nodinihu ma oburu na ha enwetaghi oru na ngwucha mahadumt t
otu ogbot t
na ngwucha o buru na i bu onye omenala naamasi nke oma oge ezumike ogologo a bu mgbe i nwere ike iji tinye ha na mmanwu maobu otu ogbo nobodo unut t
nke a gaeme ka ha nwee ezigbo amamihe ako na uche banyere omenala igbo nakwa nebe o siri iket t
akuko ndi gaamasi git t
nye nwa gi ohere ka o mita arat t
ihe mere igbo ji asupu mmadu najo ohiat t
nwaanyi toro onwe ya ebe ura buru onye ntoo ozo nuru tramadolt t
ndi okammuta ekwuola na o bu oke mpu butere otutu ihe ojoo gunyere uzo nto ohuru ji eme na naijiriat t
edgal imohimit t
komishona ndi uweojii na legos steeti bu edgal imohimi kwuru na ha ebelatala ike ndi otu badoo naakpa nikorodut t
ndi uweojii nwuchiri nwaanyi toro onwe ya iji nata di ya nde naira 15 na ogun state
ozo aka kpara onye ntoo ebe o gara itoro mmadu ma ura buru ya ka o nuchara ogwu ike tramadolt t
mana ndi okachamara nihe gbasara omume ndi mmadu bu psychologist na bekee naekwu na udi agwa bu oke mpu na ajo enyi bu ihe kpatara yat t
a gbaputala nna mikel obi naka ndi nto ozokwat t
femi joseph na ndi otu ya ji egbe wakpo odoahia ogwu itoro onye nwe ya mana ura buru joseph ka o nuchara tramadol e nwetara nulo ahia ogwu ahut t
di okpa ahu kowara na oge ha batara onye nwe ulo ahia ogwu ahu tiri mkpu ma si uzo azu ulo gbaa osot t
dika onu naekwuru ndi uweojii na ondo steeti si mana dika ha enwetaghi ihe ha choro otu nime ha bidoro sowa gani gani nihi tramadol o nuru
o rahuru ura awa 24 ka o nwuchara ya
e nwetakwara mkpo tramadol nakpa ya
naka nke ozo otu nwaanyi aha ya bu hadijat kabir na mmadu abuo ndi ozo gunyere otu nwoke na nwaanyi ozo kpara nkata aghugho na ndi ntori ji ya ma naa di ya ihe mgbaputa nde naira 15
komishona ndi uweojii na legos steeti bu edgal imohimi kwuru na o bu mkpesa di ya wetara mere ka ha bido nyocha were choputa na o bu nwunye ya na ndi omekemo kpara nkata ahu
okammuta nihe gbasara omume mmadu nakwa onye nkuzi nebonyi state university bu nnachi amos kwuru na o bughi isi mmebi kpatara udi akwa kama ihe ojoo bara uba ugbua
ufodu bu mkparita ojoo site na inwee ajo oyi
ogbo ya no na federal neuropychiatric hospital di na yaba steeti legos bu chinyere okonkwo kwenyere nihe amos kwuru

green revolution ihe ndi shagari meputaara umu naijiria
etu i gaesi gbanahu mwakpo na mmemme
second niger bridge dika nkwa e kwere nwaanyi
igbo tradition ihe mere e ji alu nwaanyi nozu nala igbo

nwoke na nwaanyi jiko aka
igbo adighi anabata nwoke na nwaanyi ibi naalughi alu
a naenwetakari akuko gbasara ufodu ndi ntorobia maobu agboghobia huru onwe ha nanya ma kwekoritara ibikota onu dika di na nwunye mana ha emeghi omenala alumdinanwunye dika ha kwesiri
a naahutakwa mgbe ufodu ihe mberede di iche iche nonodu a okachasi nwaanyi ino nulo nwoke ahu nwuo naenweghi mmemme alum obula emere nuzo omenala
echichi nwaanyi nala igbo
ihe ise masiri umunwaanyi
omugwo o bu omenala gaakwusi nala igbo
ka o sila di nke a naetinyekari ezinaulo di iche iche na gbagharia
nihi ajo onodu a ufodu obodo di nala igbo mere ya ka o buru iwu na nwoke gaalu nwaanyi ya na ya bi nozu bu nke o naemeghi mgbe o di ndu
ihe mere eji alu nwaanyi nozu
nala igbo anaghi ekweta na nwoke aluola nwaanyi maoburu na o mezubeghi ihe nisi ya
o burugodu na o mere nke uloikpe a turu anya na o gaabia mekwaa ihe dika ndi nwe nwa siri choo
dika okachamara nokwu gbasara omenala bu nze olueze ukaejuoha duruagwu nke abuo numuakara isu di na nwangele nke imo steeti siri gwa bbc igbo iwu a di ezigbo ire nobodo ha bukwa nke nwere ntaramahuhu di iche iche so ya
onye nalughi na ndu o lu o nonwu bu usoro otutu obodo si eme
mana nobodo akokwa dikwa nimo steeti atumatu a adighi ire obula ebe ezinaulo muru nwaanyi naabia eburu ozu nwa ha ma gaa lie nulo ha
usoro esi alu nwaanyi nozu
onye ahu gaabia gwa ndi mu nwa na nwa ha nwere ahu oku o gaghi ebu uzo agwa ha na o nwuola
ha gaeso ya gaa leta nwa ha mgbe ha huru ozu ya ha gaebo nke nwoke ebubo na o bu ya gburu nwa ha nke gaeme ka o gowa ukwu na aka ya
iji gosi na o bughi ya gburu ya o gaekwenye ilu ozu nwaanyi ahu
o gaabia luo ya
o gaabiaghachi gwazie ndi mu nwa na nwunye ya anwuola
nwoke ahu gaagazi nihu mee mmemme akwamozu ya
ihe gaeme onye juru ilu nwaanyi nozu
dika nze ukaejuoha siri kowaa ihe ndi a bu ihe gaeme onye juru ilu nwaanyi omeghi ihe isi ya nozu
onye ahu gaenweta ntaramahuhu nuzo di iche iche
ihe ojoo dikwa iche iche naezute onye ahu
ihe anaghi agara onye di otu a nke oma
onye ahu nwekwara ike inwu onwu ihere
mana onye ahu nwere ike icheghari tumadu ma o buru na ihe ndakwasi niile a bido idakwasi ya
ihe onye ahu gaeme ma o chegharia
o buru na nwoke ahu kpochiri nti ma mechaa chegharia nihi ihe mkpobi ukwu o naenweta ihe ndi a ka o gaeme
onye ahu gaezite ndi okenye obodo ha ka ha bia mee ka ala daa juu
a gaenye ya ntaramahuhu site nihu na o mezuru ihe ndi o kwesiri ime nuzo okpuku abuo
nigeria 2019 elections njirimara ndi naazo oche onyeisiala – muhammadu buhari
onyeisiala naijiria bu muhammadu buhari naazo okwa dika onyeisiala nke ugboro abuo ya nime ochichi onye kwuo uche ya nokpuru pati naachi
president muhammadu buhari
onyeisiala muhammadu buhari naachu nta vootu ugbua iji buru onyeisiala naijiria nke ugboro ato
o bu uzo bata ochichi nonwa disemba 1983 1984 ka ndiagha ndi naijiria nara ochichi nike mana ufodu ndi agbatobi ya chuturu buhari nike nafo 1985
nruritauka bbc ka naaga nihu ugbua
buhari mechara buru onyeisiala site na ndorondoro ochichi onye kwuo uche ya naafo 2015 ka ogbara mbo inweta ya bu oche ugboro ato nefu
dika mgbe o naachi dika onyeagha buhari enweghi ezigbote aha banyere ikike diri onye
agbanyeghi naano nochichi onye kwuo uche ya otutu mmadu no na mkporo maka buhari ekweghi ituhapu ha dika uloikpe si ka eme
nwoke a di afo 76 nuru iyi oru nafo 2015 ma kwe nkwa na ya gaebuso agha megide mpu na nruruaka na ogbaghara nakwa kwalite akunauba niger
afo ano naabia na ngwucha mana otutu ndi mmadu ekweghi na ihe o mere putara ihe anya naahu
okwere nkwa na ya ga emeri boko haram naagha naijiria naebuso ndi a choro ikewaputa mba ofufe alakuba na owuwa anyanwu ugwu naijiria mana na nso a ndi a naakpazi ike naenye ebumnobi buhari inodu noche onyisiala nsogbu site netu ha si awakpo mpaghara ahu
ndi onu ha naeru nokwu kwenyere na buhari gaezute ezigote ogu naka pati naanoghi nochichi aha ha naada uda karia  onye bu okoloto pdp bu atiku abubakar bukwa onye ofufe alakuba ma sikwa ugwu naijiria dika buhari
buhari bu onye buu okoloto all progressives congress apc nwere aha dika onye aka ya kwu oto nime di ndorondoro na ndi naijiria agbanyeghi na otutu mmadu naahu achumta vootu ya ka ihe naegosi mkwafu akunauba
akuko ndi gaamasi gi
o foro obere ka egwu eke ii loo nnamdi kanu  buratai
obi esighi m ike maka mpu nime ntuliaka 2019  atiku
nigeria election 2019 ndi naazo ntuliaka na osote ha
i ma mmadu isii kacha puta ihe nime ndi naazo okwa onyeisiala na ntuliaka 2019
bbc gaagba ha nanwu
ndi naazo okwa onyeisiala
lee mmadu isii naazo okwa onyeisiala ndi mmadu kacha anu aha ha na ndi osote ha
ka otu naahu maka ntuliaka na naijiria bu independent national electoral commission inec biputara akwukwo gosiri na ihe kariri mmadu iri asaa naazo okwa onyeisiala na 2019 bbc igbo choro igosi gi ndi nke aha ha kacha ada uda
nkwado ntuliaka nowuwa anyanwu ebirila oku
agaghi m adi ka tinubu igwa ndi mmadu onye ha gaatunyere
peter obi agaghi enye gi ego mana o gaakwado oru obula ziri ezi
nime mmadu isii a na ndi osote ha e nwere umunwaanyi ato nime ha otu naazo onyeisiala ebe ndi ozo naazo osote
1 muhammadu buhari na yemi osinbajo
buhari na osinbajo achiala naijiria kemgbe afo 2015 nokpuru pati all progressives congress apc
onye bu muhammadu buhari
a muru ya nubochi iri na asaa nke onwa disemba afo 1942
o chiala naijiria ugboro abuo dika onye agha nakwa onye nkiti
o zoro okwa onyeisiala ugboro ato 2003 2007 na 2011 tupu o zota ya nafo 2015
notu aka a o bu onyeisiala o bukwa onye minista naahu maka mmanu amiputara nala
onye bu yemi osinbajo
a muru ya nubochi asato nke onwa maachi afo 1957
o bu ukochukwu nuka redeemed christian church of godrccg
o zotara okwa osote onyeisiala buhari nafo 2015
o bukwa okaiwu onu naeru nokwu
2 atiku abubakar na peter obi
atiku na obi naefe okoroto peoples democratic party pdp na ntuliaka 2019 a
onye bu atiku abubakar
a muru ya nubochi iri abuo na ise nke onwa novemba nafo 1946
o bu osote onyeisiala site nafo 1999 ruo 2007
o zoola okwa onyeisiala dika onye bu okoroto pati ya ugboro abuo nafo 2007 nokpuru ac nakwa 2018 nokpuru pdp
o bu onye achumnta ego nwere otutu azumahia di iche iche
onye bu peter obi
a muru ya nubochi iri na itoolu nke onwa julai nafo 1961
o zotara govano anambara steeti nokpuru pati apga nafo 2003 mana o rigoghi noche ruo maachi 2006 mgbe o meriri nuloikpe mana e mechara chutuo ya nonwa novemba afo ahu
o mechara loghachita noche ya na februwari 2007 ma puo na mee oge andy uba meriri ya mana ulo ikpe kwuru ka a hapu ya nozuo afo ano ya
o rituru noche dika govano anambara nafo 2014 ka o chizuru ugboro abuo
o bu onye okachamara nihe gbasara akunauba
3 oby ezekwesili na abdul ganiyu galadima
galadima bukwa onyeisioche otu pati allied congress party of nigeria acpn ha choro iji zota ochichi
onye bu oby ezekwesili
a muru ya nubochi iri abuo na asato nke onwa epreelu 1963
o bu minista naahu maka ihe e gwuputara nala site na 2005 ruo 2006 nakwa nke agumakwukwo site na 2006 ruo 2007
o so hibe otu bring back our girls bbog naahu maka umuaka chibok a tooro kemgbe afo 2014
o merie o gaabu nwaanyi mbu gaabu onyeisiala na naijiria
onye bu ganiyu galadima
a muru ya nubochi iri na otu onwa jun nke afo 1964
o guru akwukwo na mahadum kwara steeti ebe o mechara buru otu onye nime otu ndi naachi nulo akwukwo ahu
o bubu onye zoro oche onyeisiala nokpuru pati acpn nafo 2015
o bu onye ojiegoachuego
4 kingsley moghalu na umma gesto
moghalu na gesto naazo okwa nokpuru pati young progressive party ypp
onye bu kingsley moghalu
a muru ya nubochi asaa nke onwa mee nke afo 1963
nke a bu mbu o naazo ndorondoro ochichi naijiria
o guru akwukwo ma nata asambodo dika okaiwu na mahadum
o bukwa onye okachamara nihe gbasara ichekwa akunauba
o ruru dika directon nuloaku etiti nke a kporo central bank of nigeriacbn na bekee
onye bu umma gesto
a muru ya nafo 1981
o bu osote onyeisioche otu pati ha bu ypp
o bu onye ojiegoachu ego nakwa onye naagba mbo nihe gbasara ikike ruuru umunwaanyi
5 omoyele sowore na rabiu ahmed rufai
sowore na rufai naazo okwa nokpuru pati african action congress aac
onye bu omoyele sowore
a muru ya nubochi iri na isii nke onwa februwari 1971
o bu onye naebu ihe gbasara ikike diri onye nisi
o malitere ya oge o ka no na mahadum
o hibere ulooru ntaakuko sahara reporters
o hibere otu pati aac nonwa ogostu nke 2018
onye bu rabiu ahmed rufai
a muru ya nubochi iri na asaa nke onwa julai 1976
o bu dibia bekee maobu dokinta bu okachamara nihe gbasara ahu ike
o kuziburu nkuzi na mahadum bayero di na kano
6 fela durotoye na khadijah abdullahiiya
durotoye na khadijahiya naazo ochichi nokpuru pati alliance for new nigeria ann
onye bu fela durotoye
a muru ya nubochi iri na abuo nke onwa mee nafo 1971
o gara mahadum obafemi awolowo di nobodo ileife
o bu onye naakuziri ndi mmadu etu e si eji ego achu ego ma burukwa onye naeji okwu akpalite mmuo ndi mmadu
o naazo okwa onyeisiala nokpuru pati alliance for new nigeria ann
onye bu khadijah abdullahiiya
o bu onye hibere otu naahu maka nlekota umunwaanyi bu women community of africa wca nakwa rags to riches r2r
o bukwa onye okaiwu
kedu onye i gaatunyere
imo election results ihe asaa gbara okpurukpu uche nwosu kwuru
naani uche nwosu biara nruritauka bbc igbo mere maka okwa govano nowere imo steeti
igbo juru nowere mgbe bbc igbo mere nrurita uka nke ndi naazo okwa govano nimo steeti mana o bu ihe turu ndi imo nanya na naani otu onye nime mmadu ano kwesre bbc igbo nkwa na ha gaabia nrurita uka ahu bu ihe biara ya
onu naekwuchitere ndi apc nimo steeti agbasola uche nwosu
imo apc primaries a kpoputala uche nwosu dika onye gaazo okwa govano imo
ndi a tere ndi imo unyi nihu bu emeka ihedioha pdp hope uzodimma nke apc na ifeanyi ararume nke apga
onyeisi bbc igbo bu adline okere si na o bu sooso ararume bu onye gwara ya na ya nwereike ghara abia maka na ya naamalite achum nta vootu ya
ya bu emume bidoro ka o ji okara gacha elekere abuo nehihe
na nruritauka ahu sooso ya biara uche nwosu kwere nkwa na ya gaakwu puku naira iri ato dika ugwu onwa opekatampe ma o buru na goomenti etiti hibe ya
nwosu gakwara nihu kwuo na pati ya enweghi onye naazo onyeisiala ka o tinyere onu nokwu banyere nkwado o naenye onyeisiala muhammadu buhari
ihe ozo o kwuru bu o nweghi ihe o bula no na manifesto m agaghi eme
okwu asaa gbara okpurukpu uche nwosu kwuru
uche nwosu si apc banye otu aa iji zoo okwa govano nowere imo steeti
nwosu kwuputara ihe o gaemere ndi steeti imo ma o were okwa ochichi na ntuliaka a gaeme nonwa maachi afo 2019
buhari for president otu aa nwere ike ipiasu uche nwosu
o bughi eziokwu na action alliance akwughi uche nwosu obidiche nazu
ngwa lee ihe ndi o ruturuaka na nkeji na nkeji
a ga m eweta agumakwukwo bu igba site na mgbako aka ndi uka
a ga m eme ka ahuike buru nefu maka umuaka umunwaanyi di ime nakwa ndi okenye
a ga m eme ka ndi ntorobia bata noruubi
a maara m nke ekwe naaku nihe gbasara okwu ochichi
a ga m eme kai he ndi e ji ebi ndu baara ndi imo uba
a ga m akwu ugwo onwa opekatampe puku iri naira ato ma goomenti etiti kwuputa ya
a ga m eleba anya nihe gbasara ugwo ezumike nka
akuko gaamasi gi
uzodimma ihedioha na ararume abiaghi nruritauka bbc igbo
atiku bata amerika o nwere ajuju o gaasa anyilai mohammed
ihe umu naijiria naekwu maka njem atiku na mba amerika
atiku abuja kporo oku dika atiku lotara njem amerika
akuko maka nlota atiku abubakar oku gbara ulooru mmeputa mmanya guinness onyeisiala buhari na akunauba ndi ndorondoro akuko onnoghen ihe mberede mexico na ndi ozo so
akuko di mkpa
ndi otu pdp na ndi ihe atiku abubakar naamasi putara nigwe odu ugbo elu nnamdi azikiwe di nabuja iji nabata abubakar onye gara mba amerika
atiku na onyeisi uloomeiwu naijiria bu bukola saraki soro mee njem abali abuo na mba ahu ebe dika atiku siri kowa ya ndi oru goomenti mba ahu na ndi ojiegoachuego nwere ogbako
atiku gaesonye na ndoritauka nke ndi naazokwa onyeisiala gaeme nabali satode na abuja
oku gbara nulooru mmeputa mmanya guinness
oku gbara ulo mmeputa mmanya nke ulooru guinness nosisioma industrial layout aba abia steeti ubochi fraide
oku ahu nke gbara rue awa isii bu ndi ulooru naemenyu oku nakwa ulooru ndi ozo no nso ndi uweojii na ndi obodo ahu nyere aka gbanyuo ya
onu naekwuru guiness bu nike onakoya gwara bbc igbo na oku ahu emerughi mmadu ahu nke o na emebei nnukwu ihe
o kwukwara na oru mmeputa mmanya ha ka di ire n odo ha di na benin nakwa ogbalagos breweries
o nweghi ihe mmeru ahu maobu nnukwu ihe mebiri site nihe mere dika ogba nke aba bu maka mgbari oru ma nwekwa naani ndi oru mmadu ole na olet t
ebe anyi jiri mere ebe mmeputa manya bukariri na odo anyi di na benini nakwa ogba legos
o bu akuko ugha na a choro inwuchi onnoghen
femi adesina bu onye ntaakuko ama ama tupu oruwa nulooru onyeisiala
ulooru onyeisala agoola si na akuko na goomenti choro inwuchi okaikpe ukwu naijiria bu jostis onnoghen bu akuko ugha

buhari kwuru nke a na kaduna bu ebe ogara achumata vootu unyaahu
o si na atumatu bu maka na ya achoghi ka eme ihe o si na emere na afo 1985 bu enyeghachi ndi a akunauba ha
ndi ulooru okwaiwu ukwu naijiria amalitela njem ichutu onnoghen

onye chiburu naijiria bu olusegun obasanjo ekwuputela otutu ihe naewute ya maka etu ihe si kwuru na ndi naijiria ugbua na ihe o choro ka umu naijiria mee gbasara ya
obasanjo
olusegun obasanjo ekwuola na o cheghi na inec gaeme ntuliaka kwu oto nonwa naabianu
o burugodi na ha choro ime ntuliaka kwuoto ndi no nochichi ugbua agaghi enye ha ohere
a malitela otu njiko nke obasanjo
atunyerela goomenti a na 2019  obasanjo
obasanjo kwuru nke a mgbe o naaguputara ndi ntakuko akwukwo o deputara akporo points for concern and action nulo ebe o naedowe akwukwo na abeokuta
o kwuru na ihe naijiria choro ugbua bu onyeisiala nwere uche zuruoke ma sikwa ike ichi obodo
obasanjo kwuru ka umu naijiria too obere ihe buhari meere ha kamgbe o no nochichi
nokwu ya buhari alafu go anyi na mbu anyi gaabu ewu maoburu na anyi kwe ka o rafuo anyi ozo
o were ochichi buhari tunyere nke onye agha ji aka ike chi naijiria akporo sanni abacha mgbe o di ndu dika onyeisiala

bbcnigeria2019
atiku bata amerika o nwere ajuju o gaasa anyilai mohammed
olusegun obasanjo ihe atiku ji kara buhari mma
obasanjo gwara bbc na ya elelechar ihe buhari mereela ma hu na atiku ka ya mma mmaji abuo
na mkparitauka ya na bbc yoruba nwere onye bubu onyeisiala naijiria bu olusegun obasanjo kwuru maka onye bubu osote nakwa onye naazo ochichi na ndorondoro ochichi nke 2019 bu atiku abubakar
o si na asi ya hara ugbua na ya ga ahara atiku karia buhari nihi ihe buhari merela
ndi e nwere ihoro netiti ha bu onye nke apc na nke pdpt t
site nihe m huru naka buhari amaghi oru ma ncha ikpa oke nruruaka adighi ike ahu adighi ike nke uche na ihe niile ndi ozo were ya tunyere atikut t
atiku gaagbali mmaji abuo karia buhari
o kwukwara maka boko haram nakwa independence national electoral commission inec
obasanjo kowara na ya kwenyere na onyeisiala muhammadu buhari ka atiku njo bu ihe mere ya jiri rapu ikwado ndi ntoroobia nime mmadu 73 naazo oche onyeisiala naijiria
o kwukwara ihe mere tupu ndi agha wakpo obodo odi nafo 1999 bu mgbe ihe ruru mmadu 2500 ndi obodo nwuru naka ndi agha
mkparitauka a gaaputa nuju eche bu ubochi nke 22 nke onwa januwari 2019
ubiam sokwa eme na ndi mmadu na anu ogwu ekwesighi maka na ha ejighi ego ha ji aga uloogwu
dika oriuiakhi si kwuo o bu udi agwa ojo a ufodu naeme megide ogwu mgbochi mere ogwu ufodu e ji agwo iba jiri nwuo pii
ihe ano i maghi maka oria iba
o si na ndi ufodu naaga na kemist goro ogwu ndi a naenweghi ikike naka ndi dokinta anu ya
nke a gaeme na mgbe ahu ha choziri ya bu ogwu o gaghizi aru oru nahu ha
o kwukwara na ihe a bu nsogbu diara oru ahuike
kedu ihe a gaeme ka ogwu mgbochi ruo oru ka o kwesiri
e kwesiri inye ndi mmadu ezigbo ozuzu maka otu esi anu ogwu mgbochi
naani mgbe dokinta deerela mmadu ogwu mgbochi ndi a bu mgbe e kwesiri inu ya
nutrition oke ibu abughi na ahu di nwa gi
ndi naere ogwu mgbochi ekwesighi iresi ya mmadu ma onye ahu ejighi akwukwo dokinta ya dere
e kwesikwara ime nnyocha bekee kporo culture and sensitivity tupu enye mmadu ogwu mgbochi
onye ahu adighi gaa nuloogwu ga mee nnyocha ka e wee deere ya ogwu kwesiri
ndi oruahuike kwesiri ikowara ndi mmadu mkpa o di imata ka esi anu ogwu mgbochi ndi a

nke mere dika danylo sikan nke ukraine nyere goolu mbu ha

ufodu umunwaanyi ndi ntaakuko negwuregwu akowala ufodu nsogbu egwuregwu boolu umunwaanyi naenwe na naijiria
ndi ntaakuko negwurgwu boolu bukwa umunwaanyi ekwuola na super falcons nke naijiria ka agbata ihe na boolu karia ndi super eagles
ha kwuru nagbanyeghi nke a na ndi mmadu karisia umunwoke a naghi etinye uche na boolu umunwaanyi na naijiria nakwa afrika
ha gara nihu kwuo na goomenti a naghi etinye uche nakwa ego negwuregwu boolu umunwaanyi dika ha si eme na nke umunwoke agbanyeghi na umunwaanyi naebute iko karia ndi nwoke
na o bu ihe ndi a mere anaghi anu akuko banyere asompi di iche iche umunwaanyi naagba na naijiria
nigeria vs norway akpochuola naijiria ihu ahi france taa

norway na naijiria nasompi iko mbauwa umunwaanyi na france
norway ejirila okpu goolu ato si naijiria ndewo nasompi iko mbauwa umunwaanyi bu nke amalitere an france taa
umunwaanyi norway gbara boolu ka nwoke ebe ndi naijiria mere ka nwaanyi ha bu ruo mgbe a lotara ezumike okara mbu ha malitere ikpo gani gani nke amitaghi mkpuru ma oli

a hoputala chiji collins dika onyeisi uloomeiwu imo steeti
ndiomeiwu ohuru na steeti imo ahoputala maazi chiji collins dika olu naekwuru ha
nwa amadi a bu onye naanochite anya okpuruochichi isiala mbano nke steeti ahu
a hoputara ya naenweghi onye mara ya aka nihu
nke a bu nke ugboro abuo o naaga nuloomeiwu ahu dika ahoputachara ya nke mbu nafo 2015
uloomeiwu a hoputakwara okechukwu onyekanma bu onye naanochite anya mbaitoli nke steeti ahu dika osote ya
onye ochiehi ebepula isi nwaagbogho nekiti
obodo ilasa ekiti di nekiti steeti no nogbaghara ugbua nihi onwu otu nwaagbogho onye ochiehi bepuru isi maka na o juru ilu ya
onye ochiehi a a naakpobeghi aha ya chechiri nwaaghogho ahu nuzo ebe o gara ikute mmiri ma bepu ya isi na tuuzude
nwoke agbaala nwaanyi na ezinaulo ya oku maka iju ya enyi
nwoke egbuola nwunye ya maka ekworo
onyeisi obodo ahu bu ajayi omolagba si na onye ochiehi ahu di na mbu kuchie nwaghogho site naka ezinaulo ya dika iwu ndi fulani si di
mana ndi ezinaulo nwagbogho ahu juru ilunye ya nwoke ochiehi ahu nke mere o ji gbuo nwaagbogho ahu
ndi uweojii ekiti steeti kwuru na nke a mere eme na ha anwuchiela nwoke ahu site na kepukepu ha nwetere

negwuregwu enyimba fc nwetara ihe nrite dika otu kachasi agba na mpaghara afrika nafo 2003
negwuruegwu enyimba eburula iko nigeria premier league nke ugboro asato ha site n iji okpu goolo ato meri akwa united unyaahu
enyimba ji akara iri na abuo negwuregwu ise ha gbara ebe reuben bala stanley dimgba na abdulrahman bashir nyeere enyimba goolu
gee akuko ndi a ebe a
child trafficking aka ndi uweojii akparala ndi ntori umuaka nimo steeti
ndi uweojii nimo si na immaculata edward tooro ma ree umuaka 5 si otu ezinaulo na ngor akpala di imo steeti ahu
ndi a naenyo enyo tooro umuaka ndi ahu
ndi ngalaba operation puff adder nke uweojii imo steeti anwuchiela mmadu isi oru ha bu itori umuaka
nubochi 24 nke onwa epurel 2019 nwaanyi aha ya bu immaculata edward si na ya di afo 31 si obodo okondo di na kros riva steeti tooro umuaka ise bi na be enye ya nwoke a kporo ifara isong bi na ngor okpala di nimo steeti
naptip anwuchiela ndi naatu mgbere umuaka
aka akparala dibia naatu mgbere ahia umuaka
immaculata zuru umuaka ise ndi agbataobi enyi ya nwoke ahu bu ndi nne na nna ha siri ya lekota ha anya
umuaka a bu ndi otu nne muru gunyere somto eke nwaanyi di afo isii kelechi ekeh nwoke di afo ise
ndi ozo bu chisom ekeh nwaanyi di afo ato ebuka enwerem nwoke di afo ato chioma enwerem nwaanyi di afo ise na lucky ida nwoke di afo isii
umuaka azoputara na ezinaulo ha
immaculata kpogara ha naka onye ama ama nitu mgbere umuaka bu perpetual iwuji si nobokwu ulakwo imo steeti
perpetual kporo umuaka abuo nime ndi a ma ree ha naka grace nwachukwu si aboh mbaise ma biri na mpape abuja
immaculata zukwara umuaka abuo bu umu nwanne nna ya si na cross river steeti ma ree ha naka ifeoma ndubuisi si na lokpanta abia steeti
nwata azoputara na nne na nna ya
site na nyocha tara ochichi ndi uweojii a chotala umuaka niile ahu a tooro ma tinye ha naka ezinaulo ha
nime nyocha ahu azoputara umuaka ise ozo naka perpetual iwuji ma ziga ha nulo ebe a naelekota umuaka
ndi a naenyo enyo naka ha di na nke a gunyere perpetual iwuji isong ifara immaculata edward grace nwachukwu ifeoma ndubuisi na stephen ezenwa
itu mgbere umuaka abughi ihe amaghi maka na mpaghara owuwa anyanwu naijiria

nwaanyi luru di aka ogbo alughi di enwe anuri
rochas okorocha anuola iyi oru dika onyeomeiwu ndi naijiria
afcon 2019 usoro asompi na mputara
usoro a gaesi gbaa asompi iko mba afirika nke gaamalite na ubochi iri abuo na otu nke onwa juun nijipt
iko mba afrika
inec server anyi achikotala onuogugu card reader niile otu ebe na komputa
inec si na aha ndi niile debere aha na ntuliaka 2019 di na komputa ha
festus okoye na emeka unachukwu
onyeozi inec bu festus okoye ka anekwusi ike na ndi ulooru ahu enweghi server bu nke nyere ha ohere izipu mputara ntuliaka 2019
okoye si na iwu naijiria enyeghi ha ohere ime otu ahu
okaikpe garba eburula oche nikpe atiku na buhari
uloomeiwu ekwuola gaa nihu maka bojeti afo 2019
nolu ya iwu naijria nyere ikike iburu mputara ntuliaka niile nke di na fom̀ ec8a naka buga ebe a gaegbokoba ha na wodu
iwu naijiria anyi ji mee ya bu ntuliaka amaghi iji igwe komputa zipu ozi obula
ndi collation officer ka o bu oru ha iburu akwukwo ndi a naka buga ebe a choro ya
o nweghi mgbe anyi jiri igwe komputa zipu mputara ntuliaka
okoye kwetara na ndi debere aha ha nakwukwo maka ntuliaka 2019 niile di na igwe komputa na enyere ndi otu pati niile aha ndi a
ejighi incident form gaakwusi nruruaka naaga na ntuliaka
o kwusiri ike na o bu naani mgbe eji igwe komuta tuo vootu ka a gaasi na ihe di na sava
o si na ya amaghi maka mputara ntulika 2019 i di na sava obula
notu aka ahu bbc jukwara onye oru komputa ama ama bu emeka unachukwu gini bu server
unachukwu si na server bu komputa naejiko komputa ndi ozo onu eji edewe mkpuruozi di iche iche
o kwuru na inec nwere ike ikwu na ha enweghi server maka na o nwere ulooru ozo na e jidere ha mkpuruozi mana o bughi eziokwu na ha enweghi server ebe e nwere mkpuruozi
o si na intanet nwere server nke ya ebe otutu mmadu naedowe ozi ha
unachukwu si na inec agaghi asi na ha enweghi sava maka na ha nwere ebe ha na edowe mkpuruozi bu data
ha nwere ike kpo nke a data base mana ihe o bu bu sava maka na komputa ahu jikoro ndi ozo onu bu ndi nke nwere ike idoro ozi maobu zite ozi na ya
o si na ohiara ahu inec isi na ha enweghi server
ha naakpo ndi mmadu bia were pvc ha diri njikere maka ntuliaka
unachukwu kwuru na o burugodi na a turu vootu naka buru ya naka buga ebe a guru ya na inec gaetinyekwa ya na ya bu server
mana ha nwere ike ikwu na ha etinyebeghi mputara 2019 na ya bu server nke gosiri na ha aruchabeghi oru ha

ikwu ugwo onwa abuo nime onwa iri ezughi chacha  ndi nkuzi abia
