world blood donor day 2019 ihe ndi mmadu naeche maka inye obara
dika taa bu oge a naecheta inye obara bbc igbo gara juo ndi mmadu ihe ha ma maka inye obara
taa ka a naechete inye obara bu nke bekee kporo world blood donor day 2019
bbc igbo juru ndi mmadu ihe ha ma maka inye obara nakwa udiri asi naasi ha naanu maka ya
gee ha nti
diet and dementia etu i gaesi jiri chocolate naakwukwo nri chuo nsogbu uburuisi
guo edemede a ka i muta etu i gaesi jiri ezigbo nri mee ka uburu gi kaa aka ma gbasie ike
mkpuru osisi na akwukwo nri ahaziri ka ha yie uburu isi
muta maka nri naedozi uburuisi ka enye kwa gi ogologo ndu na ahuisiike
i ma nri asaa nwere ike inyere gi aka ichu nsogbu uburuisi oso ukwu eru ala
mmadu ijeri iri na ise nuwa nile gburugburu na aria oria nsogbu uburuisi nke naebute oke nchefu na nsogbu omumu ihe tinyekwara ihe ruru mmadu ijeri iri na enweta oria a kwa afo who
nagbanyehi na a choputala na erimeri sonyere nihe naedozi uburuisi mana enweghi omumu ihe ama na akwado ya
mmanya red wine
mana enwere eziokwu di nokwu ndi a
ngwa guo ihe sheila dillon bu onye oru bbc choputara mgbe o gbara ndi okammuta ajuju onu maka nihe gbasatara okwu a
dika i gaachoputa nri ndi a naenyere aka maka odimma uburuisi gi
nri sitere nmmiri
ezigbote protein gbara obere abuba ma juputakwa na omega fatty acids
iri nri azu juputara na ya otu mgbe maobu karia nizuka naenyere uburuisi aka nke ukwu
mkpuru osisi vine na mkpuru ndi ozo yiri ya
were mkpuru osisi vine leta uburuisi nahu gi mma
mkpuru osisi di ka strawberries na blueberries nwere ihe naegbochi mbido nsogbo omumu nke uburuisi
opupa na aki di iche iche
aki na mkpuru di iche iche nenye ahuike ma na edozi kwa uburuisi
onye neri nani 30mg nke aki di iche iche okarye
ugu
ugu naenye obara ma na edozi kwa uburuisi
onye kwuru na ugu na akwukwo nri ndi ozo naedozi uburuisi onye ahu mara ihe o naekwu
vitamin b
vitamin b  e ji la ya gwuo egwu
mkpuru mmadu ole nwere obele nsogbu uburu isi enyere vitamin b kosiri ezigbote mgbake nke uburuisi
i na anu kwa ihe onunu mmiri koko
ka anyi kelee ndi gboo nke olmec-mexico maka i gosi uwa niile ihe onunu mmiri koko
koko naadi mma maka akwaraozi ma naedozi kwa mkpurundu
mana cheta kwa ka i naanu mmiri koko nke nwere obere shuga
ubebekee
i nwere ike inweta ubebekee uwa nile gburugburu
ihe sonyere mee ka ube bekee naewu ewu nuwa niile bu maka na o naenyere aka maka o di mma uburuisi
ugbua odoola gi anya
nri ndi a niile araghi ahu i nweta ma enwe kwara ndi ozo enwereike iji gbanwe nke i naachotaghi nogbe gi
ma cheta kwa nri ndi a abughi nani maka uburuisi gi ha naedozi ahu gi were mee ka i kwuru chim
edemede a bu mgbanwe edemede 'diet and dementia', nke puruiche nke ndi bbc the food programme
mikel obi kedu ihe m biara ime ma obughi ibu iko afcon
onye ndu ndi naagbara otu super eagles boolu ekwechirila si na o bu mmeri ka ha biara ime na iko afcon 2019
mikel obi
onyeisi ndi otu boolu ndi naijiria  mikel obi
mikel obi gaedu ndi otu super eagles nke naijiria gaa mba ijipt maka asompi iko mba ndi afirika akporo afcon 2019 ekwuola na o biaghi igwu egwu nihi na imeri ma buru kwa iko afcon naagusi ya ike
o ruola afo isii mikel obi meturu iko mba ndi afirika aka
mgbe ahu bu mgbe naijiria meriri na mba saut afirika
mikel agaghi eso soo mpi na poland
obi adighi mikel obi mma
a gbaputala nna mikel obi naka ndi nto ozokwa
mgbe ozo mikel gbata ihe na afirika bu nafo 2006 na 2010 bu mgbe otu super eagles gbatara ndi nke ato
noge afcon a mikel gaedu ndi umu okorobia obara ha di oku were soo asumupi nke afo a na ijipt
mikel kwuru nagbanyeghi na ndi otu super eagles nke ugbua abughi ndi aka ochie nizute mba onye afirika ndi ozo ka ya asumpi a gaenye ndi di ka samuel chukwueze na paul onuachu ohere igosiputa nka ha
enwekwara m olileanya na anyi ga aga ijiptu ma turu ugo lota
ndi otu super eagles
o kwukwara nobi di ya uto etu ndi super eagles siri agba mbo nagbanyeghi onyupa ha dara nasumpi iko mba uwa
mikel kwetere na asumpi a gaesi ike mana o kwenyere na nka na nkwado umu super eagles ga enyere ha aka imeri asumpi a
chetakwa na mikel obi gbaara naijiria boolu nke mbu nafo 2005 mgbe super eagles na otu egwuregwu mba libya zutere
mikel kwuru nasompi a nwere ike i bu nke ikpeazu ya nuwe super eagles
o si otu obula o di aga m agbali ka o di nma
ukraine and u20 world cup south korea eburula ihe naesi niko mbauwa u20
ukraine efeela south korea aka nisi were okpu goolu ato maburu iko mbauwa ndi ntorobia
ukraine vs south korea
ndi egwu boolu mba ukraine ewerela okpu goolu ato asatara otu merie saut korea were maburu iko mbauwa ndi erubeghi afo iri abuo agbara na mba poland taa bu satode
mmeri a biara ka ndi saut korea nwetechara penariti nuzo ututu ya bu egwuregwu na nkeji ise bu nke lee kangin tinyere ha na goolu
flying eagles ejirila ikiriki eze gafee
otu naijiria alaferela nasompi afcon u20
mana ukraine gwara saut korea na ha aputaghi egwu onwa mgbe vladyslav supriaga sara ya bu goolu na nkeji iri ato na ano
vladyslav supriaga kwuru nezie naejighi ututu ama njo ahia na nkeji iri ise na ato bu mgbe o tinyere goolu nke abuo ya nonu mpio ndi saut korea
ndi korea kpokwara ganigani otutu mgbe mana ukraine gwara ha na ogologo abughi na nwa m etoola mgbe ha mezuru ya okpu ato site naka giorgi tsitaishvili na nkeji iri asato na itoolu
uwa a gbaa saut korea ghari
uwa gbara saut korea ghari mgbe opi ike daara na ngwucha ya bu egwuruegwu
nke a bu mbu ukraine naemetu ya bu iko mbauwa aka ka england buchere ya afo abuo gara aga

umuaka dapchi ogu adaala netiti buhari na jonathan t
ogu onu adaala netiti ndi nke buhari na jonathan maka ntoro umuakwukwo dapchi na mpaghara ugwu nke naijiriat
buhari bidoro njem nleta nobodo ndi nwere ogbaghara na naijiria nke gunyere taraba plateau benue tupu o gawa yobet
onyeisiala mohammadu buhari kwuru na o ka onye buburu onyeisiala noge gara aga bu goodluck jonathan mma naileba anya na ntoro umuaka akwukwot
o kwuru nke a unyaahu mgbe o mere njem nleta nobodo dapchi nke yobe steeti bu ebe atoro umuaka ahu nonwa gara aga
o katoro ochichi jonathan na nleghara anya umuakwukwo chibok mgbe atoro ha nafo 2014ma kwuo na o bu enweghi uche
ufodu umuakwukwo a bu ndi atorot t
mana okwu buhari a ebutela osisa di icheiche site naka otutu ndi mmadut t
onye naekwuchite onu ndi otu bring back our girls bu sesugh akume ekwuola na onyeisiala agbalighi t
akume kwuru obi adighi anyi uto ihe a bu afo ano atoro umuaka chibok ugbua o meela nobodo dapchi dika ochichi buhari naeme otu njehe jonathan mere noge nke ya
o ruola otu onwa atoro umuaka ahu mana ugbu a ka goomenti naaga ebe ahu
agbanyighi asi niile ha turu na haagbaputala umuaka dapchi
onyeisiala kwere ndi nne na nna umuaka dapchi na o gaagbaputa umuaka ahu atoro

o kwuru na oge atoro umuaka chibok jonathan kporo oku nzuko ndi nchekwa ebe buhari kagburu nzuko ndi nchekwa noge atoro umuaka dapchi

omugwo o bu omenala gaakwusi nala igbo
a muo nwa ohuru e jiri azu ji mmiri oku uda na utazi gaa leta nne muru ya ya bu ihe a kporo omugwo
nwa ohuru na nne ya
omugwo bu omenaala igbo bidoro kemgbe gboo nke ka naeme ruo ugbua
ile omugwo nomenala igbo bu oge nne naabia ileta nwa ya nwaanyi na nwa o muru nke bu nwa nwa ya
ufodu oge o buru na nwaanyi enweghizi nne o buru na nne muru ya anwuola nwunye nna ya maobu nne di ya gaabi noro nulo ya lee ya omugwo
ihe ise masiri umunwaanyi
umunwaanyi ewechighala isiowu nudi ohuru
uru nwaanyi abughi so nusoekwu
ihe mere o ji buru nwaanyi naele omugwo kama nwoke bu maka na a naewe ya na o bu nwaanyi kacha mara ihe gbasara ya maka na o gabigala onodu ahu nonwe ya
oge omugwo bu oge nne naakuziri nwa ya nwaanyi ihe niile o ma maka ilekota nwa a muru ohuru
ufodu oge o naabu nne muru nwa laa nne di ya abia bido lewe ya omugwo nke ya
nwaanyi muru nwa ohuru naeji ohere omugwo zuru ike ma nne ya naelekota nwa ya
ihe nne naeme nomugwo
nne ga naenye nwa ya nwaanyi ihe gaeme ka mmiri ara ya gbaa ofuma
nne ga naesiri ya nri ndi gaeme ka ahu ya gbakee ofuma
nne ga naama ya mmiri oku nafo na ebe ndi ozo o choro ma tekwaa ya ihe gaekpo ya ahu oku robb aboniki
nne ga naenye nwata ohuru nri saa akwa ya ma saa ya ahu
o gaadotikwa nwa ohuru ahu ma hia ya aka nahu ofuma
o ga naahu na nwa ya no ala nelu boketi awunyere mmiri oku na nnu na ogwu eji achu nje nke gaeme ka obara ojoo nwee ike gbaputa
o ga naekekpa ya afo ka o nwee ike taa ma hara etu ohabu tupu o di ime
nne ga naagba nwa ya nwaanyi ume maka na ya na onwe ya anoola nonodu ahu mbu
o ga naarukwa oru ndi ozo di nulo dika ihazi ulo na isi nri ezinaulo naeri
uru omugwo bara
omugwo bu oge nne nwa ya na nwa nwa ohuru ya naeji enwe ezigbo mmekorita nke bekee kporo bonding maka nke a ka otutu ndi nne naeji aga ebe obula nwa ha no muo nwa ma nulo maobu na mba ofesi iga nokoo ihe ruru onwa ato maobu karia
o gaakuzikiri nwa ya nwaanyi ihe ubeakwa nwa ya putara maobu akwa aguru maobu akwa mmekpa ahu
nri ekwesiri iri nomugwo
nwaanyi a naele omugwo nwere nri ndi o naeri ufodu bu iji asuchapu obara kpukoro ya nafo oge nwa no ya nime nri ndi a bu ma mkporogwu ma ngwanri di icheiche

ji mmiri oku
ofe nsala
mmiri ogwu etere ete
tii di oku na akamu
nri asuru asu
azu okpoo na okporoko
anu okuko
ehuru na ehu
uziza
utazi
nri obula gaenwe ezigbote ose
a naekwu na uda naegbochi afo ime na oria ndi ozo dika agbaikpere
nri nwaanyi ekwesighi iri nomugwo
ihe juru oke oyi
egwusi ogbono na ofe obula e ji mmanu e si

kedu ihe bu ebumnuche gi maka igba mkpe
ngwucha omugwo
omugwo gwu nne biara omugwo gaenweta ihe buru ibu
ndi o biara ileta gaazutara ya ihe onyinye di icheiche dika ego akwa omuma akpukpoukwu akpa ihe nri di icheiche wee diri gawazie
a gaazutara ya akpa nnu na akpa ncha nke o gaeke ndi agbataobi ya ma o laruo ebe o bi
umunwaanyi ozubulu emeela ngosiputa
akuko kwuru na umunwaanyi ozubulu jiri ejiji ka ndi mkpe gara nisi ulo ndi uweoji na amawbia i rio mkpuchi unyaahu
ndi mmadu bu egbe wakporo ndi uka st phillips nafo gara aga
umu nwaanyi ozubulu no nokpuru ekwusigo na anambra steeti gara nulooru ndi uweojii nke di namawbia i rio ha mkpuchi unyaahu
ha mere nke a maka ikpe di netiti ndi echere na hawakporo ulouka di nobodo ha nubochi 6 ogostu afo gara aga
ha si na ndi a naeyi ndu ha egwu na o bukwa nihi nke a ka ha naacho mkpuchi ndi gaenye akaebe megide ndi wakporo ha nulo ikpe
we want protection from the police in the law court ha bu akwukwo nnukwu gaaebe ahu edere anyi choro ikpe zuruoke anyi choro mkpuchi ndi uweoji nuloikpe
ihe onye akaebe kwuru maka ochu ozubulu
onu naekwuchitere ndi uweoji na anambra bu nkiruka nwode gwara bbc igbo naekwe nti na ihe di umunwaanyi ozubulu mkpa bu ka udo were onodu nobodo ha
nwode si na umunwaanyi a naeme ihe a rioro ndi uweoji mkpuchi ka ha naakwado iga uloikpe maka uchu e gburu nobodo ha
onyeisi ndi uweoji na anambra steeti bu garba baba umaru nyere umunwaanyi a nkwado si ha gaa niru
umaru gwara umunwaanyi ahu na ebe o bu na m no ebe a onweghi ihe gaeme unu m gaahu na unu nwetara ikpe zuruoke
ihe mere nozubulu

uru omugwo bara nomenala igbo
osu a gaakwusi nala igbo
nke a naegosi na ilu di bu omenaala zuru agburu onu nala naijiria

gini na akpata ya
dika ndi okammuta nihe gbasara mmekorita mmadu na ibe ya nke a kporo sociologists na bekee siri kowa ihe naakpatakari mmegbu maobu mkpagbu umunwaanyi alughi di bu omenaala na enweghi ezi nghota
nokwu ya dr adedeji oyenuga bu onye naakuzi sociology na lagos state university kowara na o bu omenaala nakwa na ufodu ndi nne na nna naahu alughi di nwa ha dika ihe naegosi na ha azughi nwa ha nke oma
o si na omenaala o nwere oge nwata naelekwasi nne na nna ya anya mana mgbe nwata toro buru okenya noro onwe ya a naele nwanwoke anya ilu nwaanyi naele nwanwaanyi anya ilu di o buru na o meghi otu a o kachasi na o buru nwaanyi nne na nna ya gaewe ya dika na ha akuola afo nala nizulite ya
dr nkechi emma-echiegu bu onye nkuzi na ebonyi state university kwukwara na o bu omenaala
nala igbo o naabu ajukata onye muru a juwa onye naalu
o gara nihu kwuo na o bu omenaala ojoo na a naakpari maobu emegbu nwagbogho nihi alughi di

gini naebute alughi di noge

nwaanyi a luburu nwa ya nwoke

ukwa
a naahapu ukwa ka o ree ure tupu ewere mkpuru ya
otutu ndi igbo ma ukwa ma na ha amaghi etu esi emeputa ukwa tupu o buru ihe a naeri eri
ukwa nwere osisi nke naamiputa mkpuru uyoko buru ibu nke bekee naakpo breadfruit azu mkpuru uyoko ya naacha akwukwondu akwukwondu ebe mkpuru mkpuru di ya nime naemeputa ihe anyi naakpo ukwa
uyoko ukwa chaa o si nelu osisi ya daa nala a hapu ya ka o ree ure tupu a kuwaa ya ma weputa ukwa nke a naesi esi ya mere ndi igbo ji asi na ukwa ruo oge ya o daa
tupu e rie ukwa o gaagabiga uzo di icheiche dika

ighe ya eghe

ukwa ruo oge ya o daa
etu esi esi ya
ihe ndi a ka i gaeme tupu isie ukwa gi
saa ukwa gi mmiri ofuma iji hu na aja maobu kirikiri okwute adighi ya nime
wunye ya nime ite tumadu nke bekee kporo pressure pot ma wunyekwa ya mmiri gaekpuchi ya ofuma
ufodu naetinye akanwu maobu ngo iji mee ka o dee ma ghee osiso
o ghewe nakwa mmiri di nime ya tawa tinye ya ose akworo akwo mmanu nri na nnu
hapu ya ka ya na ngwa nri ndi i tinyere nime ya sukota onu
kpagharia ya ma hapuzia ya ka o noro noku dee ede ma ghee ofuma
ukwa bu otu nri nwere uto nke ya i gaerinwu ma i tinyere maobu itinyeghi ngwanri obula
etu esi eri ya
a bia nufodu obodo dika urualla di nimo steeti ha anaghi azapu mmiri e ji sie ukwa ha ha naanu mmiri ya iche ma riekwa ukwa ha iche
ufodu anaghi etinye mmanu nri nime nukwa ha ebe ufodu naahapu mmiri ukwa nime ya nke bu na ha kuru ya ha ekuru ya na mmiri
a naeghekwa mkpuru ukwa eghe jiri aki etiri eti maobu aki bekee taa ya
otutu ndi mmadu naeji ukwa eghere eghe ataghari onu
etu esi echekwa ukwa
a naagba ukwa nanwu ka o kpoo tupu a gbaa ya nakpa maka ndi gaazuta ya iji aga ala bekee
tupu i sie nke kporo akpo banye ya na mmiri site nabali ruo mgbe chi foro nututu nke a gaeme ka o nwee ike dee ofuma ma ghee osiso mgbe i gaesi ya
ihe o naenye nahu
nchoputa ndi okachamara sayensi choputara gosiri na ukwa nwere otutu ihe ndi di mma nahu dika riboflavin iron niacin thiamin iron na fosforus o nwekwara potassiom kopa iron magniziom kalshiom zinki manganeezi selenium nakwa fosforus na vitamin c
o di mma maka mkpuru obi mmadu ufodu naeji akwukwo osisi ya asacha isi maka o naegbu igu isi nke bekee kporo dandruff naakwusikwa ndapusi ntutu
o nwekwara obere abuba kpukoro onu nke bekee kporo saturated fats kolesterol nakwa sodiom
ufodu naanu mmiri ukwa iche ebe ufodu naeri ya na mmiri ya
ihe ndi ozo eji ya eme i naamaghi
a naetinye ukwa nime ufodu mmanu naaba nanya iji nye ya uto flavour
a naakwo mkpuru ukwa akwo jiri ya mee ihe bekee kporo flour
a naapiputakwa ya mmanu
akuko ndi gaamasi gi
o naakpotu nenugwu maka nleta fayose mere ebe ahu
anyi gaakpupu goomenti nulo ikpe  icsc
uru omugwo bara nomenala igbo
anwulu na oke isi achuola ndi mmadu oso
onye bibu nso ebe a naekpofu ahihia na otu dokita kwuru na udi ebe ahu naamuputa oria di iche iche
ebe ha naetufu ahihia
awulu si ebe a anaetufu ahihia naebute nnukwu oria
ndi biri na mpaghara ikosi isheri ma o bu ketu na lagos steeti naanu ajo isi si nebe ndi goomenti naaga itufu ahihia a kporo olososun dumpsite nojota
enugu steeti nwere nke a ha nokpokoro uzo awara awara si enugwu ga port harcourt
ajo isi naputa nebe ndi a ka nku nke nke na lagos ufodu ndi bi nebe a akwapugo nihi oke isi
na lagos akuko kwuru na otu nwata nwuru makana onweghi ike iku ume nihi na anwulu si ebe a juputara ebe niile
maka ihe a govano lagos bu akinwunmi ambode emechiela ebe a anaatufu ahihia
goomenti na ndi obodo naagba ebe ahihia oku oge obula
ihe ndi mmadu naekwu
mana oke isi ahu ka dikwa nakwa ndi mmadu biri naebe a
bbc igbo kporo otu nwoke akporo samuel osaze bi bu ebe a nelu ekwenti
o kwuru na awulu naesi ebe a naaputa bu ihe nabute nnukwu oria
awulu a naaputa makana goomenti naagba ebe a oku oge obula unyahu mgbe m nsi okporo uzo ikosi naaga be m nnukwu awulu juputara ebe niile nebe ahihia a
nafo 2013 otu naahu maka itufu ahihia na lagos bu lagos waste management agency lawma kwuru na ahihia lagos ruru tonnes puku iri na ato
otu dibia bekee dkta ikechukwu mgbolu kwuru na anwulu si ebe a naetufu ahihia naebute oria di iche iche dika onyunyu na ogbugbo cholera taifod ibamalaria na lasa fiva
o kwukwara na ndi nwere oria ashimaasthma anaghi enwe ike ibi nso udi ebe a
mgbolu kwurunnukwu anwuru a naebute oria ngugu elu nke a kporo upper respiratory infection na bekee nihi ajo ikuku kabon monozide di nime anwulu
osaze kwuru na isi a a naekweghizi edi netiti onwa maachi na ogusutu afo niile maka oge a bu oge udummiri
ndi biri na lagos naetufu ahihia oge obula nokporo uzo na lagos
osaze kwuru onweghi obodo ndi mepere anya naagba ebe a naetufu ahihia oku ugbua makana ha mara na omume di otu a naebute nnukwu oria
goomenti kwesiri izu ihe a akporo incinerator na bekee bu igwe eji agba ahihia oku
govano ambode ekwuola na agaghi naatufu ahihia obula ebe ahu ozo maka oria di iche iche o naebuta
o di zi ndi steeti ndi ozo naka ikwu ihe ha gaeme ebe ntufu ahihia di netiti obodo ha

ndi uloaku a naezu umu naijiria ohi

otu ugboala uber naanya onwe ya kugbulu otu nwaanyi na obodo tempe di na arizona na mba amerika
uber
ulooru uber egosila obi mwute maka nwaanyi ugboala ha gburu
uber bu ndi so na emeputa ugboala na anya onwe ya ekwuola na ha akwusila ntule ugbo naanya onwe ya ka otu ugboala ha kugburu otu nwaanyi di afo 49 naagbafe okporouzo nobodo tempe di na arizona
dika akuko si were kwuo ihe odachi a mere ka ulooru uber kwusi ntule ugbo naanya onwe ya ahu ha bidoro
onyeisi uber bu dara khosrowshahi kwuru na twitter na onwu ahu bu ihe oke obi mgbawa
anyi naeche maka ezinaulo o dachi metutara ma anyi na ndi uweojii naarukorita iji ghota ka ihe siri mee
ihe mberede a abughi so so uber ka o metutara o ga emetuta mbo a naagba iji ruputa ugboala naagba onwe ya maka njem ora mmadu

ndi uloaku a naezu umu naijiria ohi
putin gaachi roshia afo asaa ozo
mana ha go ya nonu otu mgbanwe ego o gaeme ka otutu ego a naetinye naguakwukwo na naijiria jenite
nafo ole na ole gara aga naijiria nwere nsogbu mgbanwe ego dika akunauba ya kpuru afo nala nihi odida onu ahia mmanu agbidi nahia mba uwa
o bu onodu a mere na dika uwaleke siri kwuo o gaghi adabara naijiria iso ndummodu imf nyere
uwaleke kwuru na o buru na naijiria nwe ya ugbua na o ga aria ya ahu ikwu ugwo o ji na mba ofesi nihi no ga a diri ya oke onu

kedu ihe naijiria naerite na chogm
ndi naijiria agaghi nzuko namerika
ndi uweojii egbochiela ulo dino melaye
world cancer day etu m si nweta ogwugwo oria kansa  onye meriri kansa ara
gloria orji bu nwaada igbo meriri kansa ma di mma o naekwu na ebe o meriri kansa onyeozo gaemeri kansa
oria kansa bu oria naeyi uwa niile egwu maka etu o si egbu ndi mmadu
nke ka njo bu ndi naacho ogwugwo naacho ya mana onwebeghi ogwu eweputara na ya bu ogwugwo ya
isiokwu emume ncheta oria kansa nke afo 2019 bu enwere m ike  i nwere ike nke putara na anyi niile nwereike iwakpo oria kansa
mana nwaada gloria bu onye choputara akpu kansa nara ya nafo 2010 a waa ya ahu o mee kimo na ihe ndi ozo niile wee merie ya bu oria

o gwara bbc igbo etu o siri merie ya bu oria naatu uwa niile egwu
ikpe amaala bill cosby nebubo mwakpo nwaanyi
bill cosby nwere ike i ga mkporo ruru afo iri ato maka mwakpo nwaanyi nike
bill cosby
bill cosby bu onye ama ama dika onye okpaochi
uloikpe namerika ekpebiela na ikpe mara onye okpaochi bu bill cosby nebubo ato eboro ya dika onye naawakpo umunwanyi nike
o bu andrea constand bubu onye egwuregwu basketboolu naekpe bill cosby nuloikpe ka mgbe afo 2004
kpoputa nnamdi kanu ubochi ikpe ya
uloikpe enyela iwu ka anwuchie innoson
cosby di afo 80 ka naago ebubo a mana mkpebia nwere ike i tinye ya na mkporo ruo afo iri ato
nke a bu ugboro abuo cosby naazo isi ya nuloikpe maka ebubo mwakpo umunwaanyi
cosby bill  bu onye ama ama na ihe onyonyo akporo the cosby show na bekee
otutu umunwaanyi ka naebo cosby ebubo mwakpo nike mana cosby kwuru na ha niile bu asi

codeine otomegbum
codeine otomegbum bu akuko etu oke inu ogwu ukwara si naala ndu ndi naeto eto na naijiria niyi nke bbc nyochaputara
codeine otomegbum bu akuko etu oke inu ogwu ukwara si naala ndu ndi naeto eto na naijiria niyi
ndi ntaakuko bbc mere nyocha nzuzo were gbaa nanwu etu ndi naemeputa ogwu ndi naere ya siri naeresi umuaka ogwu nuzo megidere iwu ala ndi naijiria
codeine otomegbum emzor achuola ndioru
emzor pharmaceuticals achuola otu onye oru ha maka akuko nchoputa codeine otomegbu nke bbc mere
habitual intake of codeines cough syrup nwata nwoke na anu ogwu ogwu ukwaracopdeine
akuko naekwu na ufodi ndi ndorondoro ochichi naeke ndi ntorobia ogwu dika ihe onyinye
ulooru naemeputa ogwu na naijiria bu emzor pharmaceuticalsachuola otu onyeoru ma kwusikwa abuo oru nike nihi aka ha tinyere nire okwu ukwara codeine nuzo megidere iwu dika akuko nchoputa nke bbc mere nke gosiri ka ogwu ukwara ahu si ala ndu ndi ntorobia naijiria niyi
emzor churu onye otu onye oree ahia ha nke resiri onye ntaakuko bbc ogwu emzolyn syrup
ha kwuru nke a na igwe okwu soshal midia ka bbc weputachara ihe onyonyo ha mere n ubochi monde abali 30 nke onwa epreelu
nime ihe onyonyo ahu zuru otu elekere e gosiri otu ndi ahia ogwu ndi gunyere otu onye oru emzor ji uzo azulo naeresi ndi mmadu ogwu ukwara
iwe na onuma juru ndi biara nkiri ihe onyonyo ahu nke egosiri na legos unyaahu
otu onye kwuru na o bu ndi ndorondoro ochichi naetinye mmanu noku a naagba na kano dika o kwuru na ha naeke ndi ntoroobia ogwu a dika ihe onyinye
mana ulooru emzor agoola na ha anaghi ere ogwu nuzo nezighi ezi
ha kwukwara na ha akwusila ire emzolyn nwere codeine rue mgbe ha gaemecha nyocha nime ebubo na ha naere ogwu ukwara ha nuzo akwughi oto
emzor kwusiburu one oreeahia ha ma meecha chuo ya noru
emzor pharmaceuticals bu ulooru naakwanyere onwe ya ugwu ma na akwuwa aka ya otot
ha nwere akwukwo ikike ire ogwu kariri otu nari na iri abuo nke gunyere emzolyn codeine naka nafdac
ha gara nihu si a kwusila nkesa emzolyn codeine yue mgbe a gaemecha nyocha zuru oke
na mkparitauka bbc na onyeisi ngalaba nahu maka nhazi ozuzu na oru ndi omeeogwu pharmacists na naijiria na mpaghara owuwa-anyanwu bu jc okafor nwere o kwuru si na e nwere iwu naechekwa ka esi ekesa ogwu ukwara nwere codeine ma kwuwa nulooru obula achoputara na ha naekesa ya nuzo ezighi ezi a gaemechi ya
okafor sianyi nwere atumatu etu e ji ekesa ogwu ukwara nwere codeine na naijiria nke meere na mmadu enweghi ike izu ya naejighi akwu onye dokita
ulooru obula a choputara dara iwu ahu anyi naemechi ya
otutu ndi najiria no na choal midia naata emzor uta maka aka ha ndi na nsogbu oke inu ogwu ukwara di netiti ndi naeto eto
otu onye juru ulooru ahu si  ya mere o buru na ulooru bbc egosighi nchoputa ahu ulooru unu agaghi eme ihe o bula iji kwusi oke inu ogwu a netiti ndi ntoroobia
o bu na ndi oru unu amaghi ihe ha naeme
onye ozo mairo mandara kporo oku ka goomenti machie orire ogwu ukwara nwere codeine
codeine nafdac awakpoola ulooru ano ma kpachie otutu ogwu
nafdac kwuru na ha gaagba mbo kwusi ulooru niile naakwado mmebi ogwu codeine na naijiria
ndi ulooru nafdac
oge niile ka nafdac naawakpo ulooru naemeputa ogwu na naijiria
ngalaba naahu maka nchekwa nri na ogwu na naijiria nke akporo national agency (nafdac) naha ichafu wakporo ulooru ato naemeputa ogwu na lagos ikeja  ilorin na kano
mwakpo a naeso nchoputa bbc mere nke gosiri etu ndi mmadu si emebi ogwu ukwara nwere codeine
nafdac kwuru na mwakpo a ha mere gosiri na ulooru ndi a ka naemeputa ogwu ukwara nwere codeine kariri onuogugu iwu ala nyere ha ohere imeputa
mmachi codeine dextromethorphan agaebe okwu
goomenti amachiela ogwu codeine
codeine otomegbum emzor achuola ndioru
nwunye onyeisiala etiela mkpu maka codeine

nonu okwu ya anyi akpachiela otutu ogwu nwere codeine nulooru naemeputa ogwu nilorin

ha abuo putara nihe onyonyo bbc dika ndi naeji azu aka naere ogwu codeine

muhammadu buhari

o bu onye naekwuchitere onyeisiala onu bu femi adesina gwara ndi nta akuko nke a ka ugboelu ahu tuchara nala

lee ihe ndi buhari na trump kpara
uzo ano buhari jiri yie trump

codeine otomegbum
otutu ndi ntorobia naaria isimgbaka na oria di icheiche nihi oke inu ogwu ukwara
ngalaba naahazi nlekota nri na mmeputa ogwu bu nafdac naha ichafu emechiela uloru ogwu ato bioraj pharmaceutical limited  emzor pharmaceuticals ind
ltd na peace standard pharmaceutical limited bu ulooru a ruru aka nihe gbasara ire ogwu ukwara nwere codeine nuzo megidere iwu

goomenti amachiela ogwu codeine
nakwukwo ozi onyeisi nafdac bu mojisola adeyeye weputara mmechi a sotara nchoputa ha mere dika ha gachara nulooru ndi ahu
nihi e nwetaghi ihe akaebe zuru oke na mbo igbochi iweputa akwukwo kwesiri oge anyi mere nyocha anyi nubochi 2 nke onwa mee nulooru ha di nilorin na lagos o di mkpa ka e mechie ulooru mmeputa ahia ulooru ato ndi a  peace standard pharmaceutical limited  bioraj pharmaceutical limited na emzor pharmaceuticals ind ltd t t
nke a bu iji nye ohere maka nchoputa zuru oke
nafdac naeme nyocha ndia maka nchoputa bbc mere gbasara ogwu ahu
adeyeye kwukwara na imepe ulooru ndi a gaagbado ukwu ka ulooru ndi a si nye nafac nkwado na nyocha ha
o kwuru na otu nafdac nke gunyere ndi oru itoolu abuo bu ndi naenyocha ogwu na asaa bu ndi nchoputa nahu maka idewe iwu na ndi uweojii iri gara ilorin nubochi ahu i ga mee nyocha ulooru abuo e nyere ikike ime ogwu ukwara nwere codeine ndi a kporo aha nakuko nyocha nke bbc weputara
dika adeyeye siri kwuo otu ndi ahu bukwa ndi e zigara nulooru emzor na lagos
o kwuru isi ozi e zigara ha bu i ga lele akwukwo oriri na nkesa ogwu ukwara nwere codeine nye ndi naanu ya
o kwuru na nafdac akpoola oku nzuko ndi ihe gbasara ogwu metutara

bojeeti naijiria o gaaputa nonwa a
ndi mmadu naaju maka akwukwo mkpata na mmefu ego nke afo 2018 nke naijiria na ihe mere ejibeghi weputa ya
onyeisiala buhari
onyesisala buhari nyere ndi omeiwu akwukwo bojeeti nke 2018 nonwa novemba nke afo 2017
mgbe onyeisiala naijiria bu muhammadu buhari nyere ndi omeiwu naijiria akwukwo eji hazie etu a gaesi mee mkpata na mmefu bu nke bekee kporo budget nke afo 2018 nubochi asaa nke onwa novemba nafo gara aga ndi mmadu chere na ha gaeweputa ya tupu a banye onwa jenuwari nke 2018
onwa a no nime ya ugbua bu mee bu onwa nke ise na 2018 mana ndi omeiwu eweputabeghi ya bu bojeeti
ndi okachamara nihe banyere akunauba naakowa na etu o siri kwuru ugbua gaeme ka o raa naijiria ahu okachasi ebe ometutara oganihu obodo
akuko kachasi nututu taa achotala ofo sineeti
obiano emeela onye igala komishona
ndi sineti akpoola onyeisi uloaku ukwu
ihe mere ihe a jiri ka njo bu na amaghi mgbe ndi omeiwu gaebinye aka na ya bu bojeeti ma nye ya onyeisiala ka o mee ya iwu obodo
ndi omeiwu si na ihe mere ha ejibeghi weputa bojeeti 2018 a bu maka ngalaba ato goomenti di icheiche ewetabeghi nkowa etu ha si choo ime mkpata na mmefu nke ha nagbanyeghi na akwukwo ndi omeiwu ji nwere nhazi etu ngalaba di icheiche kwesiri isi mee ego na 2018
mana ngalaba naahu maka nhazi  nke a naakpo ministry of national planning nasusu bekee  kwuru na ihe niile ndi omeiwu kwesiori iji hazie bojeeti di nime akwukwo enyere ha
ben akabueze bu onyeisi ngalaba naahazi mkpata na mmefu kwuru na ihe niile ndi omeiwu choro di nakwukwo onyeisiala muhammadu buhari nyere ndi omeiwu nonwa novemba nke afo gara aga
mana o gakwara nihu kwuo na ndi omeiwu naakpo ndi isi ngalaba di icheiche ka ha bia zara onu ha nke bu ihe ya ma na emeela
ihe o putara
Ministri akunauba akunauba obodo naekwu na naijiria agaghi ahazi akunauba obodo ofuma ma ya buru na bojeeti a aputaghi
na soshal midia di ka twitter ndi mmadu naekwu maka ihe naeme
onye ji akara adebanqie ede na twitter dere na ndi naijiria kwesiri ikwu na ndi omeiwu agaghi arunwu oru nochichi onye kwuo uche ya
ulooru naenyocha etu goomenti jiri agbari 2018 budget bu budgit dere na o bu nke afo a kachasi tee aka kemgbe ebidoro ihe banyere bojeeti na naijiria
oduobodumu naaju ma onwere obodo ozo akwukwo mkpata na mmefu notegoro aka ruo etu nke afo a ruru
purrples si na ya naakpo onyeisi ndi omeiwu ukwu ka o bia zara onu ya maka akwukwo mkpata na mmefu a
onye ozo tinyere onu nokwu a bu apanpaolasumbo bu onye naaju ihe mere ndi naijiria ejighi ekwu okwu maka ihe a naeme
ka ihe ndi naeme ndi omeiwu naekwu na ha gaebinye aka na ya bu akwukwo nubochi 16 nke onwa a mana obughi mbu ha kwuru etu a nke mere anyi ji aju agbu ji agu o gaarapu ya ugbua
akuko gaamasi gi
ihe naakpa m bu nchekwa na akunauba obodo
etu ndi sineto si agbari ego naijiria
ndi mahadum imt majara onye ntaakuko bbc
ichi e gburu mgbe gboo
igbuichi bubu ihe ejiri mara igbo na ndi agburu ozo maka ogo okwa maobu ugwu
nakuko a mata maka ichi di icheiche
igbuichi
otutu mmadu nwuru maka igbuichi a
o gaatu gi nanya mana foto a naegosi udiri ichi ndi mmadu naegbu nala igbo mgbe gboo
igbuichi di uzo abuo ama ama
otu bu udiri ndi nri na echi nke ozo bu nke ndi agbaja
ichi nri naewu bu na gburugburu oka bu obodo di na anambra steeti ugbua nke agbaja si na gburugburu ogwu nke dizi na enugwu steeti
nime akwukwo journal of international african institute ha kowara na ndi igbo anaghi egbu ichi maka i gosi ebe onye gburu ya siri bia
ihe ndi i naekwesighi ime nakuku onye igbo
aguleri na igboukwu abughi mbido ndigbo
ihe ndi i kwesiri ima tupu i luo nwaanyi igbo
o bu maka igosi ogo okwa maobu ugwu na i gosi na onye ahu abaala otu ndi ozo
ha naakpo ndi gburu ichi ndinze maobu ndiichie
naani ndi di ike gaegbu ichi
dika omenaala siri kwu o bu sooso ndi gburu ichi gaemeri onwu
noge ahu ha nwere nkwenye na ndi gburu ichi gaebi ebeebe nala ndi mmuo
ndi gburu ichi anaghi aru oru dika ndi ozo ha anagi ebu ihe obula nelu isi ha
o bu aru i cho ha okwu obula maobu kpasuo ha iwe
igbuichi di icheiche nala igbo
o di ezigbo mkpa ka onwa na anyanwu di nichi obula ha gaechi
onwa naeburuzo anyanwu naesote ya nke ato gaabu ichi ahu
ogbanje
otutu ndi igbo nwere nkwenye na ogbanji ka di ire
igbuichi ozo ha naegbu bu maka umuaka ha chere na ha bu ogbanje
dika omenaala siri kwu ha naegbu ha ichi a ka mmuo ogbanje naghi mata ha ma o bia ozo
ozo bu igbu ichi maka nti furuafu
ndi igbo nwere nkwenye na igbuichi a gaeme ka nti obula furuafu gba mmee nakwa da ba nime
i ma uru oji bara nala igbo
ihe ndi i naekwesighi ime nakuku onye igbo
etu e siri egbuichi
o bu nisi ututu ka onye choro i gbu ichi gaebilite puo niro dina nala cheli ihu ya elu
ha gaeji mma toro ogologo di nko gbuo ichi a
o bu aru ka onye ahu bee akwa maobu tie mkpu mgbe a naegbu ya ichi a
onweghi ihe obula ha gaenye ya maka i nye aka idi ufu maobu i kwusi obara gaagba noge igbu iche a
igbuichi a bu maka i cho mma
onweele ndi nwuru mgbe a naegbu ha ichi otutu ndi ozo kpuru isii maka ihe a
o buru na onye ha naegbu ichi bee akwa e nwere ike i napu ya akunauba ya
ebe anaghi egbuichi nahu mmadu
anaghi egbu ichi na obi uvu maobu nukwu o bu sooso nihu na afo ka ha naegbu ichi
igbuichi bu ihe ogo
ihe kwusiri igbuichi
ugbua onweghi onye i gaahu gburu udiri ichi a na egbu mgbe gboo
onya okammuta aha bu chigozie nnabuihe kwuru na ndi niile gburu ichi a anwuchaala ubochi ndi ahu
o kwukwara na obibia uka otu kraist mere ka otutu mmadu kwusi igbuichi

uloomeiwu ejirila n500bn bulite bojeti
uloomeiwu nke etiti ebuliela ego bojeti afo site na n8612tn ga n9120tn mmanyekwu n500bn
uloomeiwu sineti
buhari weputara ndi ulooimiwu bojet afo 2018 onwa isi gara aga
nubochi tuuzude uloomeiwu nke etiti na nke nta weputara bojeti nke afo 2018 ebe ha buliri ego goomenti gaemefu nafo site na tarii naira 8.612 ga tarii naira 9.120 nke putara mmanyekwu ijeri naira 500
mgbari ego ahu nke putara n9120334988225 gosiri na e hiwere n530421368624 maka nkesa di na iwu
e hiwere n2203835365699 maka ikwu ugwo eji eji nke onuego n190000000000 bu maka ugwo ruola okwukwu
e hiwerekwara n3516477902077 maka ego mmefu ego a naeme kwa mgbe kwa mgbe
ha hiwekwara n2869600351825 dika ego maka imeputa mwulite doro anya nafo gaakwu ma onwa disemba gba iri ato na otu
enugwu steeti ekewaputala ijeri naira 103 maka 2018

ihe mere amerika anaghi enye visa na abuja ugbua
ndi ochichi ghana e nyela iwu maka etu ndi naijiria naere ahia gaesi naere ahia nobodo ha

onye weputara atumatu a bu minista naahu maka azumahia
obiora kwuru na agbanyeghi na atumatu abughi ihe ohuru maka na goomenti rituru nochichi choro ime ya ozighi ezi ugbua etu ozighi ezi mgbe ahu
ndi ahia akurungwa naesikari mba ofesi enweta ngwaoru ha

ma kwukwa na ha si uzo ozo bata
ndi uka ekwensu naapiasu naijiria
nyocha ndi naenweghi equity nke gaamalite taa
otu onye si na ihe a gaemetuta ya bu nwafor akajiofor bu onye naazu ahia nahia magazine

o kwuru na akwukwo naenye otu ikike ibi na ghana bu resident permit abughi ihe di mfe inweta
resident permit ahu naericha 200000 mana inweta ya abughi ebe o biri
obiora na onwe ya si na ihe naagba anyammiri bu na iwu ghana hibere bu na ndi mba ozo agaghi azu ahia nime ahia
ndi nwere akwukwo zuru ezu agaghi aganwu nime ahia zuo ahia o bu naani nokporouzo ka ha gaenwe uloahia dika iwu a siri kwuo

kanada na naijiria
ndi okaikpe ndi kanada si ndi be ya naemegbu ndi naijiria
mba kanada etinyela iwu ohuru maka ndi naijiria batara mba ahu maka oso ndu
iwu a gaeme ka ohia ahu inweta ohere banye kanada mana ufodu umu naijiria si us gbaba kanada oso ndu enwetere nkwado ndi okaikpe ufodu na mba ahu
onu juru amerika kanada na mexico obi taa  iko mbauwa 2026
a nwuchiela ndi russia 13 kpatosiri aka
ndi okaikpe a kwuru na agwa gomenti ala ha naakpaso ndi naijiria a gbatara oso ndu be ha jogburu udele ma sigbuo nkakwu
otutu ndi naijiria si ogige oke ala ndi us piofere kanada nihe ruru onwa iri na asaa gara aga bu ebe ha choro enyemaka ikike dika ndi gbatara oso ndu
ihe kpanitere mbuso ndi okaikpe a kporo onwe ha canadian association of refugee lawyers bu agwa akpasara otu nwaanyi ndi naijiria choro iji oso agbalahu ibe ugwu nwaanyi na be ha
ndi oru okwu ndi gbara oso ndu di naka bu immigration na refugee board irb nke kanada si na ya bu nwaanyi etozughi inye akwukwo ikike maka naokwesiri igbaga ya bu oso ndu na mpaghara ebe ndi ozo na naijiria dika ibadan maobu potakotu
ndi otu ikpe mkpeghari irb kpebiri na ya bu ikpe bu ihe a gaeji elegara anya naikpebi ikpe ndi ozo gbasara ndi si naijiria gbata oso ndu bido ugbua gawazia
ndi oru irb enwebuola udi mkpebi a na isi ndi mba china india nakwa pakistan
ndi otu canadian association of refugee lawyers naeche naiwu a gaeme ka ihe tawanyega akpu nye ndi si naijiria gbata oso ndu karia ka o di na mbu

ulo dara ada

umuaka isii adabala nime olulu nsi

nonu okwu ya ulouka a di afo 100
o bu ulouka a luru oge ndi ocha naachi ala anyi
ihe a bu ihe m che mere ka ulouka daa mana anyi ka naeleba anya na mberede a

na delta steeti taa

na nzuko ahu o kwuru na ujo anaghi atu ya gbasara ntuliaka kwuoto na 2019 maka na o bu ihe oji banye ochichi
na mba ofesi ihe kariri mmadu puku iri emela ngaghari iwe nihi oge ezumike nka na mba roshia

nututu amvca kpoputara ndi ulo fiim unyaahu

aka m adighi ya

boko haram egbughi ndi otu anyi naiagha naijiria
lee ka e si eri ji ohuru nalaigbo
nd agha naijiria agoola ebubo
ndiagha naijiria naekwu na akuko ndi ntaakuko afp dere na ndi boko haram gbagburu ndi agha naijiria nubochi ole ole gara aga abughi eziokwu
ndi agha naijiria kwuru na o bu ndi otu ha gbagburu otutu nime ndi agha boko haram
afp dere na ndi boko haram wakporo ndiagha ndi naijiria nobodo zaria nime borno steeti nakwa gbuo ndi agha ruru iri ato
us esepuola aka enyemaka na palistine
na mba ofesi goomenti amerika ekwuola na ha gaakwusi inye ego enyemaka ha naenye ndi palistine
amerika kwuru na ha gaakwusi ikwu ego a ruru nde dola nari ato makana palistine ka naanabata otutu ndi agha iyi egwu nala ha
gee akuko anyi nututu taa
lee ihe nkiri anyi
odo ugboelu enugu govano ndi owuwaanyanwu si na onodu ya naagbawa obi
aka ndi naachi steeti ndi owuwaanyanwu naijiria si na oru odo ugboelu enugwu bu ihe goomenti kwesiri iwe ka ihe di mkpa
odo ugboelu nke enugwu
a ka naaru oru na odo ugboelu nke enugwu
govano ndi si mpaghara owuwaanyanwu naijiria naakwa ariri maka onodu odo ugboelu akanu ibiam di nenugwu no na ya ugbua
nogbako ha mere nubochi abuo nke onwa septemba 2018 ha kelere goomenti etiti maka itinyebu ya aka ma kpokuo minista naahu maka ugboelu ka ha bia lee odo ugboelu ahu anya ma mezie ihe ndi e kwesiri imezi na ya
ihe ihere ji kwesi ime ndi omeiwu igbo chekwas okorie
bojeti 2018 buhari choro iji ihe a ghogbuo ndi igbo
gini mere jim iyke ji ewu na soshal midia

na nkowa ya ekweremadu kwuru na uche ya na nke ndiomeiwu si owuwaanyanwu naijiria di na odo ugboelu enugwu so noru di icheiche ndiomeiwu chabiri ego ya

a naagbado ukwu ma mmadu abu nwoke maobu nwaanyi nike oru maobu oke diri onye
ihe i kwesiri ima maka okpueze ala igbo
ihe asaa nwoke igbo choro na nwaanyi o gaalu
ihe iri agbogho ugbua choro na nwoke gaalu ya
nwoke a gaazanwu aha nna nwunye ya nala igbo
umunwoke nagbanyeghi ma ha abu nwata kariri nwaanyi nokwa na nguko dika omenaala igbo si diri

egbe ndi a ruru nulo so nihe ndi naakwalite izu ohi nakwa mwakpo ndi mmadu na mba ghana
bbc mere nyocha iji choputa ebe egbe ndi a si abia
lee ihe ha choputara nime onyonyo a
akuko gaamasi gi
ebonyi salt lake ihe mere umunwoke anaghi aba mmiri a
ihe nkiri a naegosi ka ndi ebonyi si emeputa nnu nebonyi salt lake ha naeresi otutu mmadu ma were ego ha naenweta na ya baa ogaranya
ebonyi steeti nwere otutu ebe na ihe nleghari anya
otu nime ha bu mmiri mmahi nke a kporo ebonyi salt lake nolu bekee
i ma ka esi emeputa nnu i naetinye na nri gi
i mana nwoke anaghi aba mmiri a
kirie ihe nkiri a ka ichoputa
akuko ndi gaamasi gi
nigeria election 2019 nwaanyi o gaemecha chia naijiria
dika a naakwado ime ntuliaka bbc igbo juru ndi mmadu gini ji nwaanyi ichi obodo naijiria
sooso umunwoke naachi ala naijiria kemgbe ha ji nweta mwereonwe ha
oge nwaanyi gaachi obodo naijiria o ruola kaobu o rubeghi
kedu mgbe o gaabu
kedu ihe naegbochi nwaanyi ichi naijiria
lee ihe ndi igbo kwuru
nigeria election 2019 ntuliaka gaaga nanambara dika e siri hiwe ya  inec
oku a gbara nulooru inec anambra emeela ya nke ato n’otu izuuka a
oku gbara
inec ekwuola na agbanyeghi oku gbara uloru ha na anamara steeti ntulliaka gaaga dika e siri kwado ya na steeti ahu
oku amaghi ebe osi gbapiala ulooru inec di noka anambra steeti ubochi tuzde
oku agbaala ulo ntuliaka na plateau steeti
dika ozi inec weputa nke onye komishona ha naahu maka mgbasaozi bu festus okoye binyere aka kwuru otutu ngwaoru ha nke gunyere card reader di puku ano nari isii na iri itoolu na ise so na ihe oku ahu repiara
nagbanyeghi ndoghachi azu odachie wetara na nknjikere anyi maka ntuliaka nanambara steeti ulooru anyi gbaliri nweta card reader ndi etinyeghi no oru na steeti ndi ozo a gaeziga anambara
nke a nyere anyi okika obi na ntuliaka gaaga nanambara dika e siri kwado ya
okoye kowara na odachi nke anambara bu nke ato ya nime abali iri na abuo dika oku gbara ulooru ha di na isiala ngwa abia steeti nakwa opuru ochichi quaan pan di na platu steeti
o gara nihu kwuo na ha ewegarala ndi uweojii na ulooru naagbanyu oku ozi ndi maliterela nyocha
nimo
otu ndiagha ndi naijiria nke 134 artillery regiment di nobinze na steeti imo anwuchiela umuokorobia ano bu ndi soja adigboroja
ha kowara ndi a dika ndi ori no nowere gbakwunye na ha naemenyu ndi mmadu anya kemgbe
na mba ofesi
otu onye anwuola nogbaghara so ndorondro ochichi na mba senegal dika ha naakwado ime ntuliaka okwa onyeisiala
o bu ndi naakwado onyeisiala macky sall na onye naazo oche ya bu issa sall malitere nsogbu a

taiwo ogbunjobi onye bubu odeakwukwo ukwu otu nff nwuru ubochi monde ka o riachara ahu obere oge
asup akwusila abubooru
otu jikoro ndi nkuzi politekni bu asup naha ichafu akwusila abubooru ha gbara kemgbe onwa abuo

nanambra

umunwaanyi naazo okwa onyeisiala
na ntuliaka 2019 ka umunwoke juru noso izo okwa onyeisiala umunwaanyi achoghi igba aka mere ka ihe ruru mmadu ato tinyere ukwu noso ahu
umunwaanyi ndi a meriri na ntuliaka imeulo ndi pati ha mere naatuanya ibu onye gaachupu onyeisiala muhammadu buhari noche na 2019

a muru ya nubochi iri na isii nke onwa ogost 1978

akuko ka naabia
mohamed morsi aka chiburu egypt anwuola ka o dara nuloikpe
mohamed morsi bu onye ndi agha chuturu nokwa dika onyeisiala mba egypt anwuola ka o gara izara onu ya nuloikpe na cairo
mohammed morsi in 2012
ndi agha chuturu morsi nokwa nafo 2013
akuko naeru anyi nti ugbua naekwu na si na mohammed morsi bubu aka naachi mba ijipt nara muo nuloikpe na kairo bu isi obodo mba ahu ka o gara uloikpe dika ndi oru nchekwa nikpe siri kwuo
otu onye naaru oro nulo ikpe si o naagwa okaikpe okwu tupu o daa
e buru ya gawa ulo ogwu bu ebe o no nwuo
abdel fattah alsisi aburula onyeisioche african union
morsi bu onye mbu ritere ochichi nonodu onye kwuo uche ya
o noro otu afo nokwa tupu ndi agha chutuo ya nafo 2013 ka ogbaghara dara na mba ahu
morsi no mkporo kemgbe a mara ya ikpe maka ndi nwuru nogbaghara eji wepu ya nokwa
goomenti ijipt ji aka ike sowe ndi na-akwado morsi nakwa ndi otu alakoba akporo 'muslim brotherhood', bu ndi o si n'okpuru ha nwete ochichi
ikpe a naekpe morsi tupu o nwuo bu nke metutara ebubo na aka ya di nime igba ama a si otu hamas nkle palestine mere nijipt
onye bu morsi
a muru morsi na obodo eladwah di na mpahra nile delta nke sharqiya nafo 1951
o guru nka na mahadum kairo tupu o ga mba amerika ga guo okamuta
otu muslim britherhood hoputara ya ka ozo ochichi dika onyeisiala nafo 2012 ka a manyere onye ha choro ka o puo
ka o meriri o kwere nkwa na ya ga achi ndi ijipt niile
otutu ndi akwadoghi ya si naomezughi nkwa ya nime otu afo a o chiri ijipt
ndi mmadu banyere ozo isi ya rituo nubochi o mere otu afo nochichi ijipt nubochi juun 30 nke 2013
na mgbede julai 3 ndi agha wezugara iwu ji mba ijipt ma kwuo na ha enwela goomenti ozo

ndi agha nwuchiri ya were tuba ya na mkporo

nigeria vs norway norway akpochuola naijiria ihu
otu boolu umunwaanyi naijiria achakeela ka ugo
nnadozie chetara penariti nke mbu renard gbara mana o dara iwu nke teknuzu var gosiri eji nye ya ozo
iwu a o dara mekwara na nnadozie di afo 18 rite akwukwo edo ebe ngozi ebere ritere akwukwo obara na nkeji 75
norway ji kwa goolu abuo merie mba sawut koria mgbe ha zutere onwe ha
frans piara saut koria 4:0 ma jirikwa 2:1 merie norway nke nyere ha owere iburu soso ndi gafere agba nke abuo na group a
naijiria na onwe ha agbataghi ihe mgbe ha zutere norway ji 30 si ha ga nu muta ofuma

onye gaachi osun steeti
o bu nubochi nke ise nke onwa julai ka a gaama onye gaakwuru ka govano osun steeti
uloikpe ukwu bu supreme court gaekpebi ikpe di netiti ademola adeleke nke pdp na gboyega oyetola nke apc maka okwa govano nke steeti ahu
nigerians in ghana ndi amaghi ndi ha bu kpochiri odoahia umu najiria na ghana
a kpochiri ogbo ahia ebe umu naijiria a naere akuku ugboala na kumasi di na ghana kemgbe ubochi tuuzde gara aga
akuko ndi di mkpa taa
ndi amaghi ndi ha bu kpochiri odoahia umu najiria na ghana
odoahia di na kumasi ghana
odoahia kariri iri ato ndi umu afo naijiria nwere nahia a kporo suame magazine na kumasi di na mba ghana ka ndi ndi ntorobia obodo ahu kpochiri
cheta na oteela nghotahie ji diri netiti ndi ntorobi ghana na ndi naijiria naazu ahia nobodo ahu nihi ebubo na umu naijiria naerekari ahia adigboroja
goomenti mba ghana akwadoghi ka ndi si mba ozo naere ahia mgbere nke ndi bekee kporo retail
ha meputara iwu iji machie ya nke mere ka e mechie otutu odoahia ndi naijira nwere nafo 2008
mana goomenti niajiria tinyere onu nokwu ahu nke mere ka ha kwusi icha umu naijiria naazu ahia na mba ahu oku
ka o di ugbua ndi uweojii mba ahu ekwela nkwa na ha gaelebanye anya na nsogbu ahu
onye uweojii e jidere ya na ndi nto abughi onye otu anyi ndi uweojii us
ndi uweojii naijiria ekwuola na kingsley udoyen onye e chere bu osote komishiona ndi uweojii assistant commissioner of police a nwuchiri nakwaibom steeti nke foto ya naefeghari na soshal midia dika onye anwuchiri ya na ndi nto ozo abughi onye uweojii ma ya fodu ibu osote komishona ndi uweojii
ha kwuru ihe e ji nwuchie udoyen bu maka ebubo ibu onye uweojii adigboroja ji uwe ha aturu ndi mmadu ego
ndi uweojii koweara na ya nwuchiri ya na abali abuo nke onwa januari afo dika iko ya juru ma kpupu ya uloikpe magie di nabak di na akwaibom steeti
ite ime ka egbu umunwaanyi karia malaria
dokita christopher lamai kwuru na onwu a kachasi metuta ndi mpaghara ugwu naijiria
dika o si kwuo  nkeji asato kwa ubochi otu nwaanyi naanwu site nite ime nuzo ezighi ezi
ite ime o kwesiri ibu ihe iwu namachighi
o gwara ndi ntaakuko gbakoro ebe ahu ha gbasaa ozi ka ndi mmadu muta oghom di na ite ime
ikpe nnamdi kanu

ngaghariiwe nanambra steeti
otu kporo onwe ha host communities of nigeria producing oil and gas emeela ngaghari iwe unyahu nonitsha igosi iwe ha maka gomenti ekweghi itinye anambra steeti na nzuko steeti naemeputa mmanu agbidi na naijiria
otu a si na nke a naegbochi steeti ahu irite uru ndi ozo no na nzuko a naerite
nruruaka nuloomeiwu nta
ntamu na aga nihu ugbua nuloomeiwu nta maka ntuliaka emere bu nke weputere femi gbajabiamila dika onye ndu uloomeiwu ahu
otu kporo onwe ha g70 si naenwere nruruaka na ya bu ntuliaka ma kwukwa na ha gaaga uloikpe maka ya

etu naijiria si agbanwe etu esi ahu boolu umunwaanyi

sajid javid

boko haram si ka akwuo n100m nisi abraham amuta
i chetara mgbe ndi nto atorola otu onye ntaakuko

world sickle cell day onye naaria sickle cell gaenwete uru na nri ndi a
dibia bekee akporo mcginger ibeneme kowara udiri nri gaabara ndi naari oria sickle cell uru ma ha naeri ha
ndi abatete mere ihe puruiche na iri ha
dika taa bu ubochi ncheta oria obara nko nke bu sickle cell na bekee ndi okachamara na nri na ihe o naenye nahu enyela ndumodu ohuru
florence ngozi uchendu kwuru na o nwere ufodu nri ndi naaria oria a kwesiri i naeri iji chekwa onwe ha ofuma karia ndi enweghi oria a
i chetara mgbe oria obara gburu tosyn bucknor
o kwuru na nri ndi naenye ike dika akpu ji osikapa na ndi ozo di mma iji nye ha ike nihi na oria a naagwu ike
o kwukwara na akwukwo nri na mkpuru osisi di icheiche na nye aka inye ha ihe ndi naedozi ahu
o kwuru na o bu maka na ndi naaria oria anaghi enweta ihe dikia ayon vitamins kalshium wdg
ihe ano i maghi maka oria iba
ugu bu akwukwo nri ndi oria obara nko kwesiri i naeri
nri ozo o kporo aha bu mmiri ala ehi nke gaenye ha kalshium nahu nakwa mmiri onunu nke gaakwusi ahu mgbu
dibia bekee ozo tinyere onu nokwu a bu mcginger ibeneme kwuru na ezigbo nri zuruoke nakwa ihe ndi ozo nwereike idoti ndu ndi naaria oria obara
o kwuru na ndi naaria udiri oria naenwe otutu nsogbu gunyere okpukpu mgbu obi mgbu iria ahu mgbe obula
utazi so nakwukwo nri ndi oria obara nko ga naeri

ekweremadu ike agwula ndi ulo ome iwu
nihi oke ogbugbu ndi mmadu na naijiria gbagburu gburu osota onyeisi ndi omeiwu naijiria bu ike ekweremadu ekwuola na ihe naijiria choro bu nchekwa tara ochichi tupu ekwuwa okwu ihe ozo
ike ekweremmadu
ike ida juu otu nkeji banyere oke ogbugbu naeme nala naijiria agwula ekweremmadu
osote onyeisi ndi omeiwu naijiria bu ike ekweremadu ekwuola na ike agwula ndi sinati iji otu nkeji darajuu akwanyere ndi egburu nime oke ogbaghara di na naijiria oge o bula
ekweremadu katoro mwakpo na ogbugbu ndi naijiria aka ha di ocha nke ndi fulani naachi ehi mere kwuo na ike agwula ndi ome iwu ikwanyere ha ugwu notu nkeji
cheta notu izuka garaaga ka emere akwam ozu mmadu ruru iri asaa egburu na local goomenti logo na guma nke benue steeti e be ihe kariri mmadu iri ise ka akuko kwuru negburu na taraba steeti
ekweremadu gosiri iwe gbasara ogbugbu ndi mmadu na nzuko ndi omeiwu nubochi taa kwuo na naijiria gaebu uzo nwe udo na nchekwa tupu e kwuowa okwu iwulite obodo
o siri ndi omeiwu abughi so oso ndi ihe a metutara kama ndi naijiria niile
ike agwula anyi iji otu nkeji di juu maka nkwanye ugwu ihe anyi choro bu udo na nchekwa tupu echewa echichi nwuli obodo
akuko m gaakari nke a  simone biles
simone biles nwata nwanyi naanochite anya amerika na egwuregwu mmega ahugymnaastics ekwuola na dokita naeletabu otu ha bu larry nassar metoro ya nuzo mmekoahu mgbe gara aga
simone biles
simone kwuru na o gaghi ekwe ka ihe mere zuru oonu ya
simone kwuputara nke a nelu igwe okwu twitta jiri akuko a naakpo metoo na bekee
o si na o gaghi ekwe ka ihe mere zuru onu m na obi anuri m
o kwuru si o hiara m ahu i cheta ihe ndi a ma naagbawa m obi na ilaghachi azu ebe ahu
o di mkpa na imezu ebumnobi m maka i ga asompi tokyo nafo 2020
mana simone gwakwara ndi neso ya na o gaghi eme ha ihe nwute na o gaaga niru nimeri na ihe o huru nanya bu egwuregwu mmega ahu
gini butere okwu a
ndi uwe ojii wakporo larry nassar onye bu dokita ochie naeleta ndi otu egwuregwu amerika niile na disemba afo gara aga maka mpu gbasara umuaka nihe mmekorita nwoke na nwanyi
ihe dika umu nwanyi nari iri ato akpuru la nassar buru kwa okammuta na mahadum steeti michigan ga uloikpe maka mmeto o mere ha
nassar kwuputara na o metoro ndi otu egwuregwu amerika ndi ozo
o bu ka nke a na aga ka simone jiri ko akuko nke ya
oru adighi mmadu nde nari asaa na okara enweghi oru kemgbe 2016
buhari kwere nkwa na o ga enye oru mana nbs na akowa na mmadu nde nari enweghi oru
nwaanyi na eri ji na akara
otutu mmadu na aru oru aka mo na azu ahia
mgbe muhammadu buhari naazo ochichi otu ihe bu okwu o kpu nonu bu nkwa o ekwere na ya ga enye ndi mmadu oru
okwu a buhari kwuru na isi ndorondoro ochichi na 2015 bu ihe eji kpuru ya na onu ugbua okachasi ka ulo oru naahu maka onu ogugu a naakpo national bureau of statistics nbs nweputara ozi nakowa na mmadu ruru nde asaa na nari ise so na ndi enweghi oru kemgbe afo 2016
nbs kwuru nke a na akwukwo o kporo labour force statistics vol 2 employment by sector report
e weputara akwukwo a na abuja nuka a gara aga
ke ihe ozi a putara
bbc igbo juru cheta nwanze bu onye na aru na sb morgen bu ulo oru aka ha di na nkowa otu ihe siri di cheta gwara anyi na ihe di na oru nkowa ihe ogugu na enwe otu o di mana o si na nnukwu ihe mere na ulo oru di ichiche na naijira nime afo abuo gara aga
achuru nwunye m na oru mgbe naijiria na ndi mtn nwere nsogbu o were metuta ebe o na aru oru
okwu mtn ahu metutakwara otutu ulo oru ha na ha na aruko oru ka mtn ekweghi inye ha contract
a mam otutu ndi mmadu na arubu oru na proctor and gamble mana achukwara ha noru mgbe ulo oru ahu churu oke ano ndi oru ha
yabu ihe metutara otutu mmadu ka cheta nwanze siri kwut t
ufodu umuaka o buro ndi egosiri eba anoghizi na akwukwo maka nne na nna ha enweghi orut t
bbc igbo juru nwanze maka okwu ndi goomenti naijiria na ekwu banyere imeputa oru
o si na nchoputa ndi nbs naakowa na oru mmeputa mmanu agbidi agaghi nihu ka o si kwesi
nke a na egosi na agbaneghi na ego batara na oru gbasatara mmanu agbidi madu ole ka ana ewo na oru na mpaghara a
mgbe e mere mgbako i ga ahu na ihe siri ike ofuma
bbc igbo kporo ndi naekwuchitere goomenti naijiria ka ha kwuo uche ha banyere ihe a nbs weputara mana onweghi onye zara nime ha
mana goomenti buhari weputara npower school feeding programme na ndi ozo di na ime ihe ha kporo social empowerment programmes ha si na ha ga eji nyere ndi mmadu aka na naijiria

google naecheta ubochi omumu keshi
iji cheta omumu onye nkuzi boolu najiria a ma ama bu stephen keshi google kwanyere ya ugwu nuzo puruiche site na ime ka akara e ji achota ihe nigwe intaneti buru ihu ya

keshi meriri iko mba afrika na 2013
mutiu adepoju onye ya na keshi gbakoro naijiria boolu gwara bbc na keshi bu onye huru ndi mmadu nanya echetara m oge m banyere national team mgbe ahu o bu onye ndu anyi o bu ezi onye ndu keshi bu onye a ma ama o nozighi ndu mana a gaeji ihe oma ndi o mere mgbe o di ndu were naecheta ya
keshi chiri ndi otu egwuregwu super eagles kemgbe afo 2011 ma durukwa ha gaa asompi di iche iche nke gunyere iko mba afrika na 2013 nke ha bulatara naijiria iko mpaghara afrika di iche iche na 2013 ma nye aka wetara naijiria onodu nasompi iko mbauwa niile na 2014

trump na ndi omeiwu us ekwekoritala maka itinye aka nakwukwo ka oru malite ozo na mba ahu
donald trump
donald trump naekwu okwu ike gbasara ndi mbiabia
ulo nzuko ome iwu us ekwekoritala maka itinye aka nakwukwo ka oru malite ozo na mba ahu
cheta na ndi democrat na ndi republican sere okwu maka itnye aka na ya bu akwukwo maka ha ekwekoritaghi na ihe gbasara nkpata na mmefu aku bu bojet
ndi otu demokrat kwuru na ndi republicans kwetara na ha gaeme nkparita uka maka onodu ndi mbiambia bi nala us
ha gaelebaanya niwu nke a naakpo deferred action for childhood arrivals daca nolu bekee bu iwu naagba mgbo hu na ndi umuaka ndi mbiabia nwere ike i bi na us
trump naaturu ndi ekwekoritara na mmeri ya aka
mana ugbua ochichi trump akabiela iwu ahu nke a putara na iwu nke a gaakwusi nubochi ise na onwa nke maachi
onye na nochite anya ndi demokrat nulo omeiwu bu steny hoyer ariola ndi otu ibe ya ka ha lebaa anya na ya bu okwu
maka akuko gbasara mmechi amerika guo
mmechi oru na amerika
rochas okorocha ndi asiri kpachara anya ha
rochas okorocha ajula i nye ndi fulani na achu ehi ala nimo steeti maka naodighi niwu naijiria
rochas na ala fulani na achu ehi
otutu ndi imo steeti akwadoghi i nye ndi fulani naachu ehi ala
govano naachi imo steeti bu rochas okorocha ekwuola na onweghi ala ya ga amaputa maka ndi fulani na achi ehi nimo steeti okwuru nke a unyahu bu mkpuru ubochi jenuwari iri abuo na ato nowerri isi obodo imo steeti
okwuru nke a site nonu komishiona naahu maka mgbasa ozi bu okammuta nnamdi obiaraeri ozi ahu kwuru na onweghi mgbe govano rochas jiri chee echichi i nye onye obula ala ndi imo steeti
o kwukwara naasiri niile ana anu maka inye ndi fulani naachi ehi ala ndi imo steeti bu oruaka ndi iro nakwa ndi mgbam na ndi ntu
akwukwo akuko ekwubuola na govano okorocha si na ya gaenye ndi na achi ehi ala nimo steeti nke otutu ndi igbo katoro na ezoghi onu bbc igbo gbara mbo i kwuru oje ozi rochas maka mgbasa ozi mana nwaamadi ahu bawara bbc mba gbanuo ekwenti ya
ka odi ugbua ndi govano ndi ozo nala igbo ekwuola na ha agaghi amaputa ala obula maka i nye ndi fulani naachi ehi ohaneze ndi igbo akabichiela na onweghi onye ga enye ala ndi igbo maka ichi ehi
na river steeti govano nyesom wike ekwuola na ya nweghi ala ya ji aru oru ma ya fokwa nke ya naenye mmadu

nke a mere ka otutu mmadu naagbaoso ndu nebe ahu
rasak fadipe gwara ndi ntaakuko na ozugbo m nuru maka oku a ka m kporo ndi naemenyu oku di nojo ha gbatakwara ebe oku a naere

ozi si naka ndi agha amerika siri na ha na enyocha ihe nkiri na ewu na twitter
ozu onye agha amerika
e niela ndi agha amerika nwuru na niger
ndi agha amerika si na ha naeleba anya na ihe nkiri newu ewu na intanet nke naegosi ndi nwuru anwu a siri na ha bu ndi agha amerika ndi oyi egwu wakporo na afo 2017 na mba niger
ozi si na mpahara ndi agha amerika na ahu maka afrika a naakpo african command usafricom siri anyi na enyocha akara twitter bu ozi a iji mara ma o bu na ezi na onwere ihe nkiri so ya
ha kwukwara na ha agaghi ekwu ihe ozo banyere ihe a ma o buru na ha emechaghi nyocha
na octoba 4 2017 mmadu iri na abuo ndi agha amerika na mmadu iri ato ndi agha niger ka ndi oyi egwu wakporo na tongo tongo bu obodo di na odida anyanwu nke mba niger
akuko na akowa na ihe ruru mmadu iri ise ndi oyi egwu ji ngwa agha di ichiche okacha ndi a naakpo machine gun na rocketpropelled grenade na asusu bekee bu ndi kpara aru a
otu onye ndi nchoputa dere na twitter na ndi oyi egwu a zipuru ihe nkiri a sikoro ozu ndi agha amerika na otu onye agha meruru ahu
ndi agha a no na oru i nwete akuko maka ndi isi ndi otu otu egwu no na mpahara niger ahu

thomas dennerby
thomas dennerby di afo iri ise na isi
otu egwuregwu super falcons nke ala naijiria enwela onye nkuzi ohuru aha ya bu thomas dennerby

ndi ome ihe nkiri black panther gosiri afrika nemume mbido ha
akpu ndi mere ihe nkiri black panther nonu maka otu ha si gosi afrika nemume mbido ha
ndi so mee ihe nkiri black panther goziri omenala afrika mgbe ha gara mmeme mbido ya bu ihe nkiri nke ulooru marvel meputara
ha niile kere ekike mba afrika di icheiche maka na ha kwuru si na o di mkpa igosi afrika nke oma
duuru ndi ozo no nihe nkiri a gaa ebe emere mmeme a na los angeles
ndi dika lupita nyongo david oyelowo daniel kaluuya michael b jordan danai gurira na angela bassett kere ekike ndi afrika
nakwukwo eji gwa ndi mmadu maka mmeme a e dere si ha jikere ka ndi eze afrika

mgbere akwuna anwuchiela mmadu iri na otu na spain
umunwaanyi naijiria eji agba mgbere akwuna na spain si naeji otumokpo yi ha egwu na ekwenti
ndi akwuna no na benin
izupu umunwaanyi nala naijiria naeweta nwute nye ndi goomenti naijiria
ndi uweojii no na spain anwuchiela mmadu iri na otu ndi asi naatu mgbere akwuna
akuko kwukwara na ha ji ufodu umu nwaanyi naijiria ezupuru nobodo akpa ego
anwuchiri ha na obodo akporo zaragoza ebe ndi uwe ojii zoputara umu nwaanyi iri na isii emere ohu mmeto ahu
e ji otumokpo yi ha egwu nekwenti
a manyere ha iwu ikwu ugwo akpakotara eji si na naijiria zupu ha
aghoriri umunwaanyi ndia nikwete na ha gaebi ndu kacha nma na yuropu
e kwuru na ndi otu a nwere njiko na italygermany nakwa denmark
mba us eu akatola idu iyi oru odinga duru onwe ya
mba us na otu jikoro mba ndi ocha akporo eu n aha ichafu akatola iyi oru raila odinga nke kenya duru onwe ya
onyeisi ala us bu donald trump kwuola na ya nwere nnukwu mkwayere ugu nye ndi mba afrika
n akwukwo ozi ngalaba us department tinyere na websait ha ha kwuru si  yunaited steeti naenwe obi mwute n iyi oru nke onye ndu ndi na ama goomenti kenya aka nihu bu raila odinga duru onwe ya ka onwa jenuwari gbara iri ato
anyi naaju agwa obula nke megidere iwu ala kenyat t
a hoputara uhuru kenyatta dika onyeisi ala kenya ka onwa octoba afo 2017 di iri abuo na ntuliaka nke uloikpe kachasi elu na kenya kwadorot t
onye obula nwere mkpesa obula kwesiri isoro usoro iwu ala debere
us katokwara otu goomenti kenya siri mechie ulo ntaakuko na kenya si na ohere onye kwue ka o di ya di mkpa na ochichi onyekwueuche ya ma rio ka ndi ndu na ndi a naachi na kenya bido mkparita uka maka ikpa udo na idinaotu
n otu aka ahu otu eu kwuru na iyi oru raila odinga duru onwe ya megidere iwu ma katokwa mmechi gooment uhuru kenyatta mechiri ulo ntaakuko ato
cheta na goomenti etiti mechiburu ulooru ngosi tv ato maka na ha gbasara ozi gosiri raila odinga ebe o naedu onwe ya iyi oru ma kpokwa onwe ya onyeisiala mba kenya ebe uloikpe kenya akwusiri mmechi ahu ubochi wenesde
oria kansa akpamamiri egbuola karia kansa ara
nchoputa ekwuola na otutu umunwoke naanwu site noria kansa akpamamiri
onye naaria kansa
oria kansa akpamamiri naaka egosi oge umunwoke ruru afo iri ano
onuogugu umunwoke naanwu site noria kansa akpamamiri akariala onuogugu umunwaanyi naanwu site noria kansa ara dika nchoputa siri kwuo na mba uk
umunwoke naaka nka putakwara na otutu ka naenweta mana anwu site noria ahu
ndi nyocha gbasara oria kansa no na mba uk kwuru na nchoputa na ogwugwo a naeme maka kansa ara naamita mkpuru ebe itinye ego gbasara kansa akpamamiri umunwoke gaenyekwa aka
nchoputa onuogugu putara site nafo 2015 gosiri na mmadu 11819 nwuru site na oria kansa akpamamiri ebe mmadu 11442 nwuru site na oria kansa ara
kansa akpamamiri kachasi numunwoke no na uk
ndi oruahuike ekwuola na nchoputa noge kachasi mkpa iji gwo akpu kansa
bbc igbo gbara dokinta akporo remi ajekigbe ajuju onuo kwuru na oria kansa ara ka egbu karia oria kansa akapamamiri na naijiria
o kwukwara na ebe nsogbu na dikari bu na umunwoke anaghi bia nyocha ahu nogeha na bia mgbe ihe o ka njo
a naagaghari naakuziri ndi mmadu nulo akwukwochoochiuloaku na ebe ndi ozo maka oria kansa nakwa ka esi egbochi yat t
emume ndi a ka a gaeji nabata ubochi nrubama ibuso agha oria kansa bu februwari anot t
tinubu edemede obasanjo bu egwuregwu ndorondorot t
bola tinubu akpoola edemede newu ewu nke obasanjo degara buhari egwuregwu ndorondorot t
tinubu ebe o no na ogbako ndi otu ya bu apc na ntuliaka nke afo 2015 kwuru si edemede ahu bu nke aghughot t
onyeisi otu no nokwa ochichi nke a naakpo apc bu bola ahmed tinubu ekwuputala okwu maka ihe edemede obasanjo degara buharit t
o si na obasanjo naegwu egwuregwu ndorondoro nedemede ahut t
o si na ebe ha abuo bu ndichiri nokpuru ndi agha obasanjo kwesiri ikpo ya nazu doo ya aka na nti kama i gwa ya nihu ohat t
o ruola izuuka abuo obasanjo degara buhari edemede ahu naasi ya ritue nokwa ghara izo ochichi na afo 2019t t
o si na oburu nobi di obsanjo ocha o kwesiri ikpo onyeisiala buhari nakuku gbaa ya izut t
o kwuru nke a ebe ndi ntaakuko gbara ya ajuju onu na owere owerri ka o naakwado iga mmemme nkwanye ugwu alex ekwuemet t
nwunye dibia boko haram achiliele aka elu nye ndi aghat t
rabi abuyasir gwara ndi agha naijiria na di ya bu dibia onyeisi ndi otu boko haram bu abubakara shekaut t
ndi agaha boko haramt t
lafia dole bu aha agha ebidoro ibuso boko haram kamgbe afo 2015t t
onye bu nwunye dibia naahu maka ahuike onyeisi otu boko haram bu rabi abuyasir chiliri ndi agha naijiria aka elu ubochi satodee abali ato nke onwa febuwari dika ha naebu agha a naakpo lafia dolet t
onye nchikwa agha lafia dole bu major general rogers nicholas kwuputara nke a oge o nyefere umunwaanyi na umuaka di mmadu iri asato na abuo ha gbaputara naka ndi boko haram ma nyefee ha naka ndi oru nchekwa na borno stetit t
rabi gwara ndi ntaakuko na di ya bu dibia naelebanye anya nahuike onyeisi boko haram bu abubakar shekaut t
o kwuru na a gbaputara ya ubochi fraide dika ndi agha naijiria chupuru ndi boko haram no nime ohia sambisat t
dika o naekwuputa ka ya na ihe si gaa rabi kwuru na o masiri ya etu esi na eledo ya anya maka okwa o no dika nwunye dibia shekaut t
nokwu ya di m abuyasirbu dibia shekau o naeledokwa ndi ozo ahu naadighi ma naemekwa iwe ahu
etu esi eme m rabi dika nwunye dibia shekau
udi nri m naeri di iche nihe a naenye umunwaanyi na umuaka ndi ozo no nogige ahu
anyi tara ahuhu naka ha ha dokwara anyi aka na nti na ndi agha naijiria gaegbu onye obula nyefere onwe ya naka ha
ana chosi shekau ike na naijiria ugbua
ha gwara anyi oge obula ka anyi nonyere ha ma rube isi nye ndi otu ha mana ndi agha naijiria naeledo anyi anya naabughi ihe ndi boko haram gwara nyi
rabi toro ndi agha naijiria maka mgbaputa agbaputara ha ebe o kpokuru ndi a toroato bu ndika no nime ohia ka ha puta bia nyefee onwe ha naka ndi agha
nichola bu onye nchikota agha lafia dole kowara na rabi so na mmadu iri asato na ano ndi agha gbaputara
o kwuru na mmadu asato nime mmadu iri asato na ano ahu agbaputara naanata ogwugwo nuloogwu ndi agha elu naijiria
onye nchikota ahu kwuru na ndi ahu a toro naagabiga ntaramahuhu di egwu naka ndi boko haram
nicholas mere ka a mata na a gbaputara ndi ahu site naka ndi boko haramchupub ha ma nochie isioche shekau di nohia sambisa
ndi oru imo gaalaghachi iru oru abali ise nizuuka
rochas okorocha si na otanisi ebeela yabu na ndi oru gaebido ibiazu oru nizu
rochas okorocha weputara ulooru na ahu maka anuri nke nwanne ya nwaanyi bu onye ndu
govano imo steeti bu rochas okorocha eweliela iwu ahu o tinyere maka ndi oru bekee ibia oru abali ato nizuuka
okorocha kwuru nke a mgbe ya na ndi ntaakuko zukoro ka o naakwado ime mmemme o ji echeta na umu akwukwo nimo steeti anoola afo asaa ma akwughi ugwo akwukwo
rochas machiri ikwu ugwo akwukwo nimo steeti mgbe o banyere nochichi
osi na ndi oru gaamalite iga oru ubochi ise nime otu izu site nubochi mbu nonwa machi maka na otanisi nke jibu obodo naijiria ebeela
onye akaebe ekwuola na a kporo ya noru ochu ozubulu
onye akaebe nikpe onwu mere nulouka ozubulu nafo 2017 ekwuola naakporo ya ka o soro ga oru ahu
ulouka st philip catholic church ozobulu
ndi ji egbe gara uka na st philip catholic church ozobulu gbagbu mmadu iri na ato biara uka n onwa ogostu afo 2017
chukwujekwu eze kwuru nuloikpe ukwu di na nnewi anambara steeti na a kporo ya noru imemila otu nwoke bu aloysius ikegwuonwu nke ama ama dika bishop mana ya ekweghi nihi na ya achoghi inweta ego site nikwafu obara
ndi ji egbe gbagburu mmadu iri na ato ndi biara uka na st philip catholic church ozobulu nonwa ogostu afo 2017
anyi choro udo na ikpe zuru oke
chukwujekwu eze kwuru si o nwere otu nwa nwoke aha ya bu okpanda onye gwara m na ha choro iga be bishop nozubulu ga ruo oru
a juru m ya udi oro o bu ya agwa m na bishop ji ndi mmadu ugwo na sautafrika na ha choro iga be ya gbagbuo ihe niile di ndut t
a juru m ya onye zigara ha ya asi na o bu obrocho
mgbe m kwulitere ya okpanda kwuru na o gaenyere m aka ma o buru na m soro gaa oru nulo bishop agwara m ya na achoghi m ikwo aka obara
eze gara nihu kwuo na o bu mgbe o gara iza oku okpanda kporo ya nulo ya ubochi so ubochi ahu ka o huru dobby onyemaechi mbanefo otu na ndi eboro ebubo na ha kpara mkpamkpa ahu ha abuo ndi gbara mbo rio ya ka o soro gaa ije ahu mana o kweghi
ndi e boro ebubo na o bu ha kpara nkata ghoro ngiga nokwu mkpamkpa ahu mere bu onyebuchi mbanefo 46 chukwudi ugwu 30 na great chinedu akpunonu 44
e jidebeghi ndi ozo e kwuru na ha soro mee mpu a
akuko ndi gaamasi gi
aruziwela ahia timbershade gbara oku
uru omugwo bara nomenala igbo
egbuola ndiagha naijiria abuo na plateau
dani carvajal onweghi ogwu ga egbochi neymar
dani carvajal nke real madrid ekwuola uche ya nebe neymar no maka asompi ha na ndi psg
neymar siri otu boolu barcelona gawa psg
dika a naakwado igba asompi eufa champions nke agba iri na isii nime izuka a ebe ndi real madrid gaezute ndi paris saintgermain
onye naagbara madrid boolu bu dani carvajal kwuru na onweghi ogwu nwereike igbochi neymar dika o naatu anya ka neymar laa ezumike notu ubochi
neymar dika ihe iyi egwu nye ndi madrid dika ha naaga izuta ndi psg nasompi ukwu nke mbu
carvajal onye naagaghi agba boolu nke mbu a si mgbe gi na neymar naamaka boolu o nweghi udi ogwu obula puru igbochi ya emela nke oma
o sikwa ka ndi madrid nwe olileanya ka o neymar ghara i no nubochi oma ya
o kwuru na amabeghi onye gaeme nke oma nasompi ahu gaadi netiti ndi otu abuo ndi a
akuko gaamasi gi
ihe i naamaghi maka ukwa i naeri
ima esi ofe egwusi
muta ya ebe a
nwanyi bu egbe emeruola mmadu ato ahu nisiulooru youtube
mmadu abuo emeruola ahu site na mgbo ebe otu onye ozo lojiri okpa ebe o naagba oso na mwakpo youtube
ndi uweoji nihu ulooru youtube
youtube bu ulooru no nokpuru google
ndi uweoji na mpaghara ugwu california ekwuola notu nwaanyi bu egbe emeruola mmadu ato ahu nisiulooru naemeputa ihe onoyonyo a kporo youtube tupu o gbuo onwe ya
ndi ntaakuko na mba amerika enye la aha nwanyi a ka nasim aghadam ma kwukwa na o bu esemoku ezinaulo kpatara mwakpo a
e chere na otu nwoke so na ndi meruru ahu unyahu bu enyi ya nwoke ulooru cbs naekwu
umu nwaanyi abuo di afo 32 na ozo di 27 meruru ahu na mwakpo a
nagbanyehi nke a ndi ntaakuko naekwu ndi uweoji ekwuputabeghi ihe nwaanyi ji buru egbe wakpo ndi mmadu na youtube
ndi oru na youtube kowara ihe naeme nelu igwe okwu
aghadam bubu onye naemeputa ihe onyonyo na youtube katoro youtube noge gara aga maka o si na ha naakpachi ihe onyonyo ya
akuko gaamasi gi
ndi nchikota ise nwere ike inochi conte
ibrahimovic ejirela goolu abuo bata la galaxy
nwanne egbuola nwanne ya na sango ota
i ma na oji anaghi anu bekee nala igbo
igbo naasi nonye wetara oji wetara ndu ya mere oji ji buru ihe di oke mkpa nomenala igbo
oji igbo
onye wetara oji wetara ndu
oji bu otu ihe i gaahuriri nemume obula gbasara ala igbo
oji na iwa oji di oke mkpa nomenala ndi igbo maka na igbo naekwu na onye wetara oji wetara ndu
ufodu ndi igbo kwenyere na oji putara omenala jikotara igbo
etu esi enweta oji
oji bu mkpuru osisi a naaku aku ma na o naepukwara onwe ya
oji nwere ike imi nulo ma mikwaa nohia
udiri oji di
enwere udiri oji di iche iche ufodu naaza aha site netu o si miputa
abia na naijiria enwere oji igbo ma nwee oji ugwu awusa ma nwekwaa nke ndi odida anyanwu bu ndi yoroba
oji igbo naagbakari nibe sitere nato ruo ibe asaa
igbo naakwanyere oji gbara ibe asaa ugwu ufodu naegbukwa okuko ma ha hu ya bu oji
oji awusa
aha oji di iche iche
oji ugo bu nke naacha ocha a naakpo ya ugo maka na o naama mma nanya
oji ikenga naenwe ibe ato naachakari uhie uhie
o naenwe ibe abuo naachakari ocha
uru oji bara
ndi igbo kwenyere na oji anaghi anu bekee nuzo obula ya mere eji eji ya eme omenala ndi igbo di iche iche dika
eji oji alu nwaanyi nala igbo
eji oji anabata obia
eji oji edozi esemokwu netiti ndi mmadu
eji agba ago ofoekpe ekpere
eji oji achu aja
eji oji agba ndu
eji oji akwa ozu
nala igbo inye onye obia oji gosiri na i nabatara ya o naegosikwa na i huru ya nanya nke ukwuu ma nwekwaa ntukwasi obi nebe o no
ihe a naeji ata oji
nomenala igbo enwere ihe ndi ozo a naeji ata oji
ose oji nke bekee kporo alligator pepper
aki ilu nke bekee kporo bitter kola
mmimi
ufodu naeji nzu ata oji
ose oji akworo akwo
iwa oji
tupu awaa oji nala igbo a naebu uzo goo oji kpeere ya ekpere
o bu iwu na onye kachasi buru okenye gaago oji ebe ufodu naenye onye kacha buru nwata ka o waa ya ma kesaa ya
nwoke anaghi awa oji na be ndi ogo ya o gaghi awakwa oji ebe ndi toro ya no naabughi ma ha nyere ya ikike iwa ya
o bukwa iwu na nwaanyi anaghi awa oji nala igbo
oji na umunwaanyi
nala igbo nwaanyi anaghi ari elu oji o naghi aghotu oji nosisi ya
nwaanyi anaghi ago oji
nwaanyi anaghi ari oji elu mana nwaanyi naere oji
anaghi ekwe ka nwaanyi tinye aka nime efere were oji ma o buru na umunwoke no ebe ahu ewerechabeghi
ufodu naaga nihu were aka ha nye nwaanyi oji ka o ghara inwe ohere tinye aka nefere e jiri kee oji
lee ihe nkiri a ihu ka pete edochie si gooro bbc igbo oji
na uka biara egbochighi ndi mmadu iji oji ekpe ekpere dika esi eme ya mgbe gboo
lee nri ogbenye 10 ogaranya naerizi
ufodu nri a ma na mbu dika nke ndi ogbenye buzi ihe ndi ogaranya wakporo nihi okwu gbasara ahuike
nala naijiria ihe dika afo iri ato maobu iri ano gara aga a naahu ufodu nri dika nri ndi ihe naesiri ike
otutu nri ndi a bu nri ndi mmadu naenwetara onwe ha nugbo ha maobu zuta onu ala nime ahia nihi na ndi naacho ha adighi otutu
mana ugbua nri ndi a buzi ihe naamasi ndi ogaraanya nihi mbawanye oria tara nchara dika obara mgbalielu oria shuga oria obi oturuokara stroke kansa na oke ibu bu oria ndi a naewe dika oria ndi ogaranya
na nchoputa ngalaba naahu maka ahuike na mba uwa bu who naha ichafu mere nafo 2008 ndi naijiria pasenti 112 nime nde 169 bu ndi nwere obara mgbalielu ebe pasenti 27 nwere oria shuga
egwu oria ndi a mere otutu ndi mmadu ji alaghachi na nri a naeleda anya na mbu nke mere na ugbua nri ndia a naada oke onuahia nke bu na aka umuogbenye anaghi eruzi ha
lee 10 nime nri ndi ahu
azu friji
a naahubu azu friji dika nri ndi ogbenye
ihe kariri afo iri ato gara aga a naahu iji azu friji sie nri nulo ndi ogbenye umuakwukwo maobu mgbe ego adighi mmadu nakpa ebe anu ehi maobu anu okuko bu maka ndi rijuru afo
otu onye bi na lagos bu kingsley udofa kowara anya a naeleda azu mbu nokwu ya si o nwere oge nala anyi bu naijiria mgbe azu friji bu maka ndi ogbenye
oge ahu a naakpo azu friji aha ojoo di icheiche iji kwaa ya emo dika ozu azu nasusu igbo oku eko nasusu yoruba nke putara ozu lagos  akpa asuko nse nasusu ibibio nke putara o nwuru anwu ma muru anyat t
ndi mmadu naahara izu ma rie azu ndu
ugbua egwu adaghariala
azu friji bu ahughi ma erighi nke otutu mmadu gunyere ndi ogaranya nke bu na azu naadazi oke onu nahia
ihe i naamaghi maka ukwa i naeri
kedu ihe ofe egusi gi naenye ahu gi
i ma etu esi agwo abacha
muta ya ebe a
dika minista nta naahu maka oruugbo bu sen heineken lokpobiri siri kwuo ndi naijiria naeri azu ruru nde 32 metrik ton kwa afo nke a naatubata ihe kariri pasenti iri asato nime ya
mata na metrik ton puku iri putara kontena puku nari ato iri ato na ano
ede
ede naagalazi oke onu
o bu ede uri ka o bu ede koko ma o bu achicha ede bu nri ugani nri ndi onweghi ka ora ha ji agbado ume nihi na ha enweghi ego zuru ji
mana ugbua nri ede buzi ukwa achi naka ya a naagba nihi na oke na ngwere naerizi ya
ewepu obodo jiri utaraede mere nnukwu nri ndi naaso nso nri nihi oria dika oria shuga obara mgbalielu na ndi choro ita ahu ekweghizi ka aka ogbenye rute ede nke na i go ede e ji esi ofe dizi ka igo ahia iwu
3 kanda
bubu ihe ndi ogbenye ji emeghari onu oge ha ahughi ego zuru anu ehi ma maobu anu okuko
dika ihe si aga ugbua ndi ogaranya ewerela ya mee ezi nri ebe e ji ya esi nri opuruiche dika edikakong maobu gwo ya na ose ma were ya anu mmanya
nafo 2014 mgbe goomenti si nonu onye bubu minista naahu maka oruugbo bu akinwumi adesina kwuo na ha choro imachi ndi mmadu iri kanda nke butere oke iwe ndi mmadu ma mekwa ka goomenti kpofuo atumatu ahu nohia
dika ndi okachamara si kowa kanda enweghi abuba maobu mmanu ojoo a kporo kolesitorol na bekee dika anu ehi nke ha kwuru na oke iri ya naebute ajo oria tara nchara dika oria obi na obara mgbalienu
ojoko
ufodu naakpo ya ogede ufodu abirika ndi ozo ojoko ebe otutu naakpo ya une maobu unere
umu ogbenye naeji mmanu eri nke ahuru noku ma jiri ya sie agwa mana ugbua ogaranya emeela ojoko nnukwu nri
ojoko bu ezi nri naedochi ahu nihi na o nwere faiba na mineral ndi ozo naenyere ndu aka dika magnesium phosphorous na potassium
dika ndi okachamara ahuike siri kowa ojoko naenye obara mgbe e siri ya naachaghi acha
ejula
ejula bu ezi nri naenye ihe nahu ma o naadazi oke onu ugbua
ma anu adighi azu adighi ogbenye naaba nohia kpara ejula were sie nri
ogaranya enwebughi efe ejula mgbe mbu nihi na dika ndi igbo ji ya ekwu okwu ahuhu di na imecha ejula
ma ugbua iji ejula isi nri buzi akara ejiri mara ogaranya nihi oke onu ahia ya
ejula bu ezi nri nwere proten calcium selenium magnesium ma naenye obara
gari
gari bu nri ma ogbenye ma ogaranya naerizi
iri gari o kachasi mgbe anuru ya anu bu ihe a naewe dika nri ndi uwa naatu nonu maobu mgbe ego koro gi nakpa na mbu
i juo umuakwukwo bi nuloakwukwo ha gaakowara gi etu iji opapa azu e ghere eghe maobu anu mkpo anu gari si zoo ha ndu
ugbua gari buzi ahia iwu
ogaranya na ogbenye naazozi gari nke otu oba a naakpo painter naada ihe kariri nari naira ise n500
onye okammuta oria kansa nuloogwu lagos university teaching hospital bu dr remi ajekigbe kwuru na ihe mere otutu ndi naijiria ji aria oria kansa ugbua bu na ha anaghi erizi nri ala anyi dika gari ji nke nwere faiba ka ma ha naeri nri ndi bekee
agwa
agwa bu ezi nri naedozi ahu
agwa bu nri ozo e jiri mara ndi ogbenye mana otutu ogaranya naerizi ya
agwa naenye proten ma naenyekwa obara
ndi okachamara nihe gbasara nri na ihe ha naenye naekwu na agwa kacha mma maka nweta protein karia anu ehi nihi na onweghi abuba ojoo nke a kporo kolesiterol
ukwa
ukwa bu oke oriri puru iche onye ike di naakwado
ukwa bu nri ndi ogrlanya naeleghara anya na mbu ikekwa nihi ahuhu di naikwado ya mana ugbua o buzi onye ji ego naeri ukwa
ukwa naenye proten obara potassium nakwa ngwa ndi ozo naedozi ahu
ji mmiri
ji mmiri nwere fibre
ji mmiri bu nri ndi mmadu anaghi erikari na mbu nihi na o naghi ato ka ji
sooso ndi ogbenye jibu ya achu aguu
mana ugbua otutu ndi mmadu gunyere ndi ogaranya naeri ya
ndi na aria oria shuga naerikwa ya
ndi nchoputa naakowa na ji mmiri nwere fibre rie nne obere sodium na nnukwu potassium nke mere e ji kwuo na o naadi ndi naaria oria shuga mma nahu
cheta na fibre naenyere nri aka igwepia nafo digestion oke sodium so ebute obara mgbalienu ebe potassium naakujulata obara chumie mmadu inwe oria okwute akuru kidney stone
isha
isha naadazi oke onu nke na aka ufodu ogbenye eruzi ya
ndi enweghi ego naejibu isha esi nri oge ha e nweghi ego anu maobu azu ma ugbua isha buzikwa maka ndi nwere ego nihi oke ida onu ahia
ihe mere ndi mmadu ji achuzi nri ndi ogbenye
dika okammuta na ihe gbasara nri na ihe o naaru nahu bu dr florence uchendu si kowa ihe mere na otutu ndi mmadu naeri nri a naagbara oso ugbua karia bu maka na oria di na naijiria ugbua dika oria shuga obara mgbalienu oturuokara stroke kansa
oria dizi na najiria bu oria di nobodo oyibo anyi anaghi ariabu mbut t
ihe dika obara mgbalienu oria shuga juziri kita
ndi mmadu amatago ihe i gaeri onyewe gi nsogbu nahu ma nwekwa ike nyewe gi nsogbu nahu

ebee ka igbo malitere
eze naachi nri bu emelie okika kwudosiri ike naekwu na nri bu isi mmiri ndigbo
mmanwu nogbo mmemme
mmanwu bu otu njirimara ndigbo
eze naachi nri bu ichie emelie okika adoola obodo aguleri na igboukwu aka na nti ka ha kwusi izo onye bu isi mbido ndigbo niile
okika kwuru kusie ike na o bu nri bu ebe ndigbo siri puta ma kwukwa nihe gbasara isi mmiri ndigbo bu okwu mmuo na e kwesighi iji mee ihe ndorondoro ochichi
o bara obodo aguleri nigboukwu mba maka mbo ha naagba ideghari akuko mbido ala igbo ma gwa ha ka ha wepu aka enwe nofe ka iwe ghara iwe ndi chi e nwere
uru omugwo bara nomenala igbo
i ma etu esi agwo abacha
muta ya ebe a
kedu ihe bu ebumnuche gi maka igba mkpe
o kwuru si o bu eziokwu na anyi na ndi aguleri bu otu mana ihe di iche bu na agu ndorondoro ochichi di be ha
igboukwu abiadighi nso nihe gbasara akuko a
okika si na eri bu nna ala igbo niile si ala israel maputa bu okpara nke ise gad bu nwa asaa nke jacob
nakwa eri na ndiotu ndiozo si ala egypt puta njem tupu opupu ndi ala israel negypt
o si ha mere njem nelu mmiri ma rue ebe mmiri omambala na ezu zuru onwe ha a naakpo agbanabo di nobodo aguleri ebe mmuo naedu ha si ha kwusi ruo obodo

kukah ogbaghara gaada na 2019
bishop matthew kukah ekwuola na ogbaghara nwere ike ida na ntuliaka 2019 ma ihe diri otu a gawa nihu
matthew kukah na naijiria
bishop kukah si na mwufu obara na mmebi akunauba obodo naijiria kariri akari
bishop nke sokoto katolik dayosis bu bishop mathew kukah ekwuola na ogbaaghara nwere ike ida na naijiria dika ime ntuliaka ndorondoro ochichi nke 2019 nnaabia nso
o si na onweghi ihe ga eme ka ogbaaghara aghara ida na naijiria ma oburu na akwusighi ogu na mgba a nada ebe niile na naijiria
kukah kwuru nke a naozi ya na africa report magazine nke eprelu
bishop kukah kwuru na o ga ata akpu i gbanahu ogbaaghara na ntuliaka nke 2019
nonu okwu ya o ga abu ezigbo olu ebube ma oburu na ogbaaghara adaghi na ntuliaka 2019
akuko gaamasi gi
ndiagha asaala ty danjuma
umuaka dapchi ezutela buhari
anyi enweghi okwu isa ihe mama boko haram kwuru
o siri na ihe ojiri kwuo nke a bu maka ogu na mgba juru ebe niile na naijiria ugbua
o metubeghi m nobi otu a mbut t
o kwuru na onodu naijiria ugbua kwesiri inaemetu nwafo obodo a obula nobi
kedu maka ijeri dola goomenti weputere maka nchekwa obodo
mgbe bishop kukah na bbc gbaritara uka anyi juru ya maka nde naira goomenti tinyere na nchekwa obodo
bishop kukah zara na ihe kacha mkpa abughi i me gbanugbanu me ihe ga enye aka i me ntuliaka ochichi nke ga eme ka ndi ndorondoro ochichi biwakwa ndu okeozu ka ha si ebe nke a gaghi abara ndi ha nachi uru
o si na tupu udo abata na naijiria na nkwafu obara ga akwusi kpamkpam
bishop kukah zara na ajuju a si ejighi ego egote udo
nuru ihe okwuru na uju na asusu bekee
obughi uko ego mere na udo adighi na naijiria ka ma o bu oke ego di na obodo a kpatara yat t
etinyela otutu ego na ndorondoro ochichi onweghi isi
ya bu itinye otutu ego abughi nsogbu okachasi na obodo ihe niile bu ego dika naijiriat t
goomenti etinyela otutu ego na mmiri anyi enweghi mmiri
ha etinyela otutu ego na oku anyi enweghi oku
ihe ga enweta udo na naijiria abughi egbe na mgbo
o gara nihu kwuo na ihe ndi ndorondoro ochichi naeme bu ka enwe ike mee ntuliaka ozo ma ghara ime ihe gaabara ndi mmadu uru
bishop kukah kwuru na oru goomenti bu ime ka ndi a naachiachi nwee ntukwasi obi na agbamume
mana otutu ndi naijiria enweghi ya
onodu di otu a naemebi ochichi onyekwuouche ya anyi no nime ya
kedu ihe i chere maka umuaka dapchi a tohapuru
ihe ahu ruturu aka igosi ka goomenti si ahazi ozi a na ezigara ndi a na achi
bishop kukah si na obu ihe mgbagwoju anya na udi ihe ahu mere onweghi onye mara isi ya na odu ya maobu ihe kpatara ya bu ihe
ihe a naanu bu soso asiri
udi ihe a abughi ihe e kwesiri i naanu na naijiria ugbua
o jogburu udele ma sigbuo nkakwu
offa ndiohi egbuola mmadu 17
uzu naakpo nobodo offa di na kwara steeti maka ndi uweoji mmadu ndi ozo ndi ojiegbeezu gburu
uloaku nke di nobodo ahu
ihu otu nime uloaku ndi a wakporo
mmadu kariri mmadu iri na ise anwuola nime ha ndi uweojii itoolu mgbe ndiohi bu egbe wakporo uloaku ruru ise nobodo offa di na kwara steeti ubochi toodse
ndi no ebe ihe a mere si na ndiohi ahu ji ogbunigwe gbawa ebe uloaku ahu naechekwa ego mmadu tupu haeburu ya puo
ha kwukwara na ndi a bu uzo ga nulooru ndi uweoji gbagbuo ihe niile ha huru ebe ahu tupu ha gaa ebe uloaku ndi ahu di
ha gbakwara mbo gbochie uzo abuo batara obodo ahu si na ilorin nosogbo obodo ndi agbatobi di nso noffa
